[A hand-reloaded shotgun shell filled with tiny steel darts.  Extremely damaging, plus the spread makes it very accurate at short range.  Slices through most forms of armor with ease.] 填入了許多小鋼鏢的散彈，手工裝配的重填彈。威力極強，在近距離有非常高的命中率。能夠穿透大部分的護甲。
[A hand-reloaded shotgun slug loaded with concussive explosives.  While the slug itself will not do much damage to its target, it will explode on contact.] 填入炸藥彈頭的散彈槍子彈，手工裝配的重填彈。彈頭本身不會傷害目標，而在接觸到目標時才會爆炸。
[A hand-reloaded variant of the widely-used 5.56 NATO round, incendiary rounds are designed to burn hotly upon impact, piercing armor and igniting flammable substances.] 5.56 NATO 彈的變種，燃燒型子彈能夠能在擊中目標時產生劇烈的火焰，能夠穿甲也能點燃易燃物質。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。
[A handful of New England sand.  If you had a stoked furnace, you could turn it into glass.  Otherwise, it's only good for making cement.] 
[A handful of ammonium nitrate.  This white, crystalline powder is commonly used as a component of fertilisers and explosives.  Could also be dissolved in water to sharply lower its temperature, but is there any use for this quality in this new world?] 一小撮硝酸銨。這種白色結晶粉末通常用來製作肥料和炸藥。也溶於液體中來大幅降溫，但這特性在這個新世界裡到底有什麼用？
[A handful of black gunpowder, made by mixing charcoal and sulfur with saltpeter.  Pretty useless for making modern cartridges, as the soot produced when it burns will quickly clog any firearm, but it could be used to make some vicious bombs.] 
[A handful of calcium carbide chunks, giving off a faint, garlic-like smell.  Commercially, calcium carbide was used for on-the-spot manufacture of acetylene and historically to power acetylene lamps.  If mixed with water and sealed, it will explode with little strength, but with relatively loud noise and could maybe be used as a decoy...] 一小撮碳化鈣(電石)塊，散發出一股淡淡的蒜味。在商業上，碳化鈣用於即時製造乙炔，歷史上也用於點亮乙炔燈。如果與水混合並將他密封，它會產生小威力但大聲響的爆炸，可以用來作為誘餌...
[A handful of chromium oxide pellets.  This substance, typically known as the only stable green pigment for paints, is also a mild oxidiser, which can be mixed with aluminum powder to make thermite for welding.  If one had access to a CVD machine and a laboratory worth of reagents, they might be able to produce very durable ceramic layers.] 一個氧化鉻小球。這種物質是通常情況下唯一穩定的綠色顏料，也是一種溫和的氧化劑。可以和鋁粉混合來進行鋁熱焊。如果能夠找到化學氣相沉積器和具有對應試劑的實驗室，它們可以用來生產非常耐用的陶瓷層。
[A handful of darts, useful as ammunition for blowguns.] 一把飛鏢，搭配吹箭才有用。
[A handful of finely ground aluminum powder.  This strong reducing agent was used in combination with various oxidants for chemical welding and explosives alike.  Just before the Cataclysm, however, it was the basis of virtually all commercial metallic-hued paints and anti-corrosive coatings.] 一把鋁粉。這種強效還原劑混合於各式化學焊料跟爆裂物中作為氧化劑。在大災變前，基本上用在所有有關金屬色的顏料跟防腐蝕的塗層。
[A handful of glass marbles, useful as ammunition for slings or slingshots.] 一把玻璃彈珠，可以用在投石帶或彈弓上。
[A handful of pebbles, useful as ammunition for slings or slingshots.] 一把鵝卵石，可以用在投石帶或彈弓上。
[A handful of round projectiles made of clay, useful for slings or slingshots.] 
[A handful of saltpeter.  Sometimes used as a fertilizer, this ubiquitous nitrate is the principal constituent of black gunpowder and simple rocket propellants, such as rocket candy.] 
[A handful of silvery-greenish powder, produced by mixing aluminum and chromium oxide.  This mixture, burning at a constant pace and at extremely high temperature, was once used for on-the-spot welding.  Can be used as an incendiary material in a pinch.] 一小撮銀綠色的粉末，由鋁粉和氧化鉻混合而成。這種混合物能以一定的加溫率燃燒至產生極高的溫度，一度曾被用於即時焊接。在緊急的時刻，可以作為燃燒彈的材料。
[A handful of small chunks of limestone.  Useful for experiments at science fairs, but pretty useless as ammo.  Maybe something could be crafted from this stuff…] 
[A handful of waxy hexamine tablets.  This ubiquitous fuel was used to start up almost every garden grill and no 'real' camping trip could do its cooking without it, until the Cataclysm.  Nowadays, it is even more valuable then before, being the key component in the preparation of several military-grade explosives.] 一些烏洛托品片。這種普遍存在的燃料被用於幾乎每一個花園烤架，直到大災變為止，那種“真正的”露營之旅也離不開用它來烹飪食物。現在，作為軍用級炸藥的關鍵製作成分，它甚至比以前還要來的更有價值了。
[A handful of yellow grains of pure sulfur.  Primarily used to make battery acid, sulfur is sometimes used as fuel for explosives.  Can be burned to produce acidic smoke, that is deadly to bacteria and humans alike, or oxidized to make paper-bleaching agents.] 
[A handful of zinc powder.  While commercially used mostly in cosmetics and for paints, hobbyists used to mix it with sulfur to make basic rocket fuel / smokescreen.  When treated with a strong acid, it will produce hydrogen.] 
[A heavy lead ball about 8cm in diameter.  Could pack quite a bit of a punch if you had something to launch it.] 
[A heavy metal slug used with shotguns to give them the range capabilities of a rifle.  Extremely damaging but rather inaccurate.  Works best in a shotgun with a rifled barrel.] 單顆全金屬彈頭的設計能讓散彈槍擊中較遠的目標，能造成極大傷害但不甚準確。槍管上刻上膛線的話表現更佳。
[A heavy modified handheld nuclear device affixed to the end of a large ballista bolt.  Its case has been cut down and it has been rigged to explode on impact.  It can no longer be triggered manually.] 
[A heavy modified handheld nuclear device.  Intended to be fired from a specialized launcher, its case has been cut down and it has been rigged to explode on impact.  While it is now somewhat lighter than before, it can no longer be triggered manually.] 經過改造的手提式核武器，必須裝在專用發射器內使用。外殼被取下以減輕重量。改造後只會在受到強烈撞擊時引爆，無法再以手動方式觸發。
[A heavy plastic cartridge made for use in flare guns.  It appears to be a modified 12 gauge shotgun shell.] 一個沈重的塑膠信號彈殼。似乎被改造成散彈槍殼了。

It's much heavier than other wooden arrows, and as a result it does more damage and is more stable in flight, resulting in better accuracy over a longer range.  Stands a good chance of remaining intact once fired.] 一根重型木箭矢，裝著金屬箭頭與箭羽。這種箭矢比其他的木箭矢重多了，不僅能造成更多傷害，飛行時也更加穩定，有著更好的準確度與射程。射擊後有高機率可以被回收並再次使用。

[Attempts to improve the ballistics of 9mm ammunition lead to high-pressure rounds.  Increased velocity results in superior accuracy and damage.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] 對 9mm 子彈彈道改良的嘗試結果促成這種高壓彈種的誕生。提升的彈速讓其在準度與殺傷力上都有較好的表現。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。
[BB] 
[Based off the military .30-03 round, the .270 rifle round is compatible with most guns that fire .30-06 rounds.  However, it is designed for hunting, and is less powerful than the military rounds, with nearly no armor penetration.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] 參考了軍用的 .30-03 彈，.270 步槍彈可以用於大部分使用 .30-06 彈的槍枝。但是因為這種子彈被設計為狩獵用，所以相較於軍用子彈其傷害能力較低，同時幾乎沒有穿甲能力。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。
[Big Bang canister] 
[Bismuth fishing weights and scraps.  Usable in making ammunition.] 一些鉍的金屬。能用在在製造彈藥上。
[Charcoal is a flammable carbon based material obtained by removing water and other volatile constituents from animal and vegetation substances.  It is produced by slowly heating wood or other substances in the absence of oxygen.] 木炭是一種可燃的碳化合物，藉由移除動物或植物構成物的水分與其他揮發性物質而獲得。它可以透過慢慢地於缺氧環境下加熱木頭或其他物質來製作。
[Claimed to be the world's most powerful handgun round, the .500 S&W Magnum was developed in tandem with the revolutionary S&W 500 Revolver.] .500 S&W 麥格農是由史密斯與威森兩人與他們革命性的 500 型左輪手槍所一同開發出的彈種。
[Claimed to be the world's most powerful handgun round, the .500 S&W Magnum was developed in tandem with the revolutionary S&W 500 Revolver.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] .500 S&W 麥格農是由史密斯與威森兩人與他們革命性的 500 型左輪手槍所一同開發出的彈種。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。
[Concentrated acetic acid, typically used as a chemical reagent and antifungal agent.  Despite its horrid smell, it was used to prepare several types of perfumes, but would making perfume not be too ...fancy for postapocalyptic New England?] 濃醋酸，一般用來作為化學試劑和抗真菌劑。儘管它聞起來很可怕，卻可以用來製作好幾種類型的香水，但會使香水不會太……想要世界末日後的新英格蘭嗎？
[Concentrated hydrogen peroxide is a powerful oxidant, violently decomposing in contact with most reducing agents.  Can be used as rocket fuel or to make high explosives.  Causes severe burns to any organic matter and may ignite it on contact.] 濃過氧化氫溶液是一種強大的氧化劑，與大部分還原劑接觸都會產生劇烈分解。可以用作火箭燃料或強烈炸藥。與任何有機物接觸都有可能點燃它們並產生劇烈燃燒。
[Conical Ball .22 is a variety of .22 ammunition with a very small propellant charge and generally lacks gunpowder.  The end result is a subsonic round.  It is nearly silent, but is so weak as to be nearly useless.] .22 CB 圓錐彈是 .22 口徑子彈的一種變體。它只有非常小量的高壓瓦斯和火藥，使它成為一種亞音速子彈。射擊時幾乎沒有聲音，但貧弱的威力使其幾乎沒有什麼用途。
[Conical Ball .22 is a variety of .22 ammunition with a very small propellant charge and generally lacks gunpowder.  The end result is a subsonic round.  It is nearly silent, but is so weak as to be nearly useless.  This one has been handmade using an intact casing.] 
[Copper scraps.  Could be used to craft something, for example makeshift shotgun rounds.] 廢銅塊。能夠用來製作一些有用的東西，例如粗製的散彈槍子彈。
[Described (in 1971) by Dirty Harry as "the most powerful handgun in the world," the .44 Magnum gained widespread popularity due to its depictions in the media.  In reality, its intense recoil makes it unsuitable in most cases.] 如同其在專輯"痞子哈利(1971)"的描述"這世上最強大的手槍"，.44 麥格農因其在媒體上的曝光而大為流行。實際上因為其強大的後座力，在大多數的狀況下並不適合使用這種彈種。
[Designed by Heckler & Koch to compete with the 5.7x28mm round, 4.6x30mm is, like the 5.7, designed to minimize weight and recoil while increasing penetration of body armor.  Its low recoil makes it ideal for automatic fire.] 為了與 5.7x28mm 彈種競爭，黑克勒-科赫公司開發出 4.6x30mm 口徑彈藥。跟其競爭對手一樣，這種彈種的重量以及後座力被盡可能的最小化，同時提高對人員護甲的穿透力。這彈藥的低後座力特性讓它非常適合用於全自動射擊上。
[Designed by Heckler & Koch to compete with the 5.7x28mm round, 4.6x30mm is, like the 5.7, designed to minimize weight and recoil while increasing penetration of body armor.  Its low recoil makes it ideal for automatic fire.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] 為了與 5.7x28mm 彈種競爭，黑克勒-科赫公司開發出 4.6x30mm 口徑彈藥。跟其競爭對手一樣，這種彈種的重量以及後座力被盡可能的最小化，同時提高對人員護甲的穿透力。這種彈藥的低後座力特性讓它非常適合用於全自動射擊上。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。
[Designed during World War II by the Soviet Union, the popularity of the AK-47 and the SKS contributed to the widespread adoption of the 7.62x39mm rifle round.  However, due to its lack of yaw, this round deals less damage than most.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] 7.62x39mm 彈是由蘇聯於第二次世界大戰中所設計。由於使用這種彈藥的 AK-47 步槍與 SKS 步槍的風行，7.62x39mm 步槍彈的人氣也隨之廣為流傳。但必須注意的是因為這種彈種缺乏滾轉的特性，使其的傷害會低於大部分其他彈種。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。

[Nitric acid, a strong oxidant and extremely corrosive material.  Mainly used in the production of synthetic fertilisers, for etching of circuit boards and in woodworking.  Remains quite useful both for making a vast array of pyrotechnic and explosive agents and as a direct weapon: not many beings enjoy being doused in nitric acid.] 硝酸，一種強氧化劑和超強腐蝕性材料。主要用於生產合成化肥、蝕刻電路板和木工。另外不論是製作各類煙火、爆破物還是直接作為武器都很有效：很少有生物會喜歡浸泡在硝酸之中。
[One of the smallest calibers available, the .22 Long Rifle cartridge has maintained popularity for nearly two centuries.  Its minimal recoil, low cost and low noise are offset by its paltry damage.] 身為最小口徑的彈藥之一，.22 LR 彈流行了接近兩個世紀。它的傷害微不足道，但是後座力極小、非常便宜、以及相當安靜。
[One of the smallest calibers available, the .22 Long Rifle cartridge has maintained popularity for nearly two centuries.  Its minimal recoil, low cost and low noise are offset by its paltry damage.  This one has been handmade using an intact casing.] 
[Originally used by the FBI, the organization eventually abandoned the round due to its high recoil.  Although respected for its versatility and power, it has largely been supplanted by the downgraded .40 S&W.] 這種子彈最初被 FBI 使用，但後來因為其高後座力被棄用。雖然有相當不錯的威力以及泛用性，但這種彈種在大部分狀況下都被較低階的 .40 S&W 所取代。

[Serious ammunition for heavy machineguns and special military hardware, intended for destroying vehicles or very large creatures.] 
[Several brownish pellets that were made by absorbing organic fuel on ammonium nitrate.  This ammonium nitrate–fuel oil or ANFO, as it is called, mixture is a common industrial explosive due to its stability and low price.  Burns fast, but needs an explosive primer to detonate...] 幾顆褐色的小球，透過吸收硝酸銨上的有機燃料而製成。如同它本身的名字，因為性質穩定以及低廉的價格，這項被稱為ANFO的化學混合物為普遍的工業用炸藥原料。燒起來很快，但是它仍需要炸藥引信才能引爆。
[Several crystals of aluminum sulfate.  Historically, an agent for purifying water and as molluscicide, due to the fact that it degenerates their slime.  Just before the Cataclysm, its main uses were for adjusting the acidity of the soil and as an additive to baking powder.  If mixed with a strong acid, it could be used to saturate the soil with aluminum, causing all but the most resistant of plants to wither and die.] 
[Several off-white crystals of RDX or hexogen--a military-grade, shelf-stable high explosive.  Can be cast into shaped charges or mixed with scrap to pepper the blast area with high-velocity shrapnel.] 這幾顆黃白色水晶的物體就是黑索金(RDX)，也有人稱為旋風炸藥
，它是一種軍用等級且穩定性高的爆裂物。可被製作成各種形狀的炸藥或者是與廢金屬混合，投擲後產生的超高速砲彈碎片將會痛擊所有爆炸區域內的生物。
[Small gold bits.  Before the cataclysm these would have been worth quite a bit.  Still usable in making ammunition.] 小塊金塊，在災變前它值得可比它的外觀要多得多。還是能夠拿來製作彈藥。
[Small silver bits.  Before the cataclysm, these would have been worth quite a bit.  Still usable in making ammunition.] 一些銀塊，在災變之前值很多錢，現在倒是可以用來製造彈藥。
[Small slivers of metal.  Can't see much use for them.] 
[Some fungal seeds.] 一些真菌種子。
[Steel heads for an arrow.  Placing these on arrows will make them more damaging and piercing.] 鋼製的箭頭,將這些玩意裝上之後,箭矢將會更具威力及穿透力。
[Sulfuric acid: viscous, foul-smelling and extremely corrosive, particularly to organic matter and evil clowns.  Although used to prepare a number of chemicals, it is mostly known as battery acid, due to its widest commercial application.] 
[The .223 rifle round is a civilian variant of the 5.56 NATO round.  It is designed to tumble or fragment inside a target, dealing devastating damage.  The lower pressure of the .223 compared to the 5.56 results in lower accuracy.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] .223 步槍彈是 5.56 NATO 彈的其中一種民間用變型。這種子彈被設計成會在目標體內滾轉或碎裂，造成極為可觀的傷害。但 .223 的低壓特性使其相較於 5.56 下準度較差。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。
[The .30-06 is a very powerful rifle round designed for long-range use.  Its stupendous accuracy and armor piercing capabilities make it one of the most deadly rounds available, offset only by its drastic recoil and noise.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] .30-06 是種非常具威力的步槍彈，被設計用於長程射擊使用。其優異的準度與穿甲能力使它成為現存最為致命的彈種之一。唯一的缺點是射擊時非常大的後座力以及聲響。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。
[The .300 Winchester Magnum is extremely versatile and has been adopted by many shooting disciplines.  The cartridge has found use by hunters, military units, and law enforcement departments.] .300 溫徹斯特麥格農是一種在許多射擊訓練時廣泛使用的彈藥。此彈種常用於獵人、軍事單位，以及執法部門。
[The .300 Winchester Magnum is extremely versatile and has been adopted by many shooting disciplines.  The cartridge has found use by hunters, military units, and law enforcement departments.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] .300 溫徹斯特麥格農是一種在許多射擊訓練時廣泛使用的彈藥。此彈種常用於獵人、軍事單位，以及執法部門。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。
[The .308 Winchester is a rifle round, the commercial equivalent of the military 7.62x51mm round.  Its high accuracy and phenomenal damage have made it the most popular hunting round in the world.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] .308 溫徹斯特是軍用 7.62x51mm 的商用同等步槍彈。其高準度與驚人的傷害能力使其成為世界上最為風行的狩獵用子彈。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。
[The .32 ACP was a popular handgun cartridge in the 20th century.  Not so powerful as the .38 or the 9mm though.] .32 ACP 是在 20 世紀流行的手槍彈。不比 .38 或 9mm 強就是。
[The .32 ACP was a popular handgun cartridge in the 20th century.  Not so powerful as the .38 or the 9mm though.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] .32 ACP 是在 20 世紀流行的手槍彈。不比 .38 或 9mm 強就是。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。
[The .38 Smith & Wesson Special enjoyed popularity among US police forces throughout the 20th century.  It is most commonly used in revolvers.] .38 史密斯威森特殊彈在 20 世紀的美國警方非常熱門。它絕大多數被用在左輪手槍上。
[The .38 Smith & Wesson Special enjoyed popularity among US police forces throughout the 20th century.  It is most commonly used in revolvers.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] .38 史密斯威森特殊彈在20世紀的美國警方非常熱門。它絕大多數被用在左輪手槍上。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。
[The .38 Super is a high-pressure load of the .38 Special caliber.  It is a popular choice in pistol competitions for its high accuracy, while its stopping power keeps it popular for self-defense.] .38 超級彈是 .38 特殊彈的高壓彈。它的高彈速讓它成為手槍射擊競賽中的熱門選擇。同時因為它的抑止力，讓他在自我防衛上也是相當不錯的選擇。
[The .38 Super is a high-pressure load of the .38 Special caliber.  It is a popular choice in pistol competitions for its high accuracy, while its stopping power keeps it popular for self-defense.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] .38 超級彈是 .38 特殊彈的高壓彈。它的高彈速讓它成為手槍射擊競賽中的熱門選擇。同時因為它的抑止力，讓他在自我防衛上也是相當不錯的選擇。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。
[The .40 Smith & Wesson round was developed as an alternative to 10mm Auto for the FBI after they complained of high recoil.  It is as accurate as 9mm, but has greater stopping power, leading to widespread use in law enforcement.] .40 史密斯威森彈是 FBI 針對 10mm Auto 高後座力的不滿所開發的彈種。這彈種跟 9mm 子彈一樣準確同時具有更好的抑止力，使其在執法單位中被廣泛使用。
[The .40 Smith & Wesson round was developed as an alternative to 10mm Auto for the FBI after they complained of high recoil.  It is as accurate as 9mm, but has greater stopping power, leading to widespread use in law enforcement.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] .40 史密斯威森彈是 FBI 針對 10mm Auto 高後座力的不滿所開發的彈種。這彈種跟 9mm 子彈一樣準確同時具有更好的抑止力，使其在執法單位中被廣泛使用。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。
[The .45 Super round is an updated variant of .45 ACP.  It is overloaded, resulting in a great increase in muzzle velocity.  This translates to higher accuracy and range, a minor armor piercing capability, and greater recoil.] .45 超級彈是 .45 ACP 的其中一種改良版本。它的過度裝藥讓它的槍口初速有了顯著提升。這使其獲得了更高的準確度以及射程、還可以的穿甲能力、以及巨大的後座力。
[The .45 Super round is an updated variant of .45 ACP.  It is overloaded, resulting in a great increase in muzzle velocity.  This translates to higher accuracy and range, a minor armor piercing capability, and greater recoil.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] .45 超級彈是 .45 ACP 的其中一種改良版本。它的過度裝藥讓它的槍口初速有了顯著提升。這使其獲得了更高的準確度以及射程、還可以的穿甲能力、以及巨大的後座力。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。
[The .45 round was one of the most popular and powerful handgun rounds through the 20th century.  It features very good accuracy and stopping power, but suffers from moderate recoil and poor armor penetration.] .45 子彈是20世紀最流行也最強大的彈種之一。它提供非常好的準確度與抑止力，但是有著中等的後座力以及只有貧弱的穿甲能力。
[The .45 round was one of the most popular and powerful handgun rounds through the 20th century.  It features very good accuracy and stopping power, but suffers from moderate recoil and poor armor penetration.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] .45 子彈是 20 世紀最流行也最強大的彈種之一。它提供非常好的準確度與抑止力，但是有著中等的後座力以及只有貧弱的穿甲能力。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。
[The .454 Casull round a very powerful revolver round capable of killing huge game, like elephants, with ease.  It's designed to be used with the Taurus Raging Bull.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] .454 卡蘇爾是非常強大的左輪彈種，它能夠輕易地殺死像是大象之類的巨大獵物。它被設計用於蠻牛左輪手槍。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。
[The .454 Casull round is a very powerful revolver round capable of killing huge game, like elephants, with ease.  It's designed to be used with the Taurus Raging Bull.] .454卡蘇爾是非常強大的左輪彈種，它能夠輕易地殺死像是大象之類的巨大獵物。它被設計用於蠻牛左輪手槍。
[The .50 BMG is a very powerful rifle round designed for long-range use.  Its stupendous accuracy and armor piercing capabilities make it one of the most deadly rounds available, offset only by its drastic recoil and noise.] .50 BMG 是非常強大的步槍彈，設計用於長距離使用。擁有驚人的精準度與致命的穿甲能力，缺點是極大的後座力與噪音。
[The .50 BMG is a very powerful rifle round designed for long-range use.  Its stupendous accuracy and armor piercing capabilities make it one of the most deadly rounds available, offset only by its drastic recoil and noise.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] .50 BMG 是非常強大的步槍彈設計用於長距離使用。擁有驚人的精準度與致命的穿甲能力，缺點是極大的後座力與噪音。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。
[The .700 Nitro Express is a very powerful rifle round designed for long-range use.  Its stupendous accuracy and armor piercing capabilities make it one of the most deadly rounds available, offset only by its drastic recoil and noise.] .700 Nitro Express 一種專為遠距離射擊所設計的強力步槍子彈，它優秀的準確度和穿甲性能使其成為最致命的彈藥之一，這足夠彌補其巨大的後座力和噪音所帶來的負面影響。
[The .700 Nitro Express is a very powerful rifle round designed for long-range use.  Its stupendous accuracy and armor piercing capabilities make it one of the most deadly rounds available, offset only by its drastic recoil and noise.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] 
[The 5.45x39mm was the standard ammunition for the AK series from 1974.  Its designers were inspired by the 5.56x45mm NATO cartridge.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] 
[The 5.7x28mm round is a proprietary round developed by FN Herstal for use in their P90 SMG.  While it is a very small round, comparable in power to .22, it features incredible armor-piercing capabilities and very low recoil.] 5.7x28mm 是 FN Herstal 為其公司的 P90 衝鋒槍所開發的專屬彈種。雖然這是種像 .22 一般非常小的彈種，它擁有不可置信的穿甲能力以及非常低的後座力。
[The 5.7x28mm round is a proprietary round developed by FN Herstal for use in their P90 SMG.  While it is a very small round, comparable in power to .22, it features incredible armor-piercing capabilities and very low recoil.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] 5.7x28mm 是 FN Herstal 為其公司的 P90 衝鋒槍所開發的專屬彈種。雖然這是種像 .22 一般非常小的彈種，它擁有不可置信的穿甲能力以及非常低的後座力。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。
[The 6.54x42mm 9N12 has superior amror piercing capabilities thanks to it's tungsten carbide core. Tungsten carbide was used in anti-tank rounds of the 20th and 21st century.] 6.54x42mm 9N12 步槍彈內含一個碳化鎢彈芯，以致它擁有優秀的穿甲能力。碳化鎢曾用於 20 至 21 世紀的反坦克子彈中。
[The 7.62x51mm largely replaced the .30-06 round as the standard military rifle round.  It is lighter, but offers similar velocities, resulting in greater accuracy and reduced recoil.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] 7.62x51mm 大量的取代原有的 .30-06 彈成為軍用步槍標準使用彈藥。相較 .30-06，這種子彈較輕卻有近乎相同的彈速，使其在有非常好的精準度同時也降低了後座力。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。
[The 7.62×54mmR is a rimmed rifle cartridge developed by the Russian Empire in 1891.  It is still in service and has the longest service life of all military issued cartridges in the world.] 7.62×54mmR 是由俄羅斯帝國在 1891 年開發的一種凸緣式子彈。目前仍在服勤，是軍史上服勤年齡最久的彈種。
[The 7.62×54mmR is a rimmed rifle cartridge developed by the Russian Empire in 1891.  It is still in service and has the longest service life of all military issued cartridges in the world.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] 7.62×54mmR 是由俄羅斯帝國在 1891 年開發的一種凸緣式子彈。目前仍在服勤，是軍史上服勤年齡最久的彈種。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。
[The Heckler & Koch 12mm projectiles are used in H&K railguns.  It's made of a ferromagnetic metal, probably cobalt.] 用於 H&K 軌道槍的 12mm 彈藥。由磁性的金屬製成，可能是鈷。
[The M67 variant of the popular 7.62x39mm rifle round was designed to improve yaw.  This causes the round to tumble inside a target, causing significantly more damage.  It is still outdone by shattering rounds.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] M67 是知名 7.62x39mm 步槍彈的其中一種變種，試圖改善其滾轉的特性。這種改良讓槍彈命中目標時會體內滾轉使其明顯的提升傷害。這種傷害不會輸給在目標體內碎裂的子彈。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。
[The product of burning limestone, this white powder is a crucial ingredient in making cement.  That said, it is also extremely caustic and will cause severe burns to any tissue it comes in contact with.  This property could probably be exploited...] 
[The result of an interrupted charcoal making process.  Useless, except as fuel in a charcoal kiln.] 
[These are smaller pieces of charcoal used in smaller heating devices.] 
[These are thin paper strips intended for the rolling of cigarettes.] 一張用來捲香煙的薄紙。
[These metal pellets are propelled with the help of electromagnets, therefore they do not produce sound, flash or heat signature.] 這種金屬鋼珠利用電磁加速原理發射，因此完全不會產生聲音、閃光、或是熱。
[This arrow has a flaming rag wrapped around the shaft near the head.  You should shoot it soon before it burns your bow.] 點燃的碎布包覆在箭頭的位置。你應該會想要在火燒到你的弓之前把它射出去。
[This arrow has a small IED strapped to its tip.  Horribly inaccurate, heavy, and bulky, not only does this contraption require expert hands to pull off a shot, it requires one to loose this with a small measure of confidence the shooter won't be caught in the blast radius.] 這根箭前端裝有小型土製炸彈。非常不精準且笨重。要使用這東西不只需要一個專業的射手將它射到目標，還要那射手夠自信不會被捲入爆炸半徑內。
[This arrow is significantly sturdier than other wooden arrows.  It has a crude field point head and fletching.  Stands a good chance of remaining intact once fired.] 
[This arrow is significantly sturdier than other wooden arrows.  It has a field point tip, but needs fletching before it is worth firing.] 這個箭頭明顯較其他木箭頭來的結實沉重。箭頭已被削尖，但射擊前仍需要裝上箭羽才行。
[This arrow is significantly sturdier than other wooden arrows.  It has a fire-hardened point and fletching.  Stands a good chance of remaining intact once fired.] 
[This arrow is significantly sturdier than other wooden arrows.  It has a fire-hardened point, but needs fletching to be worth firing.] 這個箭頭明顯較其他木箭頭來的結實沉重。箭頭尖端被火烤強化過，但在用來打獵之前最好裝上箭羽以增加準確度。
[This is gasoline mixed with some other components to make it stick to the surface and increase burning temperature, meant to be used with a flamethrower.] 以汽油混合一些其他成份，讓它可以黏在物體表面並持續增加燃燒溫度，搭配火焰噴射器使用。

[This metal arrow has fletching and a steel arrowhead.  Stands a very good chance of remaining intact once fired.]

[This rifle round has enjoyed widespread use in NATO countries, thanks to its very light weight and high damage.  It is designed to shatter inside a target, inflicting massive damage.  This one has been hand-reloaded.] 這種步槍彈因其重量輕且高傷害的特性，使其被廣泛使用於北約成員國。這種彈藥被設計於目標體內碎裂，造成極為可觀的傷害。這顆是手工裝配的重填彈。
[This simple arrow has a fire-hardened point and fletching.  Stands a below average chance of remaining intact once fired.] 
[This small caliber pistol round offers good armor penetration at the cost of slightly less damage.  It is rarely used outside of the Chinese army.] 這種小型手槍子彈以較低的傷害為代價換取到相當不錯的穿甲能力。這種彈種通常不會在中國軍隊以外的地方看到。

[A Modular Bullet Resistant Vest.  Ceramic plates have been inserted to improve its protection.  The ceramic plates cannot be repaired, only replaced.] 一件模組化防彈背心。其附加防護片的口袋裡裝了陶盤，有著額外的保護。陶盤壞了就只能更換，無法修復。
[A Modular Bullet Resistant Vest.  Hardened steel plates have been inserted, greatly increasing its protection at the cost of a great deal of weight and loss of flexibility.] 一件模組化防彈背心。其附加防護片的口袋裡裝了鋼板，有著額外的保護，但是附加的重量犧牲了一些靈活性。
[A Modular Bullet Resistant Vest.  It has pouches for extra armor inserts, but without them provides little more protection over a regular vest.] 一件模組化防彈背心。有著能裝入附加防護片的口袋，沒有裝的話就只是比一般背心強一點而已。
[A Modular Bullet Resistant Vest.  Its armor pouches have steel plates in them; this improves protection, but makes the vest much heavier and encumbering.] 一件模組化的防彈背心。它的裝甲袋內有鋼板提供保護，但這讓背心更重且累贅。

I 基本動力裝甲。提供了對抗攻擊以及惡劣環境的絕佳保護。就像其他的 DoubleTech 動力裝甲，控制與氣候調節系統必須直接接觸皮膚。
[A basic helmet, designed for use with the DoubleTech Power Armor, Mk.  I.  Offers excellent protection from both attacks and environmental hazards.  This suit has had its internal computer and cooling system stripped out, meaning it no longer requires power, but it has no internal chronometer and doesn't provide internal thermal regulation.] 一個基本頭盔，由 DoubleTech 工業製造的 Mk. Whether you're the "guvnah" of a settlement, or the captain of a post-apocalyptic crew, this is the hat for you.] 三角帽是一種非常經典的設計，將大片軟趴趴的帽沿向上折起固定，這頂還帶有精緻的刺繡與防水設計。只要戴上它，就算在殭屍爆發後也依舊能讓你充滿十八世紀的船長英姿。

[Perfect for reading all those books you scavenged.] 能夠讓你舒服的閱讀你撿拾來的書。
[Pieces of animal pelt that are meant to be wrapped around your hands to provide small amounts of protection while punching and performing other general mischief.] 幾塊毛皮所用來纏在你的手上以提供少量的保護，一般是在毆打人或是做其他壞事的時候使用。

[Plain white karate gi.  Loose and flowing, it offers little protection, and little encumbrance.] 白色的空手道袍服。長而寬鬆，防護力有限，但是穿起來也不累贅。

[Rags stitched together and tied into a makeshift loincloth.  Covers your modesty, but not much else.] 把布條縫在一起就成了手工製的兜襠布。能夠蓋住你害羞的地方，但就這樣而已。

[Sturdy leather hiking sandals with a heel strap.  Offers little in the way of protection, but keeps you cool during warmer months.] 採用鞋帶設計、結實的皮革登山涼鞋，幾乎無法提供任何防護，但在最熱的日子裡可以讓你保持涼爽。
[Stylish cloak.] 讓你成為絕地武士。
[The DoubleTech Power Armor, Mk.  I: A heavy suit of basic power armor, offering very good protection against attacks, but hard to move in.  The UPS compartment can store other things if you don't mind powering the suit yourself.  Like all DoubleTech power armor, the control and climate-regulation systems require direct skin contact.] DoubleTech 工業的 Mk. I 動力裝甲: 一套沈重的基本動力裝甲，提供了對攻擊的絕佳保護性，但是讓人很難移動。若是由自身供電的話，能夠移除原本的 UPS，空出來的艙室能用來儲存其他東西。就像其他的 DoubleTech 動力裝甲，控制與氣候調節系統必須直接接觸皮膚。
[The DoubleTech Power Armor, Mk.  I: A heavy suit of basic power armor, offering very good protection against attacks, but hard to move in.  This suit has had its servos and cooling system stripped out, meaning it no longer requires power, but also encumbers you greatly and doesn't provide internal thermal regulation.] DoubleTech 工業的 Mk. I 動力裝甲: 一套沈重的基本動力裝甲，提供了對攻擊的絕佳保護性，但是讓人很難移動。這裝甲的電腦系統與冷卻系統都被移除了，也就是說再也不需要電力驅動了，但是也讓你產生極大的累贅並且也沒有內部控溫機制。
[The French maid dress, blue with a frilly white apron.] 法國女僕的裝束，有著藍白相間的褶邊圍裙。
[The Modular Lightweight Load-carrying Equipment is an advanced military backpack.  Covered with pockets and straps, it strikes a fine balance between storage space and encumbrance.] 輕型戰術背包，全稱是模組化輕型承重戰術背包。先進的軍用背包，上面還佈滿著索帶和小口袋，兼顧容量和行動便利性。
[The age-old question, boxers or briefs? Your answer? Yes.] 
[The obvious choice for outdoor athletes, this ergonomic backpack is light and easy to wear, ensuring comfort when carrying heavy and bulky items.] 戶外運動員的首選，這符合人體工學的背包重量很輕，不易磨損，在攜帶笨重物品時也能確保舒適。
[The only hat for a gentleman.  Look exquisite while laughing in the face of danger!] 紳士專用的唯一選擇。在末日之時還能讓你體面。

[zubon] 
[A UPS fully integrated with your bionic power system.  Allows you to run devices requiring a UPS off of your internal power, which is much more efficient than standard battery power.] 一個與你的生化能量系統完全整合的不斷電系統，允許你以生化能量供電代替UPS供電的裝置，遠比使用一般電池的效率高。
[A deadly foot-long blade made of advanced material now resides inside your forearm, capable of being extended through the back of your wrist at the cost of a small amount of power.  Though exceptionally sharp, it will prevent you from holding anything else while extended.] 耗用一點能量，你手腕的背面就能夠伸出先進材質的致命長刀。能夠讓你做出強力的砍劈傷害，但是刀子伸出時是無法拿東西的。
[A filtration system in your heart allows you to actively filter out chemical impurities, primarily drugs.  It will have limited impact on viruses.  Note that it is not a targeted filter; ALL drugs in your system will be affected.] 你的心臟安裝了過濾系統讓你能夠主動過濾化學雜質，主要是藥物。對於病毒只有有限的作用。注意這不是針對性的過濾器；藥物會被過濾掉。
[A kit for upgrading a pre-installed microreactor with enhanced maximum yield and automatic radiation scrubbing.] 
[A motion-detecting alarm system will notice almost all movement within a fifteen-foot radius, and will silently alert you.  This is very useful during sleep, or if you suspect a cloaked pursuer.] 一個動態偵測警報系統能夠偵測5呎遠的範圍並通知你。在你睡覺時，或是你懷疑有隱形的生物在追蹤你時非常有用。
[A multitude of scientific instruments and sensors collect environmental data.  The data is compiled and presented as a simple readout of the current weather.] 
[A small module connected to your brain allows you to interface with nearby devices with wireless capabilities.] 一個連接在你大腦的小型模組，能夠讓你利用無線功能操縱附近的裝置。
[A stimulator system has been implanted alongside your adrenal glands, allowing you to trigger your body's adrenaline response at the cost of some bionic power.] 沿著你的腎上腺植入了一個刺激系統，讓你能夠耗用一些生化能量來啟動身體的腎上腺素。
[A system of advanced piezomechanical blood filters have been implanted throughout your body, allowing you to purge yourself of absorbed radiation at the cost of some bionic power.] 一個先進的血液透析系統植入於你的身體，能夠讓你耗用一些生化能量來淨化體內的輻射。
[A thin forcefield surrounds your body, continually draining power.  Anything attempting to penetrate this field has a chance of being deflected at the cost of more energy.  Melee attacks will be stopped more often than bullets.] 一層薄薄的力場包圍著你的身體，持續地消耗能量。任何想穿過力場的物體都有機會被彈開，但代價就是會消耗更多能量。近戰攻擊比子彈更容易被阻擋。
[A thin forcefield surrounds your body, continually draining power.  This field does not deflect penetration, but rather delivers a very strong shock, damaging unarmed attackers and those with a conductive weapon.] 一層薄薄的力場包圍著你的身體，持續的消耗能量。這個力場不會彈開威脅，反而會產生強力電擊，把徒手攻擊或是持可導電武器的對手電暈。

[Thermal Dissipation CBM] 
[This high-power system uses a set of cameras and LEDs to make you blend into your background, rendering you fully invisible to normal vision.  However, you may be detected by infrared, sonar, etc.] 這個高耗能的系統使用了攝影與顯像技術讓你融入背景，讓正常視覺的人看不見你。然而你還是會被紅外線，聲納等技術偵測到。
[This highly experimental unit folds space over short distances, instantly transporting your body up to 25 feet at the cost of much power.  Note that prolonged or frequent use may have dangerous side effects.] 這個實驗性的插件能夠把空間折疊，消耗大量的能量，即刻把你的身體傳送到 25 呎遠的地方。需要注意的是長期或頻繁使用可能有危險的副作用。
[This unit draws moisture from the surrounding air, which then is poured from a fingertip in the form of water.  It may fail in very dry environments.] 這個插件能夠從空氣中聚集水分，並且能夠從你的指尖倒水到容器中。在非常乾燥的環境下可能會失敗。
[Through controlled application of electrochemical impulses, you are capable of altering your facial structure so as to subtly affect the reactions of others.  This grants a bonus to all social interactions.] 你的臉能夠透過電子脈衝調整結構，巧妙地影響他人對你的反應。讓你在社交方面得到好處。
[Throughout your body lies a network of miniature piezoelectric capacitors which can be charged with bionic power to temporarily protect you from external electrical discharge.] 你整個身體埋入了微型壓電電容能夠透過使用生化能量來讓你暫時免於受到觸電的外在傷害。
[Throughout your body lies a network of thermal piping which eases the effects of high and low ambient temperatures.] 你的全身安裝了生化熱導管，能讓你不怎麼受到環境溫度影響。

[Water Extraction Unit CBM] 
[Weather Reader CBM] 
[When this bionic is active, your hearing will be drastically improved, allowing you to hear ten times better than the average person.  Additionally, high-intensity sounds will be automatically dampened before they can damage your hearing.  You can also toggle those sound dampeners on demand, should you wish to reduce the effect of the bionic or become completely deaf.] 
[While activated, your muscles will be greatly enhanced, increasing your strength by 20.] 當能力啟動時，你的肌力將獲得增強，你將因此增加 20 力量。
[While fighting unarmed against a warm-blooded opponent, there is a chance that a successful hit will drain body heat, inflicting a small amount of extra damage, and increasing your power reserves slightly.] 當你徒手與溫體動物戰鬥時，將有機會在擊中對手時吸取熱能，造成少量的額外傷害並能夠得到一些能量。
[While fighting unarmed, or with a weapon that conducts electricity, there is a chance that a successful hit will shock your opponent, inflicting extra damage and disabling them temporarily at the cost of some energy.] 當你徒手戰鬥或是使用能導電的武器時，將有機會成功電擊你的對手，造成額外的傷害並短暫的癱瘓對手，只需要花費一些能量。
[While this system is powered, you're able to visually sense your own scent, making it possible for you to recognize your surroundings even if you can't see it.] 啟動這個系統時，你將能夠使用眼睛看到氣味，讓你能夠在無光線的狀況下看見你附近的東西。
[While this system is powered, your body will produce very little odor, making it nearly impossible for creatures to track you by scent.] 當啟動這個系統時，你的身體氣味會大幅減少，讓附近的生物不易追查你的蹤跡。
[Wired Reflexes CBM] 
[You are equipped with bionic stimulators which augment your hematopoiesis system, allowing you to accelerate white blood cell production using bionic power.] 你裝置了能夠刺激白血球生長的造血系統，讓你能消耗生化能量來加快體內白血球的製造。
[You burn alcohol as fuel in an extremely efficient reaction.  However, you will still suffer the inebriating effects of the substance.] 你能夠以極有效率的方式燃燒酒精來發電。然而你仍然會受到酒精的不良影響。
[You can burn nearly any organic material as fuel (use 'E'), recharging your power level.  Some materials will burn better than others.  Can be toggled on and off at will.] 你能夠藉由燃燒附近的有機物，例如汽油，來獲得能量 (使用 'E')。某些物質的發電能力比較好。
[You generate a powerful shockwave, knocking back all nearby creatures.  Targets are stunned briefly, take damage and additional stun upon impact with impassable terrain, and knockback any creatures they collide with.] 你能夠產生強大的震波，震退所有靠近你的生物。目標將會被震暈，受到傷害，若在無法通過的地形上使用能夠產生附加的傷害。
[You have a battery draining attachment, and thus can make use of the energy contained in normal, everyday batteries.  Use 'E' to consume batteries.  Can be toggled on and off at will.] 這是一個電力提取的插件，能夠用來從一般的電池中提取能量。按下 'E' 來提取電力。可以任意地開關。
[You have a few solar panels installed.  While in direct sunlight, your power level will slowly recharge.] 你身上安裝了數個太陽能板。只要陽光直射你就能夠慢慢充能。
[You have been equipped with an internal atomic clock, ensuring that you will always know the current time.] 你體內裝置了一個原子鐘，能夠讓你隨時知道目前的時間。
[You have been outfitted with three synthetic stomachs and industrial-grade intestines.  Not only can you extract much more nutrition from food, but you are highly resistant to foodborne illness, and can sometimes eat rotten food.] 你的消化器官已被改造成合成胃以及工業級腸子。不僅能夠從食物提取更多營養，並且還能抵抗食源性疾病，另外有時候也能吃腐敗的食物。
[You possess razor-sharp retractable claws underneath your fingernails, ten double-edged blades four centimeters in length that do a small amount of unarmed slashing damage whenever your fingertips are uncovered.] 你的指甲下方多了一套可伸縮的銳利刀刃，當你的指尖沒有被蓋住的時候，能夠增加徒手攻擊的傷害。
[Your body is equipped with a chain lightning generator, allowing you to emit a blast of lightning at a target, leaving a trail of lightning in its wake, jumping to additional targets within 4 tiles of the previous target.] 你的身體安裝了連鎖閃電產生器，讓你能夠先攻擊一個目標，然後還能傳導傷害到目標 4 格內的其他目標。
[Your brain has been enhanced with bionic coprocessors, giving you a +2 bonus to intelligence.] 你的腦部已經由生化處理器增強，讓你得到額外 2 點智力。
[Your digestive system and power supply are interconnected.  Any drain on energy instead increases your hunger.  Can be toggled on and off at will.] 你的消化系統與能量供應系統連結。耗用能量將增加飢餓度。可以任意地開關。
[Your digestive system has been outfitted with a series of filters and processors, allowing you to reclaim waste liquid and, to a lesser degree, nutrients.  The net effect is a greatly reduced need to eat and drink.] 你的消化系統被一系列的過濾器及處理器取代，能夠讓你回收並中和體內廢液成為小分子。能夠大大的減少你對吃喝的需求。
[Your entire body may resonate at very high power, creating a short-range shockwave.  While it will not do much damage to flexible creatures, stiff items such as walls, doors, and even robots will be severely damaged.] 你的身體能產生高能共振，發出短距的衝擊波。衝擊波對生物影響不大，但對堅固的物體如牆壁、門，甚至機器人都將造成嚴重的損壞。
[Your eye sockets have been sealed with highly protective mirrored lenses and your tear ducts have been re-routed to your mouth.  When you cry, you must spit out or swallow your tears.] 你的眼窩安裝了高防護力的鏡片，而淚腺繞道到你的嘴。當你哭的時候，你必須把淚水吐出來或吞下去。
[Your eyes are equipped with range finders, and their movement is synced with that of your arms, to a degree.  Shots you fire will be much more accurate, particularly at long range.] 你的眼睛裝備了測距儀，並且能夠與你的手臂精確的同步運作。你射擊的命中率大幅提升，尤其是遠距離。
[Your eyes have a thin membrane that closes over your eyes while underwater, negating any vision penalties.] 你的眼睛安裝了人工透明的瓣膜，能夠讓你在水下看得清楚，消除任何視力懲罰。
[Your eyes have been modified to amplify existing light, allowing you to see in the dark.] 你的眼睛被改造成能夠放大微弱光線，讓你能夠在黑暗中視物。
[Your eyes have high-power, quick-reacting transition lenses installed over them, negating any glare penalties and protecting you from bright flashes including those of a welder.] 你的雙眼覆蓋了一對高功率快速反應的鏡片，能夠防止任何閃光炫光對與視覺的傷害，焊接時就不需要護目鏡了。
[Your feet are equipped with precision sonar equipment, allowing you to detect the movements of creatures below the ground.] 你的腳掌安裝了聲納感知裝置，讓你能夠偵測地下生物的動態。
[Your joints have been equipped with torsion ratchets that generate power slowly when you move.] 你的關節裝備了轉輪發電器，能夠在你移動的時候緩慢產生能量。
[Your left arm has been replaced by a heavy-duty fusion blaster! You may use your energy banks to fire a damaging heat ray; however, you are unable to use or carry two-handed items, and may only fire handguns.] 你的左臂被改造成重型核融合砲！你能夠耗用體內的能量庫來射出破壞性的雷射光束；然而你無法使用或攜帶雙手武器，只能拿手槍。
[Your memory has been enhanced with small quantum storage drives.  Any time you start to forget a skill, if this bionic is active you will retain all knowledge, at the cost of a small amount of power.] 你的記憶能力藉由植入量子硬碟得到增強。當你開始技能衰減時，只要此生化插件啟用中，你將有可能透過消耗些許能量來保留全部的知識。
[Your muscular system has been enhanced with myomer fibers, giving you a +2 bonus to strength.] 你的肌肉系統已藉由生化纖維增強，讓你得到額外 2 點力量。
[Your nervous system has been augmented with bionic processors, allowing you to dodge attacks beyond normal human capability, including bullets.] 你的神經系統已經由生化處理器加強，讓你能夠比一般人更加容易閃避攻擊，包括子彈。
[Your nervous system has been enhanced with bionic stimulators, giving you a 10% boost to your speed.] 你的神經系統透過生化刺激裝置增強，讓你獲得額外 10% 的速度。
[Your nervous system is wired to allow you to inhibit the signals of pain, allowing you to dull your senses at will.  However, the use of this system may cause delayed reaction time and drowsiness.] 你的神經系統能夠依照你的意志忽略疼痛，關閉感官。然而，使用這個系統有可能會讓你對環境危險慢半拍。
[Your range of vision extends into the infrared, allowing you to see warm-blooded creatures in the dark, and even through walls.] 你的視力能夠看到紅外線，讓你能夠在黑暗中看到溫體動物，甚至透過牆也能看到。
[Your reaction time has been greatly enhanced with bionic nerve stimulators, giving you a +2 bonus to dexterity.] 你的反應神經已經由生化神經突觸取代，讓你得到額外 2 點 敏捷。
[Your vision is greatly enhanced, giving you a +2 bonus to perception.] 你的視力得到大幅強化，讓你得到額外 2 點的感知。

[An amusing historical novel filled with detailed descriptions of surviving in the wild, potentially containing great insights for an experienced outdoorsman.] 一本充滿了在野外生存與有趣歷史故事的詳盡書籍，可能含有豐富的野外經驗知識。
[An amusing magazine about ham radio, with lots of diagrams and illustrations for making your own electronic devices.] 一個有趣的業餘無線電雜誌，內含大量的圖表和插圖，教你製作自己的電子設備。
[An annual publication about fencing and dueling.  There are many good illustrations which describe proper technique and form.] 一本關於擊劍以及對戰的年刊。裡面詳細了記載了許多有用的技巧及方法。
[An educational magazine for EMTs.] 一本提供給緊急醫療人員的教育性雜誌。

[An entry-level textbook about computers.] 一本入門級的電腦課本。
[An exciting monthly magazine about boxing.  There are lots of large, colorful photos of pugilistic exploits.] 一本血脈僨張的拳擊月刊。裡面刊載了相當大量關於拳擊手戰果的相片。
[An exciting seventeenth century tale of how an enslaved Irish doctor and his comrades-in-chains escape and become heroic pirates of the Robin Hood variety.] 一個刺激的十七世紀故事，講述一個被奴役的愛爾蘭醫生與他的同志如何逃脫，並成為了羅賓漢型的英雄海盜。
[An extensive volume that details numerous methods of trapping game.] 一本充滿詳盡內容的書，內容說明了各種製作陷阱的方法。
[An in-depth book about trapping game animals, covering methods both modern and ancient.] 一本深入教導誘捕動物的書籍，包含了古今中外的各種方法。
[An in-depth look at various styles of close quarters fighting.  There's an amusing essay about dirty tricks in the front section.] 一本讓你深入了解各種不同風格近身格鬥的月刊。開頭有一部分關於耍賤招的有趣文章。
[An in-depth magazine about submachine guns and shooting.  There is an exhaustive article about close quarter combat techniques in the front.] 一本深入介紹關於衝鋒槍射擊的雜誌。在前面有一篇關於近距離作戰技術的詳盡文章。
[An in-depth magazine about trapping game.  There are lots of articles and diagrams that explain simple trap designs.] 一本深度的陷阱比賽雜誌。有很多的文章和圖表，講解簡單的陷阱設計。
[An in-depth magazine all about shotguns and shooting.  There is an informative article about proper shooting stance in the back pages.] 一本深入探討散彈槍與射擊的書籍。後面有篇關於射擊站姿的知識性文章。
[An incredibly detailed guide to modern rockets, mortars, grenade launchers, and recoilless weaponry.  Lavishly illustrated with color photographs, it contains a wealth of information.] 一個令人難以置信的詳細指南，內容有關於現代火箭、迫擊砲、榴彈發射器、和無後坐力武器。內含珍貴插圖與彩色照片，並有許多豐富的資訊。
[An informative guide to self-defense using clubs and batons.  Aimed at the law enforcement and military market, it is packed with time tested, no-nonsense information and written to be understandable for beginners.] 教導使用棍棒與甩棍自衛的知識性書籍。主要是針對執法人員與軍事用途，內容充滿實用性，經過時間考驗，並且內容也很適合初學者閱讀。

[This Doubletech Industries binder has several intimidating security warnings on the cover.  Probably because it contains complete design specs, technical drawings, and test results for their military-grade bionic implants.] 這個 Doubletech 工業技術性文件的封面有許多嚇人的安全警告。也許是因為內容有完整的設計規格，技術圖面，以及軍用級生化插件的測試結果。
[This Rivtech binder warns that "Unauthorized readers are our best test subjects." With good reason: it contains complete design specs and technical drawings for their entire line of products.] 這本 Rivtech 有著警告標語，"未經授權的讀者是我們最好的測試對象"。因為: "包含了整個無殼槍械生產線的完整設計規格與技術圖面"。你也許能夠破除他們壟斷的市場來大賺一筆!
[This annual publication covers the various ways in which people use technology to improve their bodies.  There are a few in-depth and thoroughly illustrated articles on bionic systems, though they tend to use too much jargon.] 本年刊涵蓋了各種方法，使人們使用技術來增進自己的身體。有幾個深入說明生化插件系統的文章，但使用了過多的專業術語。
[This binder details the scheduled maintenance for several plumbing systems throughout the facility.] 這個文件詳細記錄了貫穿各設施的管道系統的維護狀況。
[This binder details the scheduled maintenance for several plumbing systems throughout the facility.  However, some of the log sheets seem to be filled with...a chemical formula?] 這個文件詳細記錄了貫穿各設施的管道系統的維護狀況。然而，一些記錄表中似乎充滿了...化學式?
[This binder of highly technical papers describes some new chemical formula, and its effects on human subjects.  It's stamped "APPROVED"....] 描述一些新的化學配方的高科技技術報告，及其對人類受試者的影響。它蓋了“批准”的章....
[This book claims to address every problem the shotgunner is likely to face, and offers solutions to ensure that shooters can make every shot count.] 這本書聲稱能解決散彈槍用家會面臨的每個問題，能夠讓每一發子彈發揮最大效用。
[This book is about creating replicas of the weapons used by the Norse Gods, such as the well-known Mjölnir.  It is well illustrated with lots of pictures.] 
[This book is the canonical text of Scientology.  Written by a science fiction author, it contains self-improvement techniques and musings on psychology called Dianetics.] 這本書是山達基教的經典。它是由一個科幻小說家撰寫，這種自我幫助系統和心理冥想被稱為戴尼提。
[This concise guide details the proper care and operation of most forms of machine pistols and submachine guns currently used by regular armed and reserve forces as well as several obsolete weapons.] 這本簡明指南詳細介紹了大多數目前服役中的正規武裝部隊武器以及一些過時的武器，以及自動手槍和衝鋒槍適當的保養和操作。

[This damaged team logbook lacks (deliberately?) any identifying information, but still contains useful information on several types of mutagen and their development.] 該損壞的團隊日誌缺少(故意?)任何識別訊息，但是仍然包含了有用的資訊，關於多種類型的突變劑與發展。
[This file details illegal gun modifications. Maybe you could learn something. At least you don't have to worry abut the cops anymore.] 這份文件詳細介紹了非法改造槍械的方式。你可以從中學到些改造槍支的技巧，而且現在你完全不用擔心有警察來找你麻煩。
[This hefty binder contains a multitude of diagrams and technical specifications for various electronic materials.  Some of the diagrams use symbols you've not seen before...] 這沉重的文件含有大量的圖表和各種電子材料的技術規範。有些圖運用了你從來沒看過的符號..
[This hefty book is dedicated to craftsfolk and outdoors-y types looking to make their own bows.  It recommends its companion volume "The Fletcher's Friend" for instructions on producing their ammunition.] 這本厚重的書是寫給需要自行手工製作弓的人。書裡面提到建議購入另一本相關書 "箭箭好朋友" 來製作箭矢。
[This hefty book is devoted to folks looking to handcraft their own arrows.  It starts with a hip and snappy disclaimer about the risks, both physical and legal, of using explosives and flammable materials.  Look for its companion, "The Bowyer's Buddy"!] 這本書是寫給需要自行手工製作箭矢的人。開頭使用了活潑生動的手法來聲明風險，包含了使用爆炸與易燃物質在物理與法律上的危險性。還有另一本相關書，"弓弓好朋友"！
[This hefty paperback book contains all the information needed for novice archers to get started hunting with a variety of bows and crossbows.] 這個沉重的平裝書包含新手利用弓和弩進行狩獵所需要的資訊。
[This hefty volume contains the addresses and telephone numbers of individuals, businesses, and utilities in the nearby area, pretty useless during the apocalypse and all.] 一本厚重的書含有附近所有企業和個人的電話號碼，末日災情爆發後就變成了一疊廢紙。
[This humongous volume contains a vast collection of short stories by different authors, spanning a wide variety of topics and genres.] 網羅了世界各地由不同作者創作的短篇故事，大量收集橫跨各種各樣的主題和題材。
[This in-depth and technical text covers the design, development, dissemination of, and defenses against various chemical weapons throughout the centuries.  The photographs the author chose make it a difficult read at times, though the information is top-notch.] 這本專業讀物深入淺出地講述了從古至今的化學武器歷史。即使包含了一流的資訊，但是作者照片的攝影技術是三流的。
[This in-depth and technical text details the history of firefighting from ancient times into the modern era, with a focus on the technology used to save lives.] 這本專業讀物深入淺出地講述了從古至今的消防歷史，以救死扶傷技術的革新為敘述核心。
[This in-depth and technical text details various forms of ancient European armor crafting, and is well illustrated with lots of photos.] 以深度文章與技術角度，介紹古老的歐洲裝甲製作技術，佐以鉅細靡遺的大量圖片。

[This in-depth and technical text details various forms of ancient Japanese sword smithing, and is well illustrated with step by step photo instructions.] 以深度文章與技術角度，介紹古老的日本武器鑄造技術，佐以鉅細靡遺的圖片與精彩解說。
[This internal manual details several varieties of mutagenic experiments, as well as describing the protocols used to concentrate mutagens for quicker results.  The authors recommend that researchers ensure that their subjects are well-fed and in good  health, as the concentrated serums draw heavily on subjects' bodies.] 這本內部手冊詳細介紹了幾個品種的突變實驗，以及讓突變劑能更快發揮作用的方法。作者建議研究者要確保測試對象是吃飽並且健康，才能大量使用集中血清在測試對象的身體。
[This introspective volume covers proper usage of handguns, from safety and stance, to maintenance and proper sighting technique.] 這本書涵蓋了手槍正確使用的方法，內容包括安全操作與站姿、保養和正確的瞄準技巧。
[This is a full-size glossy men's magazine.  There's a brief article about hiking and a list of simple wilderness survival tips somewhere in between the photos of bikini-clad women and the gadget advertisements.] 這是全方位的男性雜誌。有關於健行與野外生存的一些要訣的文章，另外還有一些泳裝美女的圖片和工具廣告。
[This is a full-size glossy women's magazine.  There are a few simple patterns and basic sewing tips somewhere in between the fashion photos and the makeup advertisements.] 這是全方位的女性雜誌。有一些簡單的縫紉要訣，與一些時裝圖片與化妝品廣告。
[This is a full-size glossy women's magazine.  There are a few unoriginal recipes and some simple cooking tips somewhere in between the fashion photos and the sex advice columns.] 這是全方位的女性雜誌。有一些非原創的食譜與簡單的烹飪要訣，還有一些時裝圖片與性愛專欄。
[This massive antique book documents dances from all around the world in great detail.  A perceptive reader could learn a lot about defensive footwork from some of the war dances.] 這本厚重的書籍記錄了全世界的舞蹈細節。感知高的讀者能夠從裡面學到一些防守性的戰鬥步伐。
[This massive book contains a wealth of vital information for the novice archer.] 一本巨大的書包含了大量對於弓箭初學者的重要資訊。
[This paper notebook is mostly full of boring logs, experimental observations and notes.  Mixed in, however, are musings on how to use the lab's vapor deposition machine to deposit amorphous carbon in a diamond-like form onto common metals.  The author's intended goal was a better non-stick frying pan, but you can think of a couple of better uses for it.] 這個紙本筆記簿寫滿了無趣的紀錄，實驗的觀察和註記。同時混雜了如何利用試驗室的汽相沉積裝置來製作大鑽石的迷思。
[This pocket-sized leather-bound guide to firearm safety combines a wealth of concise information with simple to follow instructions and easy to read illustrations.] 這個袖珍皮革裝訂的槍械安全指南結合了豐富的資訊，並且使用簡單的步驟搭配易於閱讀的插圖來說明。
[This pocket-sized leather-bound guide to first aid combines a wealth of concise information with simple to follow instructions and easy to read illustrations.] 這是一本口袋大小的皮革封面的急救指南，有著簡單的步驟指示以及易讀的插圖。
[This pocket-sized leather-bound survival guide combines a wealth of concise information with simple to follow instructions and easy to read illustrations.] 這個袖珍皮革裝訂的生存指南結合了豐富的資訊，並且使用簡單的步驟搭配易於閱讀的插圖來說明。
[This sheaf of papers (dated the day you left the shelter!) is a highly speculative proposal for focusing "PE065".  Scribbled notes throughout seem to think that it might work, but that there's no time.] 這捆紙上 (記錄的時間剛好是你離開避難所的日子！)  是一個高度投機性的提案"PE065"。上面寫滿潦草的筆記，認為似乎會奏效，但沒有時間。
[This sheaf of papers-dated the day before you evacuated-describes a new chemical formula in detail and supplies instructions for its use as some sort of ...crowd-control catalyst?  That can't be right...] 這疊紙上印的日期是你撤離的前一日，詳細介紹了一種新的化學配方，並附上說明了其作為某種...人群控制催化劑的用途？這不是真的吧...
[This sheaf of papers-dated two weeks before all this started-describes some new chemical formula, and its effects on human subjects.  It's stamped "APPROVED"...] 這疊紙上印的日期是兩週之前，講述了一些新的化學配方，及其對人類受試者的影響。已被蓋上“批准”的章...
[This somewhat technical binder has several intimidating security warnings on the cover, yet guarantees unauthorized readers "permanent employment, for life".  It contains useful information on "basic" chemical projects like methamphetamine and heroin, along with briefing on things called "XE037" and "PE012".] 這個技術性文件的封面有許多嚇人的安全警告，恐嚇未授權的讀者 "終身永久勞務"。內容包含了有用的"基礎"化學項目，例如甲基安非他命與海洛因，隨著簡報的東西還有"XE037"和"PE012"。
[This team logbook details several varieties of mutagenic experiments, focusing on those derived from flesh contaminated with XE037.  The results look promising but the procurement methods seem awfully vague...] 該團隊日誌詳述了幾個品種的突變實驗，著眼於感染 XE037 之肉體的衍生。結果看起來很前途，但是採購方式卻很模糊...
[This team logbook details several varieties of mutagenic experiments, focusing on those derived from various Earth fauna.  The team seems quite enthusiastic--if not eager--about their results.] 該團隊日誌詳述了幾個品種的突變實驗，著眼於從各種地球動物群的衍生。這團隊似乎相當熱心 - 假如不是為了 - 取得結果。

[A very flavorful beer that has been aged in bourbon barrels.  It is as black as midnight on a moonless night and has the viscosity of oil.  While very tasty, it also has an alcohol content on the level with wine.] 一種已經在橡木桶中好一段時間的可口啤酒。宛如無月的午夜一般黑暗並且像油一樣的黏稠。雖然非常可口，但是酒精含量像是葡萄酒一樣高。
[A very flavorful microbrewed beer.  Best served cold, in a glass - but you're not that lucky.] 非常可口的少量釀造啤酒。最好冰鎮後倒在玻璃杯 -但你沒那麼幸運。

[Dried salad packed in a box with mayonnaise and ketchup.  Add water to enjoy.] 
[Dried salad with water added, not very tasty but still a decent substitution for real salad.] 加水後的乾燥沙拉，不好吃，但仍然是一個像樣的替代品。

[Droplet shaped ant food.  It's like a thick balloon the size of a baseball, filled with sticky liquid.  Unlike bee honey, this has mostly a sour taste, probably because ants feed upon a variety of things.] 滴狀的螞蟻食物。它看起來像是棒球大小的氣球，裡面充滿著粘稠的液體。不像是蜂蜜，它嘗起來更多是一種酸味，可能是因為餵螞蟻所需的一種成分。
[Dry and salty, these crackers will leave you quite thirsty.] 乾又鹹，吃這些餅乾會讓你口渴。

[Dry flakes of flattened grain.  Tasty and nutritious when cooked, it also doubles as food for horses while dry.] 脫水後的乾扁穀類糧食。當煮熟時美味又營養，當乾燥時它也能兼作馬飼料。

[Unfermented homebrew beer.  A boiled and chilled mash of malted barley, spiced with some fine hops.] 未發酵的私釀啤酒。裡面有煮熟後冷卻的碎大麥，並加入香料和些許啤酒花。
[Unfermented moonshine.  Just some water, sugar and cornmeal, like good ol' aunt's recipe.  You better believe it tastes sour.] 未發酵的私釀烈酒。就是水、糖、玉米粉的混合物，就和老姑媽的配方一樣。你最好相信它是酸的。
[Unfermented pine wine.  A sticky mixture of water, sugar, yeast, and pine resins.] 未發酵的松脂酒。由水、糖、酵母、松樹樹脂混合而成的黏稠混合物。
[Unfermented rum.  Sugar caramel or molasses brewed into sweet water.  Basically a saccharine soup.] 未發酵的蘭姆酒。焦糖和糖蜜熬製成的甜水，基本上就是糖水。
[Unfermented spiced mead.  A golden, sweet mixture of honey, water, and hops for some added flavor.] 未發酵的香料蜜酒。金黃色的香甜混合物，裡面有蜂蜜、水、香料和一些添增風味的啤酒花。
[Unfermented vodka.  A clean, pure spirit.] 未發酵的伏特加。一種乾淨、純粹的烈酒。
[Unfermented whiskey.  The base of a fine drink.  Not the traditional preparation, but you don't have the time.] 未發酵的威士忌。美酒的基礎，儘管不是循正統方式製成，但是你沒有足夠時間。
[Unlike cola this is caffeine free, however it is still carbonated and has plenty of sugar.  Not to mention a lemon-lime taste.] 與可樂相比，這飲料不含咖啡因，然而還是加入了碳酸與大量糖。更別提檸檬酸橙的口味了。
[Unlike cola this is caffeine free, however it is still carbonated, sweet, and tastes vaguely orange-like.] 不像可樂，這飲料不含咖啡因，然而還是加入了碳酸與糖，以及隱約的橘子味。
[Usually consumed in the mornings, milk tea is common among many countries.] 奶茶在許多國家都是很常見的早餐飲料。
[V8] 
[Vegetable chunks pickled in a salt bath.  Goes well with burgers, if only you can find one.] 在鹽中醃製的蔬菜塊。搭配漢堡很適合，前提是你找的到漢堡。
[Vegetable stock.  Tasty and fairly nutritious.] 富含營養與美味的蔬菜高湯。
[Vegetable that looks poisonous.  You could eat it, but it will poison you.] 看起來就有毒的蔬菜。你能吃下，但是會讓你中毒。
[Very sour citrus.  Can be eaten if you really want.] 酸不溜丟的水果。你敢直接吃的話就吃吧。
[Water collected during an acid rainstorm.  Don't drink it.  Boiling it concentrates the acid.] 酸雨時收集的雨水，不能飲用，但可以藉由煮沸獲得濃酸。
[Water with salt added.  Not good for drinking.] 加了鹽的水。不適合飲用。
[Water with sugar or honey added.  Tastes okay.] 添加了糖或蜂蜜的水。味道也就還好。
[Water, the stuff of life, the best thirst-quencher available.] 水，生命之所需，最佳解渴靈藥。
[We do not exist at the moment. Clever little human, no doubt debugging to see this? We will not permit you to join us while we are modded out.] 
[Well-aged honey wine, spiced with a hint of hops.  Goes down bittersweet.] 陳年蜜酒，加入了少許啤酒花和香料。喝起來苦甜參半。
[What was once a wonderfully addictive tube of dried tobacco leaf is now just a smelly piece of trash.  What a tragedy!
The leftover tobacco in a few of these could probably be used to roll another cigarette.  If you're willing to go that far...] 曾經令人上癮的美妙菸草捲現在只剩下一小塊垃圾。何等的慘劇！
有足夠的這些東西剩餘菸草應該可以捲成一條新的煙。如果你想要這麼極端...
[When the cheese starts flowing, Kraft gets your noodle going.] 當乳酪開始融化時，美味的通心麵就出現了。
[Whole fresh eggs, dehydrated into an easy to store powder.] 整個新鮮雞蛋脫水成易於保存的粉末。
[Wild dandelion flowers that have been battered and deep fried.  Very tasty and nutritious.] 裹粉油炸後油炸的野生蒲公英花。非常營養可口。
[Wine that has been distilled to a higher proof.  Great as an after-dinner drink, but packs a punch.] 被蒸餾到高酒精的果酒。是非常好的餐後酒，不過後勁十足。
[Xanax] 
[You eat the pink tablet.] 你吃了搖頭丸。
[You shoot up.] 你開槍了
[You smoke your crack rocks.  Mother would be proud.] 你抽了你的快克。你老母會以你為榮。
[You take some aspirin.] 你服用一些阿斯匹林。
[You take some codeine.] 你服用了一些可待因。
[You take some oxycodone.] 你服用了一些可待因酮。
[You take some poppy painkiller.] 你服用了罌粟止痛藥。
[You take some tramadol.] 你服用了一些曲馬多。
[You use your sewer gas inhaler.] 你吸入了沼氣。
[Yuck!  You surely wouldn't want to eat this.  It's good for preserving meat and cooking, though.] 噁，你絕對不會想要直接吃這個的。但是用來保存肉類或烹飪時很好用。

[A 15-liter clay pot with three handles for carrying and for pouring.] 一個容量15公升的黏土罐，附有三個把手便於攜帶與使用。
[A 250 ml laboratory conical flask, with a rubber bung.] 一個 250ml 的實驗室錐形瓶，有個橡膠塞子。
[A 250 ml metal flask with a hinged screw-on lid, commonly used to discreetly transport alcohol.] 250ml 帶有一個鉸鏈螺絲蓋的金屬瓶，通常用來裝酒的。
[A bulky and heavy clay pot with a waterproofed hide lid, meant to store water, but can carry other liquids in a pinch.] 
[A bulky plastic jerrycan, meant to carry fuel, but can carry other liquids in a pinch.  It has a capacity of 10 liters.] 一個龐大的塑料油桶，主要用來裝燃料，但是也能用來裝其他液體。容量為10升。
[A clay bowl with a waterproofed hide lid.  Can be used as a container or as a tool.  Holds 250 ml of liquid.] 
[A clay container with a lid, used to hold and pour liquids.] 粘土製的附蓋容器，能用來盛裝液體。
[A fragile clay vessel.  It can be used to make crude impact grenades or to store liquid.] 一個易碎的黏土容器‧可以用來粗製衝擊手榴彈，或是裝一些液體

[A large and sturdy canvas sack.  Smells faintly of earth and hard work.] 一個龐大而堅固的帆布袋。依稀還能聞到泥土與辛勤的汗水味。
[A large container previously filled with some horrendously smelling liquid and now infested with an equally horrendously smelling unknown substance that seems to have permeated into the it.  Occasionally the container gives a shake, as if alive.]

Whosoever holds this hammer,
If he be worthy,
Shall possess the power to...
CRUSH!!'] 雷神索爾的錘子，以塌縮的恆星鍛造而成。上面有著題詞；
凡握此錘，
如可舉起，
應有能力，
化物為礫。

[A single sheet of newspaper broadsheet.  It is possibly one of the last issues printed before New England was overwhelmed.  Most of the information on there is terribly trivial, or out of date, but one thing catches your eye briefly.] 一頁對開報紙，它可能是新英格蘭崩潰前最後發行報紙的其中之一。報紙上充斥著微不足道或是過時的消息，但有其中一件短暫吸引了你的眼球。

[Assembled from a set of instructions you found in an old book of DIY projects, the *FOODCO kitchen buddy* claims to be *the perfect solution to all your home-cooking needs!*.  While it is surprisingly handy for vacuum-sealing as well as dehydrating food, the cheery sales pitch neglected to mention A - how awkward the damn thing is, B - That you still need a normal kitchen and C - how it doesn't take batteries.  You're going to have to weld it to a vehicle, or something else with a supply of electricity, if you want to use it.  In addition to the food preservation features, it also has a water-purification system, a drawer for holding extra tools, and for some insane reason, a press and die set for hand-loading ammunition.] 這段廣告摘自一本DIY的教學說明書，*福口廚房好友* 聲稱是*家庭烹飪需求的完美解決方案！*。能夠提供極其便利的真空封裝與食物脫水機能，但是它熱情的推銷詞並沒有提到: A-用這東西很尷尬，B-你依然需要一個廚房來烹調食物，C-怎麼可能不耗電。若是你想要用它，你必須將這東西裝在車輛上，或是其他能夠供電的東西。除了烹飪功能，它還有淨水系統以及能收納額外工具的抽屜，也因為一些瘋狂的因素，這東西居然還有能手工壓填子彈的工具。

[zweihänder] 
[.22 caliber conversion kit] 
[.223 caliber conversion kit] 
[.308 caliber conversion kit] 
[.45 caliber conversion kit] 
[4.6mm caliber conversion kit] 
[40mm pipe launcher] 
[5.45 caliber conversion kit] 
[5.7mm caliber conversion kit] 
[6.54 caliber conversion kit] 
[7.62 caliber conversion kit] 
[9mm caliber conversion kit] 
[A bag that hangs off the side of your gun and catches ejected casings so you don't have to pick them up.] 裝在退彈孔旁的袋子，可以蒐集開火後的彈殼，而不用一顆一顆撿。
[A bayonet is a stabbing weapon that can be attached to the front of a shotgun, submachinegun or rifle, allowing a melee attack to deal piercing damage.  The added length increases recoil slightly.] 刺刀是一種穿刺武器，能夠附掛在散彈槍，衝鋒槍，或是步槍上，可進行近戰攻擊來造成穿刺傷害。但增加槍身的整體長度，造成一些後座力影響。
[A conversion kit produced by FN Herstal, used to convert .22, 9mm, or .38 firearms to their proprietary 5.7x28mm, a round designed for accuracy and armor penetration.] FN Herstal 所販賣的模組，用來修改 .22、9mm 或 .38 口徑的武器，使它們可以使用 5.7x28mm 子彈，用來增加準確性與穿透力。
[A conversion kit produced by Heckler and Koch, used to convert .22, 9mm, or .38 firearms to their proprietary 4.6x30mm, a round designed for accuracy and armor penetration.] 德國 HK 公司所販賣的模組，用來修改 .22、9mm 或 .38 口徑的武器，使它們可以使用自家的 4.6x30mm 子彈，用來增加準確性與穿透力。
[A counterweight placed forward of the bow's grip allows for greater accuracy.  Aside from increased weight and size, there are no drawbacks.] 一個裝在弓握把前的秤錘，可使命中率提昇。除了增加重量跟體積外，沒有任何負面影響。
[A folding stock which reduces volume but needs unfolding before use.  Increases the time needed to wield the weapon.] 
[A grip placed forward on the barrel allows for greater control and accuracy.  Aside from increased weight, there are no drawbacks.] 握把可以增加槍枝的穩定度與準確性，缺點是會增加額外的重量。
[A kit to attach a pair of crossbow arms and a firing rail to the barrel of a long firearm.  It allows crossbow bolts to be fired.] 在長槍槍管上安裝十字弓臂與軌道的模組。能夠發射十字弓箭矢。
[A long ranged rifle scope used by civilians and military alike, increases weight but improves accuracy greatly.] 民間與軍用的長程狙擊鏡，大幅增加準確性與一點重量。
[A longer barrel increases the muzzle velocity of a firearm, contributing to both accuracy and damage.  However, the longer barrel tends to vibrate after firing, greatly increasing recoil.] 加長槍管可以增加子彈初速，使準確度與傷害提高，但是會增加後座力。
[A minimalist pump action shotgun, which can be mounted under the barrel of many rifles.  It allows a total of four shotgun shells to be loaded and fired.] 可以掛載於任一款步槍的散彈槍模組，一次能夠裝填 4 發子彈並射擊。
[A muzzle brake redirects exhaust gases to compensate for muzzle climb, improving recoil but increasing bulk, noise, and reducing accuracy slightly.] 砲口制退器重新定向排氣，減少砲口上揚和降低後坐力，但會增加散射、噪音，以及略為降低準確度。
[A pistol bayonet is a stabbing weapon that can be attached to the front of a handgun, allowing a melee attack to deal piercing damage.  The added length reduces the gun's overall handling somewhat.] 手槍刺刀是穿刺的武器，能夠附掛在手槍前緣，能夠在近戰攻擊中使出穿刺傷害。增加的長度會稍微降低少手槍的操控性。
[A ported barrel redirects exhaust gases to compensate for muzzle climb, improves recoil but increases noise and reduces accuracy slightly.] 將槍枝廢氣往上排除，抑制槍口上揚，降低後座力但增加噪音與減少準確性。
[A precision weighted trigger assembly that improves a firearm's accuracy.] 一個精準加重的扳機，裝上後能夠增進槍械命中率。
[A replacement stock designed to absorb perceived recoil.  Aside from increased mass, there are no drawbacks.] 一個用來更換用的槍托，設計用來吸收後座力。除了增加了重量，沒有什麼缺點。
[A set of ergonomic replacement furniture for a firearm, improves recoil and accuracy.  Aside from increased weight, there are no drawbacks.] 用於槍械的人體工學握把，降低後座力與增加準確度，但會增加點重量。
[A set of finely tuned internal components which increase the precision and reliably of a firearm.] 一套微調過的槍械內部組件，能增加其精度和可靠性。
[A set of lightweight composite grips and furniture that reduces a firearm's weight, and as a consequence, its melee damage as well.] 
[A set of seals and gaskets that will allow a firearm to operate reliably while submerged in water.] 一套防水膠布和墊圈，讓槍械在水中也能正常使用。
[A set of tritium aiming pins for a bow.  Improves ease of aiming and target acquisition with no drawbacks.] 一組弓箭用氚光瞄準具。能幫助瞄準及獲取目標，沒有任何缺點。
[A short shotgun with 2 barrels, which can be mounted under the barrel of many rifles.  It allows two shotgun shells to be loaded and fired.] 一個雙管散彈槍，能夠附掛在許多步槍的槍管下。一次能夠裝填 2 發子彈並射擊。
[A shortened barrel results in markedly reduced accuracy, and a minor increase in noise, but also reduces recoil greatly as a result of the improved manageability of the firearm.] 截短槍管會降低子彈初速，除了輕微增加噪音與操控性，也會降低後座力。
[A shoulder strap allows the rifle to be worn over your shoulders like a piece of clothing.  However, it offers no protection.] 
[A simple mechanism that converts a pistol to a fully-automatic weapon, with a burst size of three rounds.  However it reduces accuracy while increasing noise and recoil.] 讓手槍變成自動武器，可以一次發射三發。但是會降低準確性與增加噪音與後座力。
[A small extension above the grip which an arrow rests upon while being aimed.  Improves accuracy with no drawbacks.] 一個在握把上的小基座能夠把箭矢固定在上面進行瞄準。能增加命中率，沒有任何負面影響。
[A small scope intended for use on a handgun or submachine gun, increases weight but improves accuracy greatly.] 一個為手槍和衝鋒槍設計的小瞄準鏡，增加了重量，但極大地提升了精確度。
[A small visible-light laser that mounts on a firearm's accessory rail to enhance ease and speed of target acquisition.  Aside from increased weight, there are no drawbacks.] 掛載於槍管上的輔助軌的小型雷射瞄準器，能讓用家更快更易瞄準目標。除了增加槍械重量之外沒甚麼負面影響。
[A spare magazine you can keep on hand to make reloads faster, but must itself be reloaded before it can be used again.] 
[A suppressor reduces the amount of noise and muzzle flash generated by the report of a firearm.  Gunfire is extremely loud and can damage your hearing without protection; a suppressor will bring the loudness of a report down to generally safe levels.  A suppressor will slightly reduce recoil and muzzle velocity.] 
[A supressor designed to work with shotguns.  It's a lot more complex than a suppressor for a pistol or rifle.] 為散彈槍特別設計的滅音器。比手槍或步槍用滅音器複雜許多。
[A sword bayonet is a large slashing weapon that can be attached to the front of a shotgun or rifle, allowing a melee attack to deal cutting damage.  The added length increases recoil substantially.] 劍刺刀是大型的砍殺武器，能夠附掛在散彈槍或步槍的前端，並使用近戰攻擊來造成砍劈傷害。增加的長度會大幅提高武器的後座力。
[A visible-light laser that mounts under a firearm's barrel to enhance ease and speed of target acquisition.  Aside from increased bulk, there are no drawbacks.] 掛載於槍管下的雷射瞄準器，能讓用家更快更易瞄準目標。除了增加槍械體積之外沒甚麼負面影響。
[Adds a red dot optic to the top of your gun, replacing the iron sights.  Increases accuracy and weight.] 增加內紅點光學瞄準鏡到你的槍上，並置換掉原有的覘孔。增加命中率與重量。
[An add on stock for handguns, improves recoil and accuracy.  Aside from increased weight, there are no drawbacks.] 在手槍上增加托把，改善後座力與準確度。除了增加重量之外沒有任何負面影響。
[An adjustable replacement stock, improves recoil and accuracy.  Aside from increased weight, there are no drawbacks.] 將槍柄一小區域修改成可浮動，增加準確性與降低後座力，但會增加點重量。
[An advanced unit that straps onto the side of your firearm and reduces vibration, greatly reducing recoil and increasing accuracy.] 一個先進的裝置可以幫助你穩定槍身，大幅降低後座力與增加準確性。
[An improved blowback mechanism makes your firearm's automatic fire faster, at the cost of reduced accuracy and increased noise.] 可以幫助武器快速自動開火的裝置，但是會降低準確性與增加噪音。
[Bipods are commonly used on rifles and machine guns to provide a forward rest and reduce motion.  Aside from increased weight, there are no drawbacks.] 兩腳架通常用於步槍與機槍，用來減少槍管的晃動。除了增加一些重量，並沒有其他缺點。
[Completely doubles the ammunition capacity of your firearm, but the added bulk reduces accuracy and increases recoil.] 增加你的槍械彈藥容量為兩倍，但增加的體積會讓準確度下降同時讓後座力上升。
[E.M.A.S.] 
[ElectroMagnetic Acceleration System is an array of electromagnets attached to the front of the barrel, accelerating any projectile fired to even higher velocities, increasing damage, recoil and reducing accuracy. It does however drain UPS charges when firing and due to extensive modifications the gun can no longer operate without a UPS.] 
[Flaregun conversion kit] 
[Improves the weapon's iron sights, increasing accuracy.  No drawbacks.] 改良過的武器覘孔，增加命中率。沒有負面影響。
[Increases the ammunition capacity of your firearm by 50%, but the added bulk reduces accuracy slightly.] 增加武器彈藥容積50%，但是會造成準確性下降。
[KSG second magazine] 
[LeMat revolver shotgun] 
[M203] 
[M320 GLM] 
[Mechanism that allows your CW-24 rifle to fire in fully automatic mode. It is handmade.] 此改裝套件讓你的CW-24步槍以全自動射擊模式射擊。它是自製的。
[RM121 aux shotgun] 
[Replacing several key parts flaregun to convert it to a .40 firearm.  The conversion results in reduced accuracy and increased recoil.] 
[Replacing several key parts of a .38, .40, .44 or .45 firearm converts it to a 9mm firearm.  The conversion results in a slight reduction to accuracy.] 將 .38、.40、.44 或 .45 口徑的槍隻修改成使用 9mm 子彈，會導致準確度輕微下降。
[Replacing several key parts of a 9mm, .38, .40 or .44 firearm converts it to a .45 firearm.  The conversion results in reduced accuracy and increased recoil.] 魔改某些9mm, 0.38, 0.40 或 0.44口徑的武器，讓它們可以使用0.45口徑的子彈。這些修改將會降低武器的準確度以及增加後座力。
[Replacing several key parts of a 9mm, .38, .40, 5.7mm, 4.6mm, 7.62mm or .223 firearm converts it to a .22 firearm.  The conversion results in a slight reduction to accuracy.] 將 9mm、.38、.40、5.7mm、4.6mm、7.62mm 或 .223 口徑的槍隻修改成使用 .22mm 子彈，會導致準確度輕微下降。
[Rifling a shotgun barrel is mainly done in order to improve its accuracy when firing slugs.  The rifling makes the gun less suitable for shot, however.] 散彈槍槍管上的膛線令發射重彈頭時更準確，但卻降低了實用性。
[Testmod for UPS drain on mods, this should never spawn, if you see this, it's a bug. 50 UPS drain.] 
[The M203 was originally designed for use with M16 variants but today can be attached to almost any rifle.  It allows a single 40mm grenade to be loaded and fired.] M203 榴彈發射器原是為了附掛在 M16 突擊步槍而打造，但現在可以與任何一款步槍搭配，它可以發射 40mm 榴彈，但發射後需立刻裝填。
[The M320 Grenade Launcher Module offers the functionality of larger launchers in a very small package at the cost of decreased accuracy.  It can be either attached to a rifle or combined with a buttstock for stand alone use.] M320 榴彈發射器模組，提供以小組件發射較大型榴彈的功能，但會降低準確度。可以裝備在步槍上，也可以裝上槍托獨立使用。
[The Rivtech RM121 auxiliary weapon system is a magazine-fed semi-automatic caseless shotgun, which can be mounted under the barrel of many rifles.  It allows a total of five caseless shotgun rounds to be loaded and fired.] Rivtech RM121 附掛武器系統是一個彈匣供彈的半自動無殼散彈槍，能夠被掛載於許多步槍的槍管下。一次能夠裝填 5 發無殼散彈並射擊。
[This bayonet incorporates a layer of diamond-like carbon on its edges, increasing its lethality.] 這把刺刀在邊緣有著類鑽石塗層，增加了殺傷力。
[This custom-built miniature flamethrower is made to be attached to almost any sort of firearm, greatly expanding its lethality.] 這把手工打造的小型火焰噴射器能夠掛載於幾乎所有槍械上，大大增加殺傷力。
[This is a complete conversion kit, designed to turn a rifle into a deadly sniper rifle.  It decreases ammo capacity, and removes any automatic fire capabilities, but also increases accuracy and damage.] 該模組會將步槍轉成狙擊步槍，缺點包括降低彈夾容量，只有半自動模式。優點則為增加準確性與傷害。
[This is a complete conversion kit, designed to turn a rifle into a powerful battle rifle.  It reduces accuracy, and increases noise and recoil, but also increases damage, ammo capacity, and fire rate.] 該模組會將步槍修改成戰鬥步槍，缺點包括降低準確性，並增加噪音與後座力。優點則為增加傷害、彈夾容量與開火速率。
[This is a home built launcher tube that can be attached to almost any rifle.  It allows a single 40mm grenade to be loaded and fired.] 自製的榴彈發射器，可以裝在大多數的步槍上。能夠發射 40mm 榴彈，但發射後需立刻裝填。
[This kit is used to convert 5.45 rifle to the 6.54 caliber.  The conversion results in increased recoil.] 此套件可以將5.45口徑的步槍改為6.54口徑，將導致後座力的增加。
[This kit is used to convert 6.54 rifle to the 5.45 caliber.  The conversion results in slight reductions to recoil.] 此套件可以將6.54口徑的步槍改為5.45口徑，將輕微減少後座力。
[This kit is used to convert 6.54 rifle to the 7.62 caliber.  The conversion results in increased recoil.] 此套件可以將6.54口徑的步槍改為7.62口徑，將導致後座力的增加。
[This kit is used to convert a shotgun or 7.62mm, .223 or .30-06 rifle to the popular and powerful .308 caliber.  The conversion results in reduced ammo capacity and a slight reduction to accuracy.] 這個模組用來修改散彈槍或 7.62mm、.223 或 .30-06 步槍，使它們可以使用較為普遍且威力強大的 .308 口徑子彈。修改後會降低彈夾容量與輕微減少準確性。
[This kit is used to convert a shotgun or 7.62mm, .30-06, or .308 rifle to the popular, accurate, and lighter .223 caliber.  The conversion results in slight reductions to both accuracy and ammo capacity.] 這個模組用來修改散彈槍或 7.62mm、.30-06 或 .308 步槍，使它們可以使用較為普遍、準確且輕量的 .223 口徑子彈。修改後會輕微減少準確性與彈夾容量。
[This pistol bayonet incorporates a layer of diamond-like carbon on its edges, increasing its lethality.] 這把手槍刺刀在邊緣有著類鑽石塗層，增加了殺傷力。

[Used extensively by military forces, it increases accuracy and weight.  This is a step up from a red dot sight.] 廣為軍隊使用，增加準確性與重量，比內紅點瞄準鏡好。

[A HUGE medieval crossbow from Germany with a very slow, difficult reloading process not suited for unskilled users.  Its tension is so powerful that you feel it shake after firing.  Bolts fired from this weapon have a good chance of remaining intact for re-use.] 源自中世紀時期德國的巨型十字弓，缺乏經驗的使用者會發現要裝填它不但緩慢又困難。由於張力太大，發射後會產生搖晃。由此武器射出的十字弓箭矢多數可以重複使用。

The hypervelocity metal stake that it fires is accelerated to the point of spontaneous combustion by a Lorentz force generated by electromagnetic induction, powered by a standard UPS.] 用廢金屬手工打造的步槍，運用了電磁原理來拋射單發的鋼筋。其發射的超高速金屬棒實現了勞侖茲力定律，由標準 UPS 供電。

The powerful, and frankly dangerous, improvements made to the power systems of this weapon is capable imbueing a massive charge into a single-rail; so much that it often shatters into deadly fragments on impact.  It's capabilities are limited by its prodigious power requirements however.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.] 
[A single-shot, electrically propelled, steel rail launcher.  The powerful, and frankly dangerous, improvements made to the power systems of this weapon is capable imbuing a massive charge into a single-rail; so much that it often shatters into deadly fragments on impact.  It's capabilities are limited by its prodigious power requirements however, and its large size necessitates a specially made turret mount be installed first.] 
[A six-barrel hand-cranked automatic shotgun made from bicycle parts.  Though a bit unwieldy, it is exceedingly powerful for such a simple machine.] 一把用腳踏車零件製程的六管自動霰彈槍，儘管有一點不好掌握，但對於一個簡單的機械來說，它擁有強大的破壞力。
[A six-foot wooden bow that takes a fair amount of strength to draw and can be used effectively by above-average archers.  Arrows fired from this weapon have a good chance of remaining intact for re-use.] 這把與身等高的木製長弓需要相當大的力氣才能拉開，可以被訓練有素的弓箭手使用。從這把弓射出的箭矢有一定的機率可以回收使用。
[A slow-loading hand weapon that launches bolts.  Stronger people can reload it much faster.  Bolts fired from this weapon have a good chance of remaining intact for re-use.] 一具裝填緩慢的十字弓。夠強壯的人能以更快的速度重新裝填。由此武器射出的十字弓箭矢多數可以重複使用。
[A small concealable pistol-like crossbow.  It's weak due to it's small size and draw, so it is best suited for hunting small game.  Bolts fired from this weapon have a good chance of remaining intact for re-use.] 一把可以藏在袖中的迷你手弩。由於尺寸的限制，傷害並不高，適合用於小型的狩獵遊戲。從這把弩射出的箭矢有一定的機率可以回收使用。

The Lookout, released in 2032, takes advantage of the smaller 9mm to hold a seventh round, without sacrificing the ease of handling or reloading the Enforcer made legendary.] 在執法者系列熱賣之後，Leadworks LLC 重新修改了原有的自動左輪設計來迎合市場，於2032年推出了監察者系列，利用9mm子彈體積較小的優勢保有7發裝的填彈數並保有執法者系列優異的填裝與上膛速度。

It achieved overnight stardom when it appeared in "Treasure Trail", a popular space-Western series running from 2030 through 2037.] 一把"自動"左輪手槍，Leadworks LLC 對六發裝的左輪手槍做出了改良，具有半自動手槍自動上膛特性與優化過的填裝方法，大幅度地省時省力。這把槍的出現就像劃破天際的流星，風靡整個市場，並帶動了2030至2037系列的發展。

[Designed near the end of World War I, the BAR provided fire support for the US Army from World War II all the way to the Vietnam War.  Too much firepower to serve as a battle rifle, but not enough to be an ideal light machine gun, it still found a niche on the battlefield.] 
[Designed to replace the M4A1, the Heckler and Koch 416A5 features most of the former's strengths, while being considerably more durable.] 本槍被設計用來取代M4A1步槍以及黑克勒&科赫公司生產的416A5步槍，它與M4A1步槍相似，但是更加的耐用。

[Designed to work with H&K's proprietary 4.6x30mm round, the UCP is a small pistol with a very high capacity, best used against armored opponents.] 設計用來擊發H&K公司專用4.6x30mm口徑子彈，這把小手槍有著極高的容量，能夠對抗有護具的對手。
[Despite the name, this is a huge automatic weapon meant to be mounted on vehicles; it's only miniature compared to a cannon. It has six barrels that rotate to keep from overheating. It holds up to five hundred rounds of belted rifle ammo, and requires a UPS to power its electric motor.] 
[Developed as a successor to the MP5 submachine gun, the UMP45 retains the earlier model's supreme accuracy and low recoil, but in the higher .45 caliber.] 鑑於 MP5 這槍型的成功，UMP45保留了之前型號的優點與低後座力，並加大了口徑達到 .45 的口徑。
[Developed by Heckler & Koch in 2033, the railgun magnetically propels a ferromagnetic projectile using an alternating current.  This makes it silent while still deadly.  Powered by UPS.] 在 2033 年由 Heckler & Koch 公司開發的軌道槍，利用電磁原理加速子彈。讓其既安靜又致命。需要 UPS 供電。
[Developed by Leadworks as a companion sidearm to the L523 modular system, this massive autorevolver fires the powerful .223 round, but suffers high recoil as a result.  It has a weighted barrel to make recoil more manageable and a 5-chamber cylinder.] 
[Developed by the Soviets in 1945, this rifle was quickly replaced by the full-auto AK47.  However, due to its superb accuracy and low recoil, this gun maintains immense popularity.] 於 1945 年由蘇聯所發展，這把步槍出來沒多久就很快地被全自動的 AK47 替換了。然而，其超群的準確率與低後座力，讓這把槍仍然有著高人氣。

[Essentially an upsized shotgun, this explosive hazard will practically vaporize anything it's set against.  However, the limited range will also put its user at extreme risk if not managed correctly.  You'll need some form of platform to mount this behemoth on.]

However, the limited range will also put its user at extreme risk if not managed correctly; but that's why you added a targeting system isn't it?.  You'll need some form of platform to mount this behemoth on.] 
[Essentially several long drawstrings held by two long, reinforced rails and an automated mechanism attached to aim, draw, and fire it.  It's deceptively powerful and surprisingly accurate, but far too large to be used without some sort of stable platform.]

[Intended to function as a long-range sharpshooter support weapon for the military, the Rivtech RM11B scout rifle was designed for durability and accuracy under less than ideal circumstances.  Its two round burst mode allows it to deliver precise long-range takedowns, utilizing the proprietary Rivtech 8mm caseless round.] Rivtech公司製造的Rm11B嚮導步槍(scout rifle)被設計給軍隊的長距離射手使用，在艱困的環境下使用仍然耐用、精準。他使用 Rivtech公司生產的8mm無彈殼子彈，搭配本槍特有的「連發2次」射擊模式，可以讓使用者從遠距離精準的擊倒敵人。
