[Leadworks LLC's bullpup L523 platform utilizes the ubiquitous 5.56 round in multiple applications, and is designed to part-swap quickly, safely, and effectively from one to the next.  The base mechanism could--theoretically--be used on its own, but such use is inadvisable and will void your warranty.  There's no real place to incorporate aftermarket modifications on this barren proto-weapon.] Leadworks LLC公司的後置彈夾步槍，使用常見的5.56mm的子彈。「理論上」，它被設計能讓你快速、安全、有效率的用其他同型槍枝的零件替換損壞的零件，但不建議你這樣做，而且這樣會讓你的槍失去保固。
[Leadworks LLC's bullpup L523 platform utilizes the ubiquitous 5.56 round in multiple applications, and is designed to part-swap quickly, safely, and effectively from one to the next.  The battle rifle's (proprietary) combination optic & red-dot sights provide quick and accurate targeting, with a foregrip available for greater control.  Like the rest of the family, though, it doesn't accept third-party modifications.] Leadworks LLC公司的後置彈夾戰鬥型步槍，使用常見的5.56mm的子彈。「理論上」，它被設計能讓你快速、安全、有效率的用其他同型槍枝的零件替換損壞的零件。本步槍特有的「光學紅點瞄準鏡」讓使用者能快速精準的瞄準目標，也加裝了前置把手讓你更好操控。但就像L523家族的其他步槍一樣，公司不承認來自第三人的改裝（會讓你失去保固）。
[Leadworks LLC's bullpup L523 platform utilizes the ubiquitous 5.56 round in multiple applications, and is designed to part-swap quickly, safely, and effectively from one to the next.  The carbine model incorporates Leadworks' proprietary gyro-stabilization technology and includes an integral laser sight, but like the rest of the family, doesn't accept third-party modifications.] Leadworks LLC公司的後置彈夾步槍卡賓槍版本，使用常見的5.56mm的子彈。「理論上」，它被設計能讓你快速、安全、有效率的用其他同型槍枝的零件替換損壞的零件。本步槍的卡賓槍版本包含了Leadwork公司獨家的動態穩定科技、內紅點雷射瞄準器。但就像L523家族的其他步槍一樣，公司不承認來自第三人的改裝（會讓你失去保固）。
[Leadworks LLC's bullpup L523 platform utilizes the ubiquitous 5.56 round in multiple applications, and is designed to part-swap quickly, safely, and effectively from one to the next.  The designated-shootist rifle incorporates a specially-designed extended barrel with integral bipod and foregrip, along with an integral 8x optic, and trades selective-fire for the Leadworks gyro-stabilization system.  Like the rest of the family, though, it doesn't accept third-party modifications.] 由Leadworks LLC公司所製作，使用5.56mm子彈的L523狙擊槍，被設計能快速、安全、有效率的與其他同型步槍替換零件。這把為神射手設計的狙擊步槍搭配有加長的槍管、8倍光學瞄準鏡與前置把手、Leadworks公司獨家的動態穩定系統，還可以切換射擊模式為單發/連射。但是就像L523家族的步槍一樣，本步槍不容許第三人（公司以外）的改裝，否則你會失去保固。
[Leadworks LLC's bullpup L523 platform utilizes the ubiquitous 5.56 round in multiple applications, and is designed to part-swap quickly, safely, and effectively from one to the next.  The rather ambitious light machine gun variant incorporates a heavy-duty barrel & foregrip, the Leadworks gyro system, and a redesigned drum magazine capable of serving up 100 rounds per reload.  Unfortunately this rules out third-party magazines, as well as more usual modifications.] 由Leadworks LLC公司所製作，使用5.56mm子彈的L523輕型機槍版本，被設計能快速、安全、有效率的與其他同型步槍替換零件。這把野心頗大的輕機槍搭配了重型槍管、前把手、Leadworks獨家的動態穩定系統，另外還可以改裝使用容量高達100發的彈鼓供彈。但很不幸的，使用彈鼓的話，你一樣會失去保固。
[Leadworks LLC's sole shotgun offering to date has surprisingly good reach, thanks to its moving barrel and forward-back pump mechanism.] Leadworks LLC的單管霰彈槍至今仍然提供良好的表現，這都要感謝那滑動式槍管與復返式唧筒的機構設計。

[Numbered to bridge the gap between the USian Frontier and modern Civil Defense needs, the Long Ranger was designed to give Enforcer users (or anyone using .45 caliber cartridges) a little extra reach while using the same ammunition.  Synthetic furniture cost it some charm points from the legendary Winchester rifles it was based upon, but users agree that the forty-five's punch with the reach of a rifle is worth it.] 為了滿足美式拓荒者與現代城市防禦之間的武器落差鴻溝，遊騎兵長槍因而誕生，給予執法者(或任何使用.45 口徑彈藥的人)一些較遠射程的選擇。雖然改造部件犧牲了部份繼承於溫徹撕特來福槍這把傳奇武器迷人的特性，但多數使用者同意如此長的射程配上.45口徑的威力，這樣的犧牲是值得的。
[One of the most famous handguns of the 20th century.  Your name is not Bond, but you might find this little gun still useful.] 它是 20 世紀最有名的手槍之一。你不叫龐德，但你可能會發現這個小手槍還是有用的。
[One of the most popular shotguns on the market, the Remington 870 is used by hunters and law enforcement agencies alike thanks to its high accuracy and muzzle velocity.] 市場上的其中一把有名的散彈槍，因其高命中率以及高射速，雷明登870散彈槍常用於狩獵以及執法部門中。
[One of the most powerful handguns in the world when it was released in 1979, the Redhawk offers very sturdy construction, with an appearance that is reminiscent of "Wild West" revolvers.] 自1979年便開始出現的其中一把強大的手槍，這把紅鷹有著非常堅固的構造，外型讓人聯想到西部時代的左輪槍。
[One of the most recognizable assault rifles ever made, the AK-47 is renowned for its durability even under the worst conditions.] 世界名槍之一，AK-47步槍以其耐用性而聞名，即使在最糟的環境下也能正常使用。
[One of the most recognizable handguns due to its popularity in movies, the "Deagle" is better known for its menacing appearance than its performance.  It's highly inaccurate, but its heavy weight reduces recoil.] 一把高辨識度的強大手槍，常見於電影之中。其外型雖然威猛但是卻很不準，還好其重量能抵消後座力。
[Originally designed during the Cold War, the FN FAL is probably the most successful battle rifle ever designed.  Even though often labeled as obsolete, its high rate of fire and powerful ammunition make it perfectly capable of holding its ground against modern competitors.] FN FAL自動步槍設計於冷戰時期，可能是有史以來最佳的戰鬥步槍。儘管它常常被認為已經過時，但它的高發射速率以及使用強力彈藥等優點，讓他在現代戰爭中仍佔有一席之地。
[Originally marketed as a lightweight and compact alternative to older SIG handguns, the Pro .40 is popular among European police forces.] 最主要是銷售給輕武裝人員用來接替舊式的 SIG手槍，這把Pro .40在歐洲警力中很受歡迎。

[The 5-shot Smith and Wesson 500 revolver fires the comparably-named .500 S&W Magnum.  It's an impressive weapon.] Smith & Wesson 公司的 500 是一把 5 發裝左輪，能夠發射強大的 .500 S&W 麥格農子彈。它是個威力大的武器。
[The American-180 is a submachine gun developed in the 1960's that fires .22 LR, unusual for an SMG.  Though the round is low-powered, the high rate of fire and large magazine makes the 180 a formidable weapon.] American-180 是一把從 1960 年代就研發的衝鋒槍，不像一般的衝鋒槍，這把槍適用於 .22 LR 子彈。雖然子彈較為無威力，但是高容量的彈匣加上高連發速度讓這把槍成為厲害的武器。
[The Beretta ARX-160 was a Phase II contender in the United States Army Individual Carbine competition to replace the M4 carbine.  It failed to replace it, but it is widely used by military all around the world.  This version is chambered for 7.62x39mm.] 貝瑞塔 ARX-160 突擊步槍曾經參與美國軍隊發出的一項名為個人卡賓槍計劃第二階段的競標中，以取代 M4 卡賓槍。最後並沒有取代，但它在軍事上被廣泛用於世界各地。這把槍的口徑為 7.62x39mm。
[The COP 38 is a four-shot derringer-type pistol chambered for the .38 round.  It was designed by Robert Hillberg, based on his earlier work on the Hillberg Insurgency Weapon.] COP .38 德林加手槍是一把四管大口徑短筒手槍，口徑為 .38。它是由羅伯特希爾貝里以他更早期工作時設計的希爾貝里叛亂武器樣槍為藍本所設計的。
[The Calico M960 is an automatic carbine with a unique circular magazine that allows for high capacities and reduced recoil.] 卡利科M960是一把有著弧狀彈匣的全自動卡賓槍，有大容量的彈匣以及較低的後座力。
[The Clearwater Arms version of the famous SVD-63 Dragunov.  This one was rechambered for the .308 round.] 
[The Colt Army Model 1860 is a cap & ball .44-caliber revolver.  It was used during the American Civil War, and made by Colt's Manufacturing Company.] 柯爾特 M1860 陸軍制式手槍是一把 .44 口徑的左輪手槍。由柯爾特製造公司所研製。它被使用於美國南北戰爭期間。
[The Colt Model 1861 Navy cap & ball .36-caliber revolver was a six-shot, single-action percussion weapon produced by Colt's Manufacturing Company from 1861 until 1873.] 柯爾特M1861海軍制式手槍是一把.36 口徑的單動式左輪手槍，可裝彈6 發。由塞繆爾·柯爾特所研製。該槍一直持續生產至1873年。
[The Heckler & Koch MP5 is one of the most widely-used submachine guns in the world, and has been adopted by special police forces and militaries alike.  Its high degree of accuracy and low recoil are universally praised.] Heckler & Koch 公司的 MP5 是一把在世界各地廣泛運用的衝鋒槍，並且配給了各種特種警察部隊和軍隊。其高準確性與低後座力普遍受到好評。
[The Heckler & Koch MP5 is one of the most widely-used submachine guns in the world, and has been adopted by special police forces and militaries alike.  This one has been modified with an integrated m203 allowing you to survive the end of days.] 
[The LACP laser pistol was based on the v29 laser pistol designed in the mid-21st century.  While little more than duct tape and electronics, it runs on a standard UPS.] LACP 雷射手槍是以 21 世紀中葉的 V29 雷射手槍為基礎而設計的，又加了一些大力膠帶跟電子零件的構造，使用標準 UPS 供電。
[The Lightning Trail carbine was developed for the riot police to quickly blanket an area with lightning clouds.  While damaging, it is less lethal than live ammunition.] 
[The M134 Minigun is a 7.62x51 mm NATO, six-barreled machine gun.  It features Gatling-style rotating barrels with an electric motor.  Its' recoil is too powerful for firing unmounted, but if you could attach it to a vehicle and find enough ammo for it, it would become a devastating weapon.] 
[The M1911 was the US Military standard-issue sidearm for most of the 20th Century.  It remains one of the most popular .45 pistols today.] M1911 是一把 20 世紀的美軍的標準配槍。是至今仍然很受歡迎的一把 .45 手槍。
[The M240 is a medium machine gun used by the US military, replacing the older M60.  Quite inaccurate and difficult to control, the M240 is designed to fire many rounds very quickly.] 
[The M249 is a mountable machine gun used by the US military and SWAT teams.  Quite inaccurate and difficult to control, the M249 is designed to fire many rounds very quickly.] M249是一個可掛載使用的機槍，常用在美國軍方和特警隊上。相當不準確且難以控制，M249的設計能夠非常迅速的發射一大串子彈。
[The M60 is a general-purpose machine gun developed to replace the .30-caliber M1918 and M1919.  Heavy and difficult to handle fired from the shoulder, as most people aren't action-movie heroes.] 
[The MAC-10 is a popular machine pistol originally designed for military use.  For many years they were the most inexpensive automatic weapon in the US, and enjoyed great popularity among criminals less concerned with quality firearms.] MAC-10 是一把受歡迎的自動手槍主要是設計給軍隊使用的。在美國多年來都是最便宜的自動武器，在不關心武器品質的犯罪集團中獲得愛用。
[The Milkor Multi-Grenade Launcher is designed to compensate for the drawback of single-shot grenade launchers by allowing sustained heavy firepower.  However, it is still slow to reload and must be used with careful planning.] Milkor 公司的連發榴彈發射器能提供持續而猛烈的火力，彌補了單發式的不足。然而，它的裝填速度仍然很緩慢，使用時必須仔細的斟酌。
[The Model 44 is the carbine sized variant of the standard 1891/30.  It has a shorter barrel, therefore it is weaker than the 1891/30, but easier to carry.] M44是標準型莫辛-納甘1891/30的改短版。相較於原版主要是將槍管改短，也因為這樣造成火力降低，但更便於攜帶。
[The Mosin-Nagant 1891/30 is a bolt action, internal magazine-fed, military rifle, developed by the Russian Empire, and later used and perfected by the Soviet Union.] 莫辛-納甘1891/30手動槍機步槍，使用彈倉式供彈，於沙皇俄國時期開發的軍用步槍，蘇聯時期進行了重大改進後成為主力武器。
[The Mossberg 500 is a popular series of pump-action shotguns, often acquired for military use.  It is noted for its high durability and low recoil.] 莫斯伯格500是一把著名的泵動式散彈槍，常見於軍隊之中。其高可靠性與低後座力為特點。
[The Norinco manufactured Tokarev TT-30 is the standard sidearm of the Chinese military, it does not see extensive use outside of China.] Norinco工業公司製造的托卡列夫TT-30是中國軍方的標準手槍，在中國以外的地區並不容易見到。
[The Pistolet Makarova was developed by the Soviet Union to replace the WWII-era TT-33 pistol.  Uses the 9x18mm cartridge, which remains in use among various former Soviet countries.] 
[The Rivtech RM802 pump-action 40mm grenade launcher was designed to be a step ahead of single-shot grenade launchers by allowing sustained heavy firepower.  However, its capacity is fairly limited so it must be used with careful planning.] Rivtech RM802 是一把泵動式 40mm 榴彈發射器。它能夠裝填多發彈藥以提供持續而強大的火力，使得其比單發榴彈發射器優勝。儘管如此，使用時仍需注意其有限的裝彈量。
[The SIG Sauer P230 is a small, semi-automatic handgun chambered in .32 ACP.  Due to its small dimensions, it was often carried as a backup weapon.] SIG 紹爾 P230 是一種小型半自動手槍，口徑為 .32。也因其體積小，經常被作為備用武器。
[The Saiga-12 is a semi-automatic shotgun designed on the same Kalashnikov pattern as the AK47 rifle.  It reloads with a magazine, rather than one shell at a time like most shotguns.] 這把 Saiga-12 半自動散彈槍是基於卡拉什尼科夫的 AK 系列的傳統基本操作系統設計。利用彈匣來裝填，能夠比單發裝填的散彈槍更有效率。
[The Saiga-12 is a semi-automatic shotgun designed on the same Kalashnikov pattern as the AK47 rifle.  It reloads with a magazine, rather than one shell at a time like most shotguns.  This one has had the barrel cut short, vastly reducing accuracy but making it more portable] 這把 Saiga 12 半自動散彈槍是基於卡拉什尼科夫的 AK 系列的傳統基本操作系統設計。利用彈匣來裝填，能夠比單發裝填的散彈槍更有效率。這把槍有著削短型槍管的設計，能夠增加便攜性但是命中率會降低
[The Sarafanov Assault Rifle replaced the famous AK family of guns as the service rifle of the Russian Army.  It uses the 6.54x42mm cartridge.] 
[The Skorpion Vz. 61 is a Czechosloavak submachine gun from the 1950s, chambered in .32 ACP.] 
[The Smith and Wesson 610 is a classic six-shooter revolver chambered for 10mm rounds, or for S&W's own .40 round.] Smith & Wesson公司製的 610 是一把經典的6發裝10mm口徑左輪手槍，也能裝填S&W公司的 .40口徑子彈。
[The Soviet made PPSh-41, chambered in 7.62 Tokarev, provides a relatively large ammunition capacity coupled with low recoil and decent accuracy.] 蘇聯產PPSh-41，使用7.62x25mm子彈，擁有一個較大的子彈容量與低後座力和不錯的準度。
[The Steyr AUG is an Austrian assault rifle that uses a bullpup design.  It is used in the armed forces and police forces of many nations, and enjoys low recoil and high accuracy.] 斯泰爾 AUG 是一把採用了犢牛式設計的澳製突擊步槍。被用在許多國家的武裝部隊以及軍警上，低後座力且高準確度。
[The TDI Vector is a submachine gun with a unique, in-line design that makes recoil very manageable, even in the powerful .45 caliber.] TDI Vector 此槍利用不均勻的後座力和同軸式設計，以解決.45 口徑的嚴重後座力和槍口上揚問題。
[The TEC-9 is a machine pistol made of cheap polymers and machine stamped parts.  Its rise in popularity among criminals is largely due to its intimidating looks and low cost.] TEC-9 是一把由廉價聚合物製成的自動手槍。因其低廉的價格與嚇人的外觀，所以在犯罪集團中很受歡迎。
[The Taurus Raging Bull is a 5-shot chambered in .454 Casull.  It has impressive stopping power.] 蠻牛左輪手槍是一把 5 發裝左輪，能夠發射 .454 卡蘇爾 子彈。擁有非常強大的遏止力。
[The Uzi 9mm has enjoyed immense popularity, selling more units than any other submachine gun.  It is widely used as a personal defense weapon, or as a primary weapon by elite frontline forces.] 烏茲 9mm 的高人氣，比其他衝鋒槍銷售到了更多的地區去。這把槍廣泛用於個人防衛武器，或是作為前線菁英部隊的主要武器。
[The V29 laser pistol was designed in the mid-21st century, and was one of the first firearms to use fusion as its ammunition.  It is larger than most traditional handguns, but displays no recoil whatsoever.] 這把 V29 雷射手槍是在 21 世紀中期發展出的手槍，也是最先發展出發射核融合能量彈藥的槍枝之一。其體積比一般傳統手槍要大，但是發射時完全不會有後座力。
[The Weatherby Mark V is one of the finest bolt action rifles.  It was introduced in 1957.  These rifles are considered prestigious or luxury firearms.] Weatherby Mark V 是其中一把最好的手動槍機步槍。首先生產於1957年。這把步槍被視為著名的豪華槍械。
[The Winchester Model 70 is a bolt action sporting rifle.  It has an iconic place in American sporting culture and has been held in high regard by shooters since it was introduced in 1936.] 溫徹斯特 M70 步槍是手動槍機構造的競賽步槍。在美國競賽文化有著代表性，從 1936 年就受到射手們的高度重視。
[The arc cannon fires bolts of lightning arcing between targets in close proximity to each other.  Originally manufactured to fry insects, now it’s been turned up to fry zombies.] 
[The barrels of shotguns are often sawed in half to make it more maneuverable and concealable.  This has the added effect of reducing accuracy greatly.] 這把散彈槍的槍管為了機動性和隱蔽性而成為削短型的。能夠增加效率但是大大降低了命中率。
[The child of the M1 Garand World War 2 rifle, the M14 is a semi-automatic rifle favored for its accuracy and modular use.] 這把槍是二戰時期 M1 加蘭德步槍的接續型號，M14 是一把半自動的步槍有著高準確度與多樣化的附掛武器可用。
[The compact version of the standard SVS-24.  It is commonly issued to tank crews or special forces due to its smaller size.  The shorter barrel reduces accuracy.] 
[The emblematic RPG-7 launcher.  Its simple, inexpensive, and reliable design made it a popular choice among armies and insurgent groups worldwide.] 經典的RPG-7火箭發射器，它構造簡單、便宜、可靠，讓它在全世界的軍隊、叛亂團體中都十分的流行。
[The first in a new genre of guns, termed "personal defense weapons."  FN designed the P90 to use their proprietary 5.7x28mm ammunition.  It is made for firing bursts manageably.] 這槍的有著非常獨特的外型，被稱為"自我防衛武器"。FN P90使用專用的 5.7x28mm 彈藥。使得連發時的穩定度提昇。
[The miniaturized version of the DREAD MkIX attached to the wrist of the operator.  It fires .20 metal pellets at an incredible rate without any flash or noise.  It is mainly a defensive weapon.] 
[The oldest and longest-produced shoulder firearm in the world.  Though it fires the weak .22 round, it is highly accurate and damaging, and has essentially no recoil.] 世界上最古老和生產時間最長的肩射槍枝。雖然他是發射弱的 .22 口徑子彈，但是有高準確度以及高傷害，而且幾乎沒有後座力。
[The successor to the well-known AK-47 rifle, chambered in 5.45x39mm.] 
[This Mosin-Nagant has exchanged the classic wooden stock for a modern synthetic model, carefully balanced to the same weight and handling yet offering support for modern accessories.] 這把莫辛-納甘更換了傳統的木製槍托為現代化的合成款，仔細的調校成相同重量並且還提供了現代化的配件支援。
[This alteration of the Chain Lightning bionic fires articial lightning bolts that arc to nearby enemies.  It must be attached to a large power source, but it allows for much more powerful bolts.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.] 
[This alteration of the Chain Lightning bionic fires artificial lightning bolts that arc to nearby enemies.  It must be attached to a large power source, but it allows for much more powerful bolts.] 
[This carbine packs the classic Mosin-Nagant model 44 action in a modern-day stock capable of accepting modifications.] 這把步槍將經典的莫辛-納甘44型改裝成了現代化槍托，並且能夠進行改造。
[This carbine was developed for military use in the early 21st century.  It is damaging and accurate, though its rate of fire is a bit slower than competing .223 carbines.] 這把步槍是在 21 世紀初為軍事用途而開發的。它擁有破壞性和準確度，但其射速比其他 .223 步槍慢一點。
[This fearsome weapon sports 3 barrels in a cyclic configuration.  A specialized magazine loads the otherwise troublesome rounds; allowing it to be fired in quick succession.  However, these features render it incredibly unwieldly, and it must be mounted on a turret chassis in order to be fired.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.] 
[This fearsome weapon sports 3 barrels in a cyclic configuration.  A specialized system loads the otherwise troublesome rounds; allowing it to be fired in quick succession.  However, these features render it incredibly unwieldy, and it must be mounted on a turret chassis in order to be fired.] 
[This improved nailgun features a special firing mechanism that is set to fire a spread of up to 5 nails at once; sure to drop the hammer on its unfortunate targets.  However, these features render it incredibly unwieldly, and it must be mounted on a turret chassis in order to be fired.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.] 
[This improved nailgun features a special firing mechanism that is set to fire a spread of up to 5 nails at once; sure to drop the hammer on its unfortunate targets.  However, these features render it incredibly unwieldy, and it must be mounted on a turret chassis in order to be fired.] 
[This is a laser cannon stripped from the barrel of a TX-5LR Cerberus laser turret that has been modified to use UPS power for firing.] 這把雷射加農砲是從TX-5LR雷射砲塔上拆下來的，經過改裝，它現在使用不斷電系統(UPS)供電。
[This is a nailgun that has been jury-rigged to be a more effective weapon with the addition of a short barrel, a stock, and a hand guard.] 這是一個用釘槍、短槍管、護手及一些雜物土砲成的一個武器。稍微比釘槍好用。
[This is a replica of the bow possessed by Odin, Ichaival, which is rumored to fire 10 arrows with every pull of the string.  It has gold and silver ornaments on it.] 
[This large flamethrower has been made to be mounted on a vehicle.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.  Flame on!] 
[This light carbine fires 5x50mm armor-piercing flechette cartridges.  Classified as a special purpose individual weapon, this advanced firearm was developed by Rivtech for the US military shortly before the end of the world.  Designed to be fired in bursts, it excels in close combat.] 這把輕量的卡賓槍能發射 5x50mm 穿甲鋼鏢彈。這把在末日前由 Rivtech 設計給美國軍隊的先進槍械被列為特殊用途的武器。在近距離戰鬥中能連發並達到很好的效果。
[This lightweight machine pistol fires 5x50mm armor-piercing flechette cartridges.  Classified as an individual defense weapon, this advanced firearm was developed by Rivtech for the US military shortly before the end of the world.  Designed to be fired in bursts, it excels in close combat.] 這把輕巧的自動手槍發射5x50mm的箭型穿甲彈，通常是作為個人防衛武器使用，這把先進的武器是在世界毀滅不久前，由Rivtech為美軍所設計。這把槍被設計為連發，在近距離交火中佔盡優勢。
[This massive crossbow is mounted on a rotating frame.  It's far too massive to be used on foot, and thus needs to be mounted on a vehicle turret chassis in order to be operated.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.] 
[This massive crossbow is mounted on a rotating frame.  The hand-crank allows one to draw it without the need for heavy labor.  It's far too massive to be used on foot, and thus needs to be mounted on a vehicle turret chassis in order to be operated.] 
[This menacing weapon launches large, bladed disks that rips through enemies with devastating effect.  It draws its power from a vehicle's engines, and thus requires a specialized chassis in order to function.] 
[This menacing weapon launches large, bladed disks that rips through enemies with devastating effect.  It requires a specialized chassis in order to function.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.] 
[This military-grade combat flamethrower has been made to be mounted on a vehicle.  Its pre-existing enhancements allow it to operate at maximum fuel efficiency, but still requires an external fuel source.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.  Unleash the dragon!] 
[This mounted laser may lack the damage capabilities of conventional heavy weapons, but it's a scientifically proven fact that traveling at the speed of light does wonders for one's overall deadliness.  The increased power requirements require a significant power source and the firing mechanism also requires a specialized chassis.] 
[This mounted laser may lack the damage capabilities of conventional heavy weapons, but it's a scientifically proven fact that traveling at the speed of light does wonders for one's overall deadliness.  The increased power requirements require a significant power source and the firing mechanism also requires a specialized chassis.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.] 
[This mounted pneumatic speargun features a revolving barrel behind its launcher; an automated loading and targeting system allows for repeated volleys to be fired without an operator, but requires an external support measure.  ] 
[This overpowered and overengineered variant of the ferromagnetic rail rifle was designed to deliver electromagnetically-driven obliteration right through whatever obstacles that lies in front of it, be it buildings, vehicles or hordes of walking dead.  However, the hefty bulk and weight of this weapon compared to most contemporary rifles makes it somewhat cumbersome to wield; not to mention that it consumes UPS charges at a tremendous rate, making it impractical for use in prolonged engagements.] 
[This pneumatic assault rifle has been greatly enhanced, firing projectiles faster and with higher velocity.  However, these features render it incredibly unwieldy, and it must be mounted on a turret chassis in order to be fired.] 
[This pneumatic assault rifle has been greatly enhanced, firing projectiles faster and with higher velocity.  Once mounted on a frame, it is capable of acquiring targets and maintaining itself with little further input.  However, these features render it incredibly unwieldly, and it must be mounted on a turret chassis in order to be fired.] 
[This pneumatic bolt thrower has been greatly enhanced, allowing multiple bolts to be launched accurately and in quick succession.  It requires a specialized chassis in order to be operated.] 
[This pneumatic bolt thrower has been greatly enhanced, allowing multiple bolts to be launched accurately and in quick succession.  It requires a specialized chassis in order to be operated.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.] 
[This reinforced turret frame mounts a powerful 50 caliber weapon.  Though capable of acquiring and tracking potential targets at long range; it will not exceed its range-limiter without external input.] 
[This short rifle design once dominated the battlefields of ancient Europe, and may yet re-earn its feared status due to its ease of handling and ability to use easily-crafted ammunition.] 這把短來福槍的設計在古代歐洲的戰場曾經佔盡優勢，因為它好操控，而且彈藥也很容易製作，現在它也許可以贏回過往的榮耀。
[This simple, home-made flamethrower has been made to be mounted on a vehicle.  Its fuel efficiency leaves a bit to be desired.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.] 
[This unusual Rivtech carbine features five rotating barrels and a large capacity helical magazine.  Durable and easy to handle, it was designed to overcome the deficiencies of its low power .22LR cartridge by rapidly delivering a large number of projectiles.] 
[This weapon is an... odd combination of blob and human ingenuity.  A constructed skeleton made of shaped bones, held together by a living blob.  It is capable of digesting fed materials; the resulting waste is then launched towards any nearby hostiles.  Once empty, the creature goes dormant until fed.  While the projectile itself is small, it travels quickly, and there's no shortage of... well, whatever it is, it isn't edible.] 
[This weapon is an... odd combination of blob and human ingenuity.  A constructed skeleton made of shaped bones, held together by a living blob.  The size of this creature is significant, and such it is capable of hurling its projectile with significant strength.] 
[This weapon is an... odd combination of blob and human ingenuity.  A constructed skeleton made of shaped bones, held together by a living blob.  The structure's blob secretes a venomous substance.  Which, when fed darts; is then coated onto darts.  The blob then ejects the darts at nearby hostiles as a self-defense mechanism.  The venom itself recedes quickly, but is capable of temporarily disorienting what it strikes; including other blob-based organisms.] 
[This weapon is an... odd combination of blob and human ingenuity.  A constructed skeleton made of shaped bones, held together by a living blob.  When fed, it produces an extremely corrosive liquid.  The blob then spits out this "acid" at nearby enemies.  The liquid's effectiveness against hostiles is only matched by its horrible smell.] 
[This weapon is an... odd combination of blob and human ingenuity.  A constructed skeleton made of shaped bones, held together by a living blob.  Within the blob you see a maelstrom of what appear to be threads.  When a hostile creature gets too near, the blob gathers these threads towards a single point and then thrusts it towards the hostile creature while simultaneously hardening the tip of this "spear".  It retracts it quickly after firing.]

[Utilizing a powerful and unusual caliber, the Rivtech RM120c caseless pump-action shotgun was designed for hunting big game, with durability and ease of use as priorities.] Rivtech RM120c 無殼泵動式散彈槍的研發概念是適用於大型狩獵，以可靠易用為主要考量。使用了特殊的口徑以達到強大火力。
[Utilizing a powerful and unusual caliber, the Rivtech RM20 caseless automatic combat shotgun was designed with durability and overwhelming power in mind.] Rivtech RM20 無殼自動戰鬥散彈槍的研發概念是擁有可靠與壓倒性的威力。使用了特殊的口徑以達到強大火力。

[No Joke Monsters] 無惡搞怪物
[No Medieval Items] 無中世紀物品
[No Monsters] 無野生怪物
[No Powered Armor] 無動力裝甲
[No Rivtech Guns] 無 Rivtech 槍械
[No Survivor Armor] 無生存者護甲
[Prevent Zombie Revivication] 阻止僵屍復活
[Removes Rivtech firearms and ammunition.] 移除 Rivtech 所製的槍械和彈藥。
[Removes all monsters from the game, save for those in the WILDLIFE category.] 遊戲中不會有野生怪物。
[Removes all special zombies from the game.] 遊戲中不會出現特殊僵屍。
[Removes antique firearms and those that are no longer in production.] 移除上古槍械及那些已不再生產的。
[Removes energy weapons, coilguns, and specific ammunition.] 移除能量武器、電磁加速槍和特殊彈藥。
[Removes flaming melee weapons.] 移除近戰類火焰武器。
[Removes fungal monsters and regions from the game.] 
[Removes joke monsters from the game.] 從遊戲中去除惡搞怪物。
[Removes medieval weapons, armors, and specific books.] 移除中世紀時期的武器、護甲和特有書籍。
[Removes mutagen items from the game.] 遊戲中不會有突變劑物品。
[Removes powered armor.] 移除動力裝甲。
[Removes religious text items from the game.] 遊戲中不會有宗教類文書。
[Removes survivor armor.] 移除生存者護甲。
[Replaces 20th century guns and ammo with generic types.] 
[Slow Zombies] 緩慢僵屍
[StatsThoughSkills] 
[Tall Buildings] 
[Tanks and Other Vehicles] 
[Vehicle Additions Pack] 新增車輛模組包
[Zombie Nightvision] 殭屍夜視
[contains all the mods recommended by the developers] 包含了由開發者所建議的所有模組
[default] 預設
[A Bowfin.  These fish are related to gar but without the huge teeth, skin rending scales, and aggression.] 
[A Smallmouth Bass.  Being intolerant to polution in the water, smallmouth bass are a good indicator of how clean it is.  Just becuase you see them though, doesnt mean you can drink the water without boiling it first.] 
[A bipedal animatronic bat, nearly twice your size.  It might have been cute once, but has fallen into disrepair.  Though it is a robot, it stinks like death.] 一隻兩腳走路的蝙蝠機器人，體型幾乎有你的兩倍大，它以前也許很可愛，但已年久失修，雖然他是一隻機器人，仍然發出死亡的味道。
[A bipedal animatronic bear, nearly twice your size.  It's holding a microphone, and wearing a top hat.  Its outer layer is made of reinforced plastic.  It looks to be high tech, and in good shape.] 一架用兩腳走路的熊型機械布偶，體型幾乎有你的兩倍大，它握著麥克風還戴著頂帽子。其外層是強化塑膠，看得出是高科技產物，且處於良好狀態。
[A bipedal animatronic bear, nearly twice your size.  It's holding a microphone, and wearing a top hat.  Though it is a robot, it stinks like death.  It looks heavily worn and degraded.] 一架用兩腳走路的熊型機械布偶，體型幾乎有你的兩倍大，它握著麥克風還戴著頂帽子。雖然它是一隻機器人，仍然發出死亡的味道。它看起來磨損相當嚴重且劣化。
[A bipedal animatronic beaver, nearly twice your size.  Its buck teeth look far more sharp than they should be.  Though it is a robot, it stinks like death.] 一隻兩腳走路的海貍機器人，體型幾乎有你的兩倍大，它的門牙看起來比一般的海貍更加鋒利。雖然他是一隻機器人，仍然發出死亡的味道。
[A bipedal animatronic bunny, nearly twice your size.  Its actually quite cute, even though it's trying to kill you.  Its outer layer is made of reinforced plastic.  It looks to be high tech, and in good shape.] 一架用兩腳走路的兔子機械布偶，體型幾乎有你的兩倍大，它其實挺可愛的，即使它試圖要殺了你。其外層是強化塑膠，看得出是高科技產物，且處於良好狀態。
[A bipedal animatronic bunny, nearly twice your size.  Its face has been torn clear off, though the sockets for it's eyes still exist.  It looks heavily worn and degraded.] 一架用兩腳走路的兔子機械布偶，體型幾乎有你的兩倍大，雖然它的兩顆眼睛仍待在眼窩上，但臉部已經被撕得乾乾淨淨。它看起來磨損相當嚴重且劣化。
[A bipedal animatronic cat, nearly twice your size.  Its claws are extremely sharp.  Though it is a robot, it stinks like death.] 一隻兩腳走路的機器貓，體型幾乎有你的兩倍大，它𢔨的爪子非常的鋒利，但已年久失修，雖然他是一隻機器人，仍然發出死亡的味道。
[A bipedal animatronic chicken, nearly twice your size.  It's wearing a bib that reads 'Let's Eat!'.  Though it is a robot, it stinks like death.] 一隻兩腳走路的小雞機器人，體型幾乎有你的兩倍大，它身上穿著一件寫著「來吃吧！」的圍兜兜。雖然他是一隻機器人，仍然發出死亡的味道。
[A bipedal animatronic chicken, nearly twice your size.  It's wearing a bib that reads 'Let's Party!'.  She oddly has a curvaceous figure.  Its outer layer is made of reinforced plastic.  It looks to be high tech, and in good shape.] 一架用兩腳走路的雞型機械布偶，體型幾乎有你的兩倍大，它身上穿著一件寫著"Let's Party!"的圍兜兜。奇怪的是，她有婀娜的身材。其外層是強化塑膠，看得出是高科技產物，且處於良好狀態。
[A bipedal animatronic chipmunk, nearly twice your size.  You might call it cute if it wasn't charging you down right now.  Though it is a robot, it stinks like death.] 一隻兩腳走路的花栗鼠機器人，體型幾乎有你的兩倍大，如果它不是沖著你來的話，你也許會覺得它很可愛，雖然他是一隻機器人，仍然發出死亡的味道。
[A bipedal animatronic cow, nearly twice your size.  Its voice-box is broken, making it emit shrill, eerie moos.  Though it is a robot, it stinks like death.] 一隻兩腳走路的牛機器人，體型幾乎有你的兩倍大，它的發聲裝置已經壞掉了，現在只能發出尖銳、詭異的哞哞聲。雖然他是一隻機器人，仍然發出死亡的味道。
[A bipedal animatronic coyote, nearly twice your size.  Its head twitches about faster than seems possible.  Though it is a robot, it stinks like death.] 一隻兩腳走路的郊狼機器人，體型幾乎有你的兩倍大，它能以難以想像的速度轉頭，雖然他是一隻機器人，仍然發出死亡的味道。
[A bipedal animatronic deer, nearly twice your size.  The hunter becomes the hunted.  Though it is a robot, it stinks like death.] 一隻兩腳走路的鹿機器人，體型幾乎有你的兩倍大，以前狩獵鹿的獵人現在都反過來變成獵物了。雖然它是一隻機器人，仍然發出死亡的味道。
[A bipedal animatronic fox, nearly twice your size.  Its teeth and claws look quite sharp.  Its outer layer is made of reinforced plastic.  It looks to be high tech, and in good shape.] 一架用兩腳走路的狐狸機械布偶，體型幾乎有你的兩倍大，它的牙齒和爪子看起來相當銳利。其外層是強化塑膠，看得出是高科技產物，且處於良好狀態。
[A bipedal animatronic fox, nearly twice your size.  Its teeth and claws look quite sharp.  Its right hand is replaced with a hook.  It looks heavily worn and degraded.] 一架用兩腳走路的狐狸機械布偶，體型幾乎有你的兩倍大，它的牙齒和爪子看起來相當銳利，而右手換成了一把鉤子。它看起來磨損相當嚴重且劣化。
[A bipedal animatronic horse, nearly twice your size.  It's amazing.  Though it is a robot, it stinks like death.] 一隻雙腳行走的機器馬，體型幾乎有你的兩倍大，它真是驚人。儘管它是一隻機器馬，身上的味道卻比死屍還要臭。
[A bipedal animatronic pig, nearly twice your size.  Little piggy go home, little piggy no no.  Though it is a robot, it stinks like death.] 一隻雙腳行走的機器豬，體型幾乎有你的兩倍大。小豬小豬快回家～儘管它是一隻機器豬，身上的味道卻比死屍還要臭。
[A bipedal animatronic sheep, nearly twice your size.  Its wool is mangy and gross.  Though it is a robot, it stinks like death.] 一隻雙腳行走的機器綿羊，體型幾乎有你的兩倍大。他身上的"羊毛"長滿令人覺得噁心的疥癬。儘管它是一隻機器綿羊，身上的味道卻比死屍還要臭。
[A bipedal animatronic squirrel, nearly twice your size.  Judging by its sharp teeth, you hope it does not like nuts.  Though it is a robot, it stinks like death.] 一隻雙腳行走的機器松鼠，體型幾乎有你的兩倍大。從它牙齒的鋒利程度看的出來它不喜歡吃堅果。儘管它是一隻機器松鼠，身上的味道卻比死屍還要臭。
[A bipedal animatronic wolf, nearly twice your size.  If the animal counterpart was scary, this robot is terrifying.  Though it is a robot, it stinks like death.] 一隻雙腳行走的機器狼，體型幾乎有你的兩倍大。如果一般的狼讓你覺得可怕，這隻機器人應該會讓你嚇到閃尿。儘管它是一隻機器狼，身上的味道卻比死屍還要臭。
[A bipedal dinosaur about the size of a chicken.  It roots around the undergrowth, scavenging on small animals and plants.] 一隻跟雞差不多大的雙足恐龍。正吃著周圍灌木叢根部的小動物和植物。
[A bipedal dinosaur about the size of a small cat.  Its teeth and claws look quite sharp.] 跟一隻小貓差不多大的雙足恐龍。它的牙齒和爪子看起來很鋒利。
[A bizarre humanoid creature with a calculating stare.  Its twitching hands move so fast they appear to be nothing but blurs.] 一個怪異的生物，一直隨機變換，其手掌抽搐的速度快到讓你看不見實體。
[A black blob of viscous goo, oozing across the ground like a glob of living oil.] 一團彷彿活著的石油滲出地面的黑色黏稠物。
[A blackened and twisted naked human body, strips of flesh hang from its body, and it emits a constant haze of thick black smoke.] 一個黑色扭曲的裸露人體，殘破的肉條從軀幹上垂下，並且會產生不定大小的黑色濃煙。
[A blood-sucking fly with a needle-like proboscis.  Its bite leaves behind itchy welts and can easily spread disease.] 一隻飛舞的吸血蚊子，臉部是長型並帶有長矛狀的口器。被咬到會產生痛癢感並很容易感染疾病。
[A bluegill, An invasive species in Japan.  Commonly gutted and cooked whole.] 
[A broad fungus, looking much like a glowing blue sunflower.  It appears to emit finer spores than the typical fungal emission.] 一個巨大的真菌生態，看起來比較像是發出藍光的向日葵，它所散發出的胞子似乎比普通的真菌更多。
[A bullhead, a type of catfish.  Delicious battered and fried.] 
[A colossal red ant with a bulging, bloated thorax.  It moves slowly and deliberately, tending to nearby eggs and continually laying more.] 這種螞蟻有一個長而臃腫的胸腔。移動很緩慢並且會產下許多的卵。
[A conglomeration of human parts fused together in a horrible mishmash of function, slowly dragging its eldritch body across the ground.] 由許多人體組織交雜融合在一起的噁心形體，緩慢的在地面拖行著他們的厚皮與猙獰的軀體。
[A crazed individual, the bloody scars on the side of its shaved head suggest some sort of partial lobotomy] 一個瘋狂的人，他們剃光頭的兩側有許多血洞。已被進行某種形式的前腦葉白質切除術。
[A creeping animate plant, growing as tall as a moose.  It has a single bark-covered stalk supporting a flowery head with a paralyzing sting concealed within.] 一株植物與你的身高差不多，有著厚實，齒狀的莖，頂部有著花狀的頭部以及尖刺。
[A cunning pack predator, once extinct in the New England area, the wolf was successfully reintroduced and their numbers reached record highs in the decade before the cataclysm.  Lucky you.] 一種狡猾的群聚獵食者，一度在新英格蘭滅絕，在災變前已經成功復育並且數量達到新高。祝你好運。
[A decaying human body clad in tattered firefighting gear.  It staggers aimlessly, reeking of smoke and decay.] 一具腐爛的人體穿著破爛的消防裝備。它漫無目的地蹣跚著，渾身散發著煙味和腐爛的臭味。
[A defiled human body, once living.  Tortured to death long ago, it remains chained to the altar, the putrescent flays of its peeled skin quivering like so much flotsam upon a murky pond.] 這個可憐的受害者在不久前被折磨至死。並且被鐵鍊拴著，皮膚破爛斑駁的被扒下，漂浮在血泊之中。
[A deformed human body, its skin has been transformed into one thick, calloused envelope of scar tissue.] 一個畸形的人類身體，其皮膚已經轉變成類似於傷疤的厚厚組織。
[A deformed human body, once living.  Its arms dangle from its sides like the limbs of some skinless ape, mindlessly groping at their surroundings.] 曾經是活著的一個畸形人體。它的手臂就像長臂猿一樣伸長吊在身體兩邊，無意識地摸索著他們的四周。
[A dog's body with a mass of ropey, black tentacles reaching out from its head.] 有著黏稠身體的狗，黑色的觸手從頭部延伸出來。
[A domesticated descendant of junglefowl, it may still be the most numerous bird in the world.  Before the Cataclysm, it was raised by humans as a source of meat, eggs, and early morning wakeup calls.] 一個被馴化的原雞，可能仍然是世界上數量最多的鳥類了。在災變前，是人類飼養的肉類、蛋、與每天早上的鬧鐘。
[A domesticated mongrel of the canine persuasion.  In the absence of human society, it has turned feral.  You feel a sudden urge to destroy it.] 被訓化的犬科品種。在無人看管的狀況，已經恢復野性。你突然覺得要趕快摧毀它。
[A domesticated omnivore descended from the wild boar, intelligent and inquisitive.  Left to its own devices, it has gone feral.] 一個被訓養的雜食性動物，野豬的後代，聰明又好奇。自從無人餵食後，已經野性化了。
[A drooped, quivering plant with a thick stalk adorned by a purple flower.  Its petals are closed, and pulsate ominously.] 厚實的莖上有紫色的花。花瓣是閉合的，並且有令人不安的搏動。
[A fairly large spider which tracks and catches prey through agility and stealth.  Its bite can be irritating even to large animals.] 一個毛茸茸的大蜘蛛，能夠隱密迅速的跟蹤和獵食。甚至大型動物也無法忍受它的叮咬。
[A familiar-looking blob of goo.  It sprouts the occasional eyestalk.] 看起來有點像是黏液球，上面加了一隻像蝸牛一樣的眼睛。
[A fat humanoid the size of a dog, with twisted red flesh and a distended neck.  It scampers around, panting and grunting.] 一個小型機器人，尺寸像狗一樣，纏繞著紅色的血肉與漲大的脖子。它會在地上到處跑，喘氣，發出呼嚕聲。
[A fat white grub as big as a squirrel, with a pair of large, spadelike mandibles.] 大約松鼠大小的肥胖蟲子，有著一對大如鏟子的下顎。
[A feathered bipedal dinosaur, standing as tall as a human.  It looks somewhat like a reptilian ostrich.] 長著羽毛的雙足恐龍，站起來有個人那麼高。它看起來有點像爬蟲類的鴕鳥。
[A ferocious mutant dragonfly as big as a cat, darting through the air with a cluster of fangs for a mouth.] 兇猛的空降捕食者，能在空中快速飛行，嘴巴是一組銳利的獠牙。
[A flexuous monstrosity seeming as a giant crab covered in writhing antennae, clawed tentacles, and star-shaped growths, with a head like the insides of a fish but for its dire utterance.] 一個長得像巨型螃蟹的扭曲怪物，有著無數的附肢爪，像魚內臟的頭部長了許多觸角，並且會發出可怕的話語。
[A formless slime mold the size of a cow.  Crusty bits of cytoplasm fall away as it oozes across the ground.] 一種沒有形體的黏菌，大小與約牛相仿。其細胞壁崩落的結果就是它只能在地上爬行。
[A fungal stalk several feet in height.  Two vicious looking tendrils extend from its thorned and leathery exterior, and it moves about faster than the larger fungaloids.] 長達幾英尺高的真菌莖。從主幹堅韌的皮長出了一對可怕的卷鬚，移動速度比大型的食人蕈快。
[A fusion-driven UAV largely comprised of a high-resolution camera lens, this spheroid robot hovers above the ground, silent witness to the carnage and mayhem around it.] 一部搭載大型高解析鏡頭的無人飛行機器，懸浮在地面之上，沉默的觀察著正在發生的血腥屠殺。
[A gargantuan protoplasmic blob, constantly reshaping, forming new pseudopods seemingly at will.  All over its body are eyes that form and disappear.  It looks at you with malice.] 一團龐大無定形的原生質生物，看上去就像柏油構成的巨大變形蟲，膿液似的眼睛不斷在它的表面形成又分解，它似乎對你充滿著惡意。
[A giant mutated black widow spider.  A highly venomous nightmare come to life.] 一個巨大的變種黑寡婦蜘蛛。劇毒的噩夢來襲了。
[A giant mutated grass spider, it waits for prey to become ensnared in the vast webs that it weaves between the trees.] 一個變種的巨大蜘蛛，它會在樹林間織網，靜待獵物上門。
[A giant spider with big forelegs and two pairs of inquisitive-looking eyes.  It can leap quite quickly, even into the treetops.] 有著粗大前肢的巨大蜘蛛，有著兩對好奇的眼睛。能夠快速的跳躍，甚至直接跳到樹上。
[A gigantic black blob of viscous goo, oozing across the ground like a glob of living oil.  Other blobs seem to swarm around it.] 一個又大又黏的黑色黏液，在從地面上流來流去，就像一團有生命的原油球。其他的黏液球似乎都聚集在它的身邊。
[A gigantic shadow, chaotically changing in shape and volume , two piercing orbs of light dominate what can only be described as its head.] 一個巨大的陰影，毫無規則的變換形狀與體積，從陰影中透出兩道光，大概就是他的頭吧。
[A gigantic slender-bodied wasp with an evil-looking stinger protruding from its abdomen.  Its exoskeleton glowers with ominous red markings.] 一支巨大的昆蟲有著修長的腹部帶著可怕的毒針為其特色。其外骨骼上有著兇狠的紅色標記。
[A gigantic spider with a bulbous thorax.  It digs a deep underground burrow that serves as a pit to trap unwary prey.] 一個有著球形腹部的巨大蜘蛛。它會挖出很深的地下洞穴等著粗心的獵物掉進來。
[A golden-yellow common carp.  Some people think they don't taste great, but you can't afford to be choosy in the cataclysm.] 
[A hellish, vaguely humanoid horror, two stories tall.  Its face is grotesquely stretched out, its limbs deformed to unrecognizable outgrowths.] 地獄般的的恐怖人形怪物。約兩層樓高，它的臉部扭曲的延伸出去，四肢變形，面目全非。
[A hooved grazing mammal with a mane of hair, a sweeping tail, and powerful-looking muscles.] 一隻有蹄的哺乳動物，額、頸上有長鬃，尾有長毛，四肢強健。
[A huge and hairy red ant almost twice the size of other giant ants.  Bulging pincers extend from its jaws.] 體型幾乎是其他巨蟻兩倍大的毛茸茸紅蟻。從它的下顎伸出了粗壯的鉗子。
[A huge beast covered in visible scarring from what you can only guess was 'research'.  Being near it, you can hear a slight humming, like that of an electrical transformer.] 一隻巨大的野獸，當他看到它時，你會很你明顯知道什麼是恐懼。如果你靠的夠近，你會聽到它身上發出電流的聲音，就像一個大型的變壓器。
[A huge dinosaur about the size of a small house, with a ferocious crocodile-like head and a sail on its back.] 這隻恐龍的大小約一棟小房子，有著像鱷魚一般兇猛的頭，背後聳立一排巨大的帆狀鱗片。
[A huge mottled dinosaur with a blunt head crest.  It contentedly strips leaves from a nearby shrub.] 一隻有著花紋頭冠的巨大恐龍。它正愜意吃掉附近灌木的葉子。
[A huge mutated worm found deep underground.  It has a gaping round mouth lined with dagger-like teeth, and its flesh is slick with bubbling blue slime.] 一隻巨大的黑色變種蟲狀怪。其口器圍繞著一圈像匕首的牙齒，血肉中閃爍著酸性藍色的黏液。
[A human body covered by a weather-beaten and badly damaged set of riot gear.] 人的身體穿著飽經蹂躪的鎮暴護具。
[A human body now swollen to the size of six men, with arms as wide as a trash can.] 一個不知為何能長到6人高的巨大殭屍，手臂跟大垃圾桶一樣粗。
[A human body with pale blue flesh, crackling with electrical energy.] 這個殭屍的肉體是藍色的，並且發出劈哩啪啦的電流聲。
[A human body, but with its limbs, neck, and hair impossibly twisted.  It clambers around swiftly, making awful screeching sounds.] 有著人的身體，但是四肢、頸部，以及頭髮卻不可思議地扭曲著。它四處攀爬、動作流暢，發出令人難以忍受的刺耳聲音。
[A human body, swaying as it moves, an unstoppable rage is visible in its oily black eyes.] 一個人的軀體，搖搖晃晃的移動，從他黑色的眼睛看得出他無法阻擋的憤怒。
[A hunched human body with its eyes pushed up into its forehead and drooping cheeks, most of its face is occupied by a puckered mouth.  Its stomach is swollen and nearly translucent, with a sickly yellow tint.] 這個殭屍的整張臉幾乎被退化成了噴管狀的嘴巴所盤據，他的腹部腫脹並呈現半透明，流動著濃稠的黃色液體。
[A insectoid robot the size of a small dog, designed for home security.  Armed with two close-range tazers, it can skate across the ground with great speed.] 一個昆蟲外型的機器人，約小狗的大小，正常來說是設計用來作居家保全。搭載兩個近距離電擊槍，並能快速在地面移動。
[A knot of tubular roots, flowing with sap and beating like a heart.  Strands of vascular tissue reach out to the surrounding root walls.] 一個看起來很詭異的心臟樣貌的東西。它緩慢的搏動，並供給能量給予圍繞在其上的植根牆。
[A large and colorful game bird native to the forests of North America.  Its head and beak are covered in fleshy protuberances.] 一種大而多彩的鳥，原產於北美洲的森林。它的頭部和嘴披覆著肉質。
[A large bipedal dinosaur with feathered arms, a long tail, and scythe-like claws.] 一隻大型雙足恐龍，手臂覆蓋著羽毛，有一條長尾巴和腳上鐮刀狀的爪子。
[A large black blob of viscous goo, oozing across the ground like a glob of living oil.] 一團彷彿活著的石油滲出地面的黑色黏稠物。
[A large mutant variety of carp.  It has shimmering green scales and a mouth lined with three jagged rows of razor-sharp teeth.] 一隻綠色且巨大的變種魚，嘴裡長了三排鋒利的牙齒。
[A large omnivorous rodent with a thick furry pelt, found in wetlands across the northern hemisphere.  It marks its territory with a musky odor for which it is named.] 有著厚實的毛茸茸皮毛的大型雜食性囓齒動物，能在北半球的溼地發現。會利用其麝香氣味劃分地盤而聞名。
[A large predatory bipedal dinosaur, with tiger-like stripes on its broad back.] 一隻大型雙足肉食性恐龍，在那寬闊的背上有著老虎般的條紋。
[A large quadruped dinosaur with plates on its back, and a spiked tail.] 一隻具有背部骨板與尖刺尾巴特徵的大型四足恐龍，。
[A largemouth bass.  Very popular with sports fishermen.] 
[A little spider with elongated forelegs.  It does not build extensive webs, but leaps very quickly, appearing to move instantaneously from one spot to another.] 有著細長前肢的小蜘蛛。它並不會織網，但是跳的很快，速度快到就像是從一個地方瞬間移動到另一個地方。
[A long and delicate-looking tendril with a sharp tip.] 一條長長的真菌卷鬚，尾端尖尖的，看起來挺別緻。
[A mallard duck, often seen around rivers and other bodies of water.  It feeds primarily on insects, seeds, roots, and, pre-cataclysm, bread scraps.] 一隻綠頭鴨，於河流或其他水體附近很常見。主要以昆蟲，種子，植物的根為食，在災變之前還有麵包屑。
[A man-sized worm-like creature that swoops around on bat-like wings.  Its form dramatically shifts and changes from moment to moment, although its gigantic eyes and teeth are always prominent.] 一隻大小如人，黏稠的蠕蟲狀生物，有著用來飛行的蝙蝠狀翅膀。它的形狀不斷的轉變並抽搐扭動著，並有巨大且突出眼睛與利齒。
[A marionette able to move itself around.  There are no strings on him however.] 一個能夠自行走動的木偶。但是身上沒有任何操控線。
[A mass of spores the size of a balled fist, wafting around in the air.] 一團孢子聚集成拳頭大的霧氣，飄蕩在空中。
[A massive rhino-like dinosaur with a bony crest from which three large horns emerge.] 一支像是超大隻的犀牛樣貌的恐龍，有著許多頸盾緣骨突與三隻大角。
[A medium dinosaur with a sticky green bile dripping from its teeth.] 一隻中等大小的恐龍，帶有粘性的綠色汁液正從它的齒縫間滴落。
[A medium-sized bipedal dinosaur covered with feathers.  At the end of each foot is a large sickle-like claw.] 一隻中等大小的雙足恐龍，身上覆蓋著羽毛。在雙腳上都有根鐮刀狀的爪子。
[A meter-long centipede with a menacing pair of pincers, moving swiftly on dozens of spindly legs.] 一米長的蜈蚣，能利用數隻小腳迅速移動，一對毒鉗連接在它的頭部。
[A midsized spider with a bulbous thorax.  It creates a subterranean nest and lies in wait for prey to draw close enough for capture.] 有著球形腹部的一種中型蜘蛛。它會製作一個地下巢穴並且躲在裡面等獵物靠近後進行獵捕。
[A monster with an obese human body and the head of a cow.  It treads slowly, and milky white drool drips from its mouth.] 有著稍微肥胖的人類身形，而頭部是牛頭。它移動緩慢，乳白色的唾液從他的嘴巴流下。(日本電影:牛頭 Gozu)
[A monstrous beast with a tripartite mouth that opens to reveal hundreds of writhing tongues with razor sharp edges.  It keeps most of its enormous body hidden underground.] 一個恐怖的滑行怪物。有著三向裂口與數以百計的捲動刀狀舌頭。它龐大的身軀大部分都隱藏在地底。
[A mutant, terrestrial variety of the signal crayfish, this massive crustacean resembles a humongous lobster.] 一個變種的陸生螯蝦，這個巨大的甲殼動物就像是個龐大的龍蝦。
[A mutated bullfrog taller than you are.  It stares with amber eyes as it considers the easiest way to swallow you whole.] 一隻綠色厚皮的青蛙。它把你當做蟲子，能夠簡單的把你吞下。
[A mutated leopard slug, as wide as a golf cart.  Venom dripping from its fanged maw, it slithers ahead slowly, leaving a trail of glistening slime.] 一隻變種的豹紋蛞蝓，大約像高爾夫球車寬。它的毒牙滴下毒液，緩慢的前進，沿路留下了黏液痕。
[A mutated salmon, the same size as a large dog and quite dangerous to the inexperienced angler.] 一隻突變的鮭魚，大小和一隻大型犬差不多，對沒有經驗的垂釣者來說相當危險。
[A mutated wasp nearly the size of a cat, with a barbed ovipositor extruding from the abdomen.] 一隻變種的黃蜂，大約貓的大小。其蜂刺中帶有產卵器。
[A once aggressive and hungry bull shark, this jawed terror is now even more aggressive, possibly thanks to its lack of a functioning brain.] 它曾經是一隻飢餓富有攻擊性的公牛鯊，現在雖然更加的有攻擊性，但幸好它現在不會用腦，只會依靠本能。
[A once-dead human corpse.  Its discolored swollen flesh is riddled with festering wounds and open sores.] 一具死過一次的人類屍體。那變色浮腫的肉佈滿了化膿的傷口及開放性爛瘡。
[A pale hairless man with an impressive athletic physique.  Its lidless eyes are totally black, and seeping with blood.] 一個完美身形的純白色人體。它的眼睛是完全黑色，並且有血液的眼淚從中流出。
[A pale white fungus, one meaty gray stalk supporting a bloom at the top.  Spores are periodically expelled from its gills, and a few tendrils extend from the base, allowing mobility and some basic means of defense.] 一株白色的真菌，肉質的灰色秸稈上面並綻放著菌傘。根部長了一些卷鬚，讓它能夠活動並且進行微弱的攻擊。
[A pickerel.  It looks like a pike, but much smaller.] 
[A pike.  Pike can be a pretty aggressive fish, careful around those teeth.] 
[A ponderous and particularly arborescent triffid.  It has enormous red petals surrounded by a haze of spores, and two thick barbed vines stick out from the stems like wary harpoons.] 一棵笨重且樹枝特化的食人樹。擁有圍繞著孢子霧的巨大紅色花朵，以及伸出一對像魚叉一樣粗壯的刺藤莖。
[A predatory segmented arthropod with dozens of legs and a venomous bite.] 一種有著上百隻腳的有毒節肢動物。
[A pulsating sausage of glistening white flesh, the size of a large cat.  On one end is a set of squirming mouth parts.] 一條有脈動的白色血肉，大小與大貓的尺寸相仿。在一端有著蠕動的口器。
[A putrid amalgamation of body parts from humans and other creatures have fused together in this aberration of flesh.  The eyes of all the heads dart about rapidly and the mouths form a chorus of groaning screams.] 許多腐爛的人類和動物融合成噁心的形體，上面的所有頭顱會快速的眨眼而嘴巴會發出尖叫與呻吟。
[A relatively humanoid mutant with purple hair and a grapefruit-sized bloodshot eye.] 一個突變種人形，有著紫色的毛髮與有如柚子大佈滿血絲的獨眼。
[A robot body with the head of a human.  All kinds of electronic wires and devices are implanted in its head.  Patches of skin look diseased or rotting.  This cyborg moves erratically and has a confused and deranged look in its eyes.] 身體是機器，大腦卻是人類的。各種電線和裝置被植入了那顆大腦，它的人工皮膚不是損壞就是爛掉了，它漫無目的的行者著，從眼神中看得出來它已經發瘋了。
[A rotund and bloated human body with pasty, fungus-ridden flesh.  Its mouth drips with a frothing gray sludge.] 一個肥胖的殭屍，皮膚佈滿粘糊的灰黴。血肉呈現灰色半透明的，嘴掛著一團灰色的污泥。
[A rotund human body, bloated beyond belief and layered in rolls of fat.  It emits a horrible odor, and a putrid pink sludge dribbles from its mouth.] 脂肪臃腫下垂的肥胖殭屍。散發出可怕的腐爛氣味，粉紅色的粘液從它的嘴滴下。
[A salmon.  A very fatty, nutricious fish.  Tastes great smoked.] 
[A sickly-looking dead one.  Its skin looks especially thin, with a sticky, yellow fluid flowing through the clearly visible veins.] 
[A slick and glistening human body.  Its hands and feet are webbed, and it is clad in swimwear.] 一個靈活且溼漉漉的人體。這個殭屍的手掌與腳掌都有蹼並且穿著泳裝。
[A sluglike creature, eight feet long and the width of a refrigerator.  Its black body glistens as it oozes its way along the ground.  Eye stalks occasionally push their way out of the oily mass and look around.] 像是鼻涕蟲的生物，8呎長而寬度就像冰箱一樣，黑色的軀體會產生黏液並在地上留下拖痕。眼睛則會隨著前進時伸縮並環顧四周。
[A small bipedal dinosaur covered with feathers.  Small, hooked claws emerge from its feet and hands.] 一隻小型雙足恐龍，身上覆蓋著羽毛。牠的腳和手都長有小小的鉤爪。
[A small black blob of viscous goo, oozing across the ground like a glob of living oil.] 一小團彷彿活著的石油滲出地面的黑色黏稠物。
[A small domesticated predator gone feral in the absence of human stewardship.  Harried by the elements and the rigors of survival, it is scruffy and skittish.] 恢復野性的小型食肉獵食動物。受到了生存的嚴重考驗後，變得邋遢且膽怯。
[A small flying reptile, circling overhead looking for prey.] 一隻小型會飛的爬蟲類，正在上空盤旋著尋找獵物。
[A small granivorous rodent with a long bushy tail, often seen darting amid the branches of trees.  A skittish varmint with an expression of unwavering austerity, it is the mortal enemy of cat and dog alike.] 一隻有著長長像毛刷尾巴的囓齒類動物，常常會見到牠們在樹林間穿梭。一個冰雪聰明的可愛小壞蛋，跟貓狗是死對頭。
[A small mammal native to North America, distinctive for its dexterous paws and facial markings.  It is resourceful and agile enough to open sealed containers with its paws.] 原產於北美洲的一種小型哺乳動物，其特點為靈巧的爪子和臉部斑紋。相當聰明靈活，能用它的爪子打開密封的容器。
[A small mammal with a cute wiggling nose, cotton tail, and made of delicious flesh.] 一個擺動鼻子，棉花尾巴的可愛生物，同時肉也很好吃。
[A small omnivorous canine with an almost cat-like manner.  It is a solitary hunter, and one of the only canids able to climb trees.] 一隻小型的雜食性犬科動物，長得像貓。是個孤獨的狩獵者，並且也是唯一一種能夠爬樹的犬科動物。
[A small spritely perch.  A very bony fish, still got some tasty meat on it though.] 
[A small triffid, only a few feet tall.  It has not yet developed bark, but its sting is still sharp and deadly.] 一株小型的食人樹，只有幾呎高。莖齒的部份還沒發育完全，但是很刺且鋒利，被咬到還是很致命。
[A small, elegant black bird, famous for its distinctive call.  An intelligent bird, there is a glitter of mischief behind its eyes.] 優雅的小黑鳥，叫聲奇特、聰明伶俐，眼神透露出想惡作劇的淘氣感。
[A small, round turret which extends from the floor.  Two SMG barrels swivel 360 degrees.] 從地板伸出的圓形小槍塔。裝配了雙管的衝鋒槍，能夠全方位掃射。
[A smoking husk is all that remains of this once proud bear.  Its black eyes gaze at you with malice... and hunger.] 
[A snake-like, segmented robot built to tunnel into the ground and detonate landmines.] 一個似蛇的機器人，設計用來鑽入地底引爆地雷的用途。
[A spotted wild cat living across much of North America.  It is not a serious threat to humans, but it can be aggressive if not left alone.] 大部分棲息於北美洲的斑點野貓。雖然對人類不太構成威脅，但是可能會群體攻擊。
[A squiggling severed portion of a wounded giant worm.] 一個巨蟲被切斷的部份，還在扭動著。
[A still immature giant grass spider.  Too young to be venomous, or to walk proficiently for that matter] 一隻靜止不動的大蜘蛛，因為尚未發育完全，所以還沒有毒液，也無法很熟練的移動。
[A stout woody plant that can dig through the ground and flick spines from its branches.  The thorns carry a fungicidal compound with paralytic effects.] 一個粗壯的木本植物，能夠挖穿地面並且從它的樹枝射出尖刺。荊棘附帶了具麻痺效果的殺菌化合物。
[A strange moving darkness, bringing with it the softest of whispers.] 奇怪的一塊陰影。它會在移動時發出耳語。
[A strange three-eyed fish.] 一條奇怪的三眼魚。(辛普森家庭)
[A striped bass.  Mostly a salt water fish, they migrate to fresher water to spawn.] 
[A sunfish.  No, not the giant tropical thing.  This one is a small fish related to bass or bluegill.] 
[A tall and slender man lacking skin and any normalcy of countenance.  Wings of muscle curl forth from its back and a third eye dominates the forehead.] 一個巨大、修長而可怕的人，沒有任何皮膚在其肌肉上。從他的背後長出肉質的翅膀，並且在額頭上有著第三隻眼。
[A thick stalk, rooted to the ground.  It rapidly sprouts thorny vines in all directions.] 厚實的植物莖紮根到地面。有棘刺的藤蔓往四面八方迅速生長。
[A thin-bodied insectoid predator with a large wingspan and big compound eyes.] 一種身形細長的獵食者昆蟲，有著大翅膀與大複眼。
[A thorny vine, twisting wildly as it grows with incredible speed.] 厚實的植物莖。因為生長的速度快，而瘋狂的扭曲纏繞。
[A timid, hooved grazing mammal, and one of the first animals ever domesticated, its body is covered in a thick layer of wool, and the males have long, spiralling horns.] 一個膽小的有蹄哺乳動物，是一種先被訓養的動物之一，其身體覆蓋了一層厚厚的羊毛，雄性還有螺旋狀的長角。
[A tiny opportunistic rodent with a long bushy tail.  The pine squirrel is clever and cute, and hunted by nearly everything in the woods with a taste for meat.] 一隻有著長長像毛刷尾巴的囓齒類動物，松鼠聰明又可愛，幾乎會被森林中的所有生物所獵食。
[A towering swarm of mutated rats, their tails knotted together in a filthy mass.  A fetid stench flows from its filthy presence.] 一群變異老鼠，尾巴揉結在一起形成一個骯髒的肉團。散發出強烈的惡臭。
[A translucent black snake, long and fearsome looking.] 一條巨大的蛇，呈現半透明的黑色。
[A tremendous housefly the size of a small dog, predictably accompanied by a loud, incessant buzzing sound.] 一支蒼蠅有著小狗的大小。嗡嗡作響的不停飛舞。
[A trout is a trout, without a doubt.  A fish made popular by father-son fishing trips, Except for the part where you have to gut it.] 
[A twisted mockery of the human form, emaciated, with jet black skin and glowing red eyes.  It is somehow painful to look at, awakening fears deep within your psyche, and even the air around it seems more sinister, somehow darker and more dangerous.] 一個扭曲的人形，骨瘦如柴，有著漆黑的皮膚與發出紅光的雙眼。不知為何看到它時會喚醒你內心深處的恐懼，並且在它周圍有黑暗的危險氛圍。"
[A twisting spot in the air, with some kind of morphing mass at its center.] 空氣中的一個氣流扭曲點，有某種東西在其中心點。
[A veritable wall of fungus, grown as a natural defense by the fungal spire.  New spores erupt from the surface every few seconds.] 由真菌尖頂增長而成的自然防壁。看起來非常堅固，並且以驚人速度噴出孢子。
[A weird mass of immobile pink goo.  It seems to breathe.] 一個奇異的固體粉紅色肉塊。它似乎會緩慢的呼吸。
[A whitefish, closely related to salmon.  One can assume they are just as nice when cooked with smoke.] 
[A wolf spider mutated to about thirty times its normal size, it moves quickly and aggressively to catch and consume prey.] 突變狼蛛，為普通狼蛛的三十倍大小，移動迅速且富有攻擊性。
[A worm-tailed rodent with long whiskers and beady eyes.  The way it squeaks makes it sound...  hungry.] 有著像蟲一般尾巴與長鬍鬚小眼睛的囓齒動物。牠急促的吱吱聲聽起來...餓了。
[A wrecked animatronic fox, laying in a pile on the ground.  Its teeth and claws still look quite sharp.  It's able to crawl around and climb on the ceiling.] 一架殘骸般的狐狸機械布偶，攤成一堆在地上。它的牙齒和爪子看起來相當銳利。它能夠抓住周圍的東西，爬到天花板上。
[A zombified omnivore descended from the wild boar.  Now it's got black goo all over it, instead of mud.] 一隻殭屍化、雜食性的野豬，但是它身上沾染的不是泥土，而是黑色的黏液。
[A zombified version of one of the German shepherd dogs used in law enforcement.  Its deformed body is encased in a protective Kevlar harness.] 一隻變成殭屍的警犬，德國牧羊犬犬種。它變形的身軀仍然套著凱夫勒犬具。
[A zombified wolf.  Its mouth oozes with a black substance, coating the vicious-looking white fangs.] 一隻殭屍狼，牠有著一口凶狠的白色尖牙，從他的齒縫間滲出黑色的物質。
[Acrid smell accompanies this corpse of canine.  Its whole body is covered in chains of pulsing cysts and slime dribbling ulcers.] 刺鼻的氣味籠罩著這具犬類腐屍。它全身都佈滿了脈動的囊腫，從中滴下粘稠的潰瘍膿汁。
[Allosaurus] 
[Also known as the woodchuck, this ground squirrel has no actual talent for chucking wood.] 同時也稱作旱獺，這種平地的松鼠科動物並沒有跟樹木關係密切。
[An American eel.  Used to be quite common in these parts until the dams were built.  Guess they'll get a second chance now that they aren't running.] 
[An aggressive mutant variety of the worm snake, turned pale yellow from its underground life.  It swarms beneath the ground and is named for its habit of infesting sewer lines.] 一個攻擊性強的突變蛇，因地下生活而呈現淡黃色。它的名稱由來是因為它盤據在地底的習性。
[An amorphous black creature, detaching and sprouting tentacles without any apparent pause.] 一種無定形的黑色生物，其伸出的觸手迅速的扭動著。
[An amorphous mound of twisting black flesh that flits through the air at incredible speeds.] 一個不定型的黑色扭曲肉塊，在空中快速的飛行。
[An animated mass of roots and vines, creeping along the ground with alarming speed.  The tangle is thick enough that the center from which they grow is concealed.] 以驚人的速度移動的籐蔓，因為籐蔓厚重而糾結，讓你看不出中心有什麼。
[An animatronic child.  It looks like it's annoying as hell.  Though it is a robot, it stinks like death.] 一架孩童型機械布偶。它看起來煩人得要命。雖然他是一隻機器人，仍然發出死亡的味道。
[An automated anti-personnel drone, a fist-sized robot surrounded by whirring blades.] 
[An automated kamikaze drone, this fist-sized robot appears to have a flashbang inside.] 
[An automated kamikaze drone, this fist-sized robot appears to have a grenade inside.] 
[An automated kamikaze drone, this fist-sized robot appears to have a tear gas canister inside.] 
[An automated kamikaze drone, this fist-sized robot appears to have an EMP grenade inside.] 
[An automated kamikaze drone, this fist-sized robot appears to have some C-4 inside.] 
[An elongated human body with a swollen chest and a gaping hole where its jaw used to be.] 一個有著腫脹胸腔的人體，下巴的部份已經被撕爛成一個大洞。
[An enormous fleshy snail, with an oddly human face.  Eyestalks protrude from where the eyes should be.] 一隻令人驚悚的巨大人面蝸牛。本應有眼睛的地方卻是一對觸角。
[An enormous fungal spire, towering over the ground.  It pulsates slowly, continuously growing new defenses.] 在地面之上的一個高達30英尺的巨大真菌尖塔，它慢慢的搏動，並不斷增長。
[An enormous fungal tower.  On closer inspection, its cap is supported by LOTS of fungal tendrils of various thicknesses, emerging from yet more bristling tendrils at ground level.  Between this redundancy and their noticeable movement creating frequent gaps, it's tough to get a solid shot on the thing.] 一個巨大的真菌塔，如果你靠近一點觀察，他的頂端是由許多不同厚度的真菌卷鬚構成，許多的真菌卷鬚從頂蓋一直垂到地面。這些濃密的卷鬚還會不規則的蠕動，站在玩意的上頭你根本沒有辦法好好的射擊。
[An enormous mutant mosquito, fluttering erratically, its face dominated by a long, spear-tipped proboscis.] 一隻飛舞的巨大蚊子，臉部是長型並帶有長矛狀的口器。
[An enormous red ant covered in chitinous plates.  It possesses a pair of wriggling antennae and vicious-looking mandibles.] 一隻全身甲殼的紅色螞蟻。牠有一對扭動的觸角與有毒的下顎。
[An enormous white flatworm that burrows beneath the earth.  Its mouth is lined with pointed teeth, and it is covered in fine hairs which can be shed and fired like darts.] 一個巨大的白色扁形蟲在地底下扭動著。會利用球狀的頭與肉色的獠牙口從地底竄出，
[An enormous, mutated creature that might once have been a nightcrawler.  It possesses a large fanged mouth and a long slender body that comes up to your shoulder, with even more surely hiding underground.] 一個突變的巨大生物，曾經是夜行性動物，有大型獠牙的嘴與及肩高的細長身體，以前牠都是躲在地底的，現在糟了。
[An eyeball the size of an easy chair, covered in rolling blue flames.  It floats through the air, spinning slowly to draw its gaze in every direction.] 一個椅子大小的眼球，覆蓋著滾燙的藍色火焰。並漂浮在空中巡視每一個方向。
[An immense fungal blossom, towering over its surroundings.  It pulses with a soft blue glow, continuously pumping its spores into the air.] 一個巨大的真菌蓋，參天而起，它的體內閃著淡藍色的螢光，就像脈搏一樣持續的把胞子吐向天空。
[An infamous spider with a characteristic red hourglass marking on its black carapace, known for its highly toxic bite.] 一隻蜘蛛，黑色的腹部有著紅色的沙漏狀斑記。其劇毒性相當有名。
[An otherwise normal-looking cougar, except that its hind legs are swollen, and its eyes bulge with black goo.] 一隻看起來普通的美洲獅，但是它的後腳腫脹，並且從眼睛流出黑色的黏液。
[An undead humanoid, its elongated arms drag along the ground as it moves.  It looks to almost have a hunch from the swollen back and shoulder muscles tearing though its skin.]

Your body starts to shiver. 
For no mere mortal can resist, 
The evil of the thriller.] 你拼死決鬥，

[It looks like a dodo, only much bigger, with longer, muscular legs and a predatory gleam in its eyes.] 它看起來像一個渡渡鳥，只是有著更大，更長，肌肉更發達的腿，並在其眼神中透露出更強的獵食性。
[It was only a child, and little is different about it now aside from the hungry look in its eyes.  You'd be hard pressed to not feel like you were killing an actual child by putting it down.] 這只是一個小孩，唯一的不同是其嗜血的眼神。把他放倒就像是殺害了真的小孩一樣。
[Its entire body bulges with distended muscles and swollen, festering wounds.] 一個可怕的野獸殭屍，雙臂與雙腿都有著膨脹的肌肉以及潰爛的傷口。
[Leadworks LLC's T-107A1 Interdictor, an automated .50BMG antimateriel rifle.  Credited with forestalling countless car-bombing attempts, it has always been kept under extremely tight control, so as to itself maintain extremely tight control of its area.  And then the Cataclysm struck.] Leadworks LLC公司製造的T-107A1自動攔截者，搭配.50口徑的BMG反器材步槍，炸毀車輛保證沒有問題。它隨時都保持高度警戒，就算在災變降臨之後，它還是一樣。
[Leadworks LLC's T-4A1 Sentry.  It features improved firmware over General Atomics' TX-1 9mm model and an automated M4 carbine.] Leadworks LLC公司製造的T-4A1哨兵，它使用l更為先進的9mmGeneral Atomics' TX-1 晶片，並搭載有自動M4卡賓槍。

[Looking at first glance like a dull gray privet, this "hedge" is really a mass of barbed fungal tendrils, defending the fungal tower.] 第一眼看到時你以為這只是無聊的灰色灌木牆，但這個「牆」實際上是由大量的真菌卷鬚纏繞而成，藉此保護真菌塔。
[Mom?] 媽咪？
[Nonviolent riot-control bot.  Designed to suppress riots and make mass arrests of those participating.  Though its relaxation gas is by far its best-known weapon, it carries a blinding flash and a low-powered stungun for self-defense--in addition to its supply of electronic handcuffs.] 不使用暴力的機器人，當初是設計用來弭平暴動，並且逮捕滋事者，雖然它最著名的武器是「放鬆氣體」，但它還是攜帶了閃光彈與低殺傷力的電擊槍以保護自己，此外它還配備了電子手銬。
[Once a soldier, it is dressed head to toe in combat gear and carries itself rather steadily for a zombie.] 曾經是個軍人，它現在從頭到腳都穿著戰鬥裝備，移動步伐很穩定的殭屍。
[Once a soldier, it is dressed head to toe in combat gear and wearing a MOLLE pack.  Its hands quickly open and close its many pouches.] 
[Once a soldier, it is dressed head to toe in combat gear.  Its hands constantly fumble at its many pouches.] 
[Once an athletic human, now a brutal monster.  Its facial features are twisted into an expression of pure rage.] 曾經是運動員，現在是個凶暴的怪物。它的五官都扭曲成憤怒的樣子。
[Once human, fungal tendrils now sprout from its mouth, eyes, and other orifices, holding together a shambling mass of mold-covered flesh.] 曾經是個人，但現在真菌佈滿了他的嘴和眼，並且連結了其長了灰黴的破損軀體。
[Once human, its features have tightened, its lips pulled back into an unnatural grin, revealing rows of blackened teeth beneath its large, piercing eyes.  It stands tall and its movements are fluid and tightly controlled.  A feeling of danger permeates the air around it, and the light that falls on it seems somehow harsher and more glaring.] 曾經是人類，但是其五官是撐緊的，嘴唇被拉扯成不自然的笑容，露出一排黑色的牙齒和突出的大眼。它高高聳立，移動速度流暢。在它周圍透露出危險的氣息，照射在它身上的光線讓它變得更加可怕。
[One of the many models of armored law enforcement robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization.  Solar powered like many other robots, it maintains its programmed pursuit of law and order, propelled on a trio of omni wheels.] 許多型號的其中一種裝甲執法機器人，在文明崩潰前不久才採用的。就像其他許多的機器人一樣是使用太陽能驅動的，它保持了執法的程序，並且利用三輪移動。
[One of the vesper bats, a family of winged insect-eating mammals.  It roosts in caves and other hollows, and uses a form of echolocation to aerially navigate through tricky terrain at rapid speeds.] 夜行蝙蝠的一種，一種群居性的吃昆蟲的有翅哺乳類。其棲息於洞窟或凹地，利用超音波來進行定位，同時夠在錯綜複雜的地形快速的飛行。
[Pale, sickly gray in color, this giant ant's cracked exoskeleton is barely held together by coils of fungus erupting from every joint in its body.] 這個巨蟻呈現蒼白的灰色，其全身甲殼是由寄生的真菌所撐著的。

[Still wearing its work clothes and hardhat, this zombie likely used to work on power lines or other electrical equipment.] 這隻殭屍仍然穿著工作服還有安全帽，生前似乎是在電力、電子產業工作。
[Still wearing the tattered remnants of improvised armor and weaponry, it is plain to see that this zombie was once a survivor like you.] 你清楚地意識到，這具仍然穿戴著簡易盔甲和支離破碎武器的殭屍，曾經也是個像你一樣的生存者。
[Stumbling as it moves, this corpse of an overweight human regards its surroundings with an empty black gaze.] 一個搖搖晃晃移動的肥胖屍體，有著空洞的黑色眼睛。
[The American black bear.  A large omnivorous scavenger, it has powerful claws and jaws, and is an effective ambush hunter.  It can pose a considerable threat, although most individuals are shy around humans.] 美國黑熊。大型的雜食性動物，擁有強力的爪子與下顎，是個有效率的伏擊狩獵者。雖然可能是個威脅，但實際上大部分的個體都不太會主動靠近人類。
[The American bullfrog, in its natural habitat.  It feeds on insects, mice, lizards and any other living thing it can stuff down its gullet.] 美國牛蛙，它的習性是，不管昆蟲、老鼠、蜥蜴、任何只要塞的下食道的動物它就吃。
[The American mink, a partially-aquatic weasel, once factory-farmed for its fur.  It is a capable fisher, but the presence of otters in these parts makes it rely more on food from the land.] 美洲貂，一種半水棲的鼬鼠，曾經有工廠為了其毛皮進行培育。牠是個捕魚好手，但是水獺的存在迫使牠們必須更常從陸地上捕食。
[The C.H.U.D.  or Cannibalistic Humanoid Underground Dweller.  A human being turned pale and mad from years of underground isolation.] 這是C.H.U.D - Cannibalistic Humanoid Underground Dweller (寄居地下的食人者)。一個住在地下道多年而蒼白發瘋的人。
[The Eastern cougar, a large feline predator.  Once thought extinct in this region, conservation efforts were successful in restoring a thriving population.] 棲息於東部的美洲獅，是一種大型的食肉目貓科動物。一度被認為在本地已經滅絕，經過了保育的工作已經成功的恢復成蓬勃發展的群體。
[The Eastern coyote, also called the tweed wolf, is a territorial canine descended from the offspring of gray wolves and true coyotes.  It is intimidated by humans and other predators, but will fight if threatened.] 東方郊狼，也被稱為花呢狼，是狼與真正的郊狼產生的犬科後裔，很容易被人類或其它掠食者嚇到，但受到威脅時則不同了。
[The Eastern moose, the largest living species of deer.  The bulls are quite ill-tempered, especially in the rutting season.] 東部駝鹿，是世界上最大的鹿科動物。大部分脾氣都不好，特別是發情期。
[The Ford Sanitron, a utility robot designed for cleaning up waste material in hazardous conditions.] 福特Sanitron，一個設計用於危險環境下清理廢棄物的實用機器人。
[The General Atomics TX-1 Guardian, a small, pill-shaped automated gun turret using state of the art ATR systems to dynamically reorient itself to new friends and enemies alike.  The two SMG barrels can swivel a full 360 degrees.] 通用原子公司的TX-1守護者，一種丸形的小型自動砲塔，採用最先進的ATR系統可以動態調整敵我識別。裝配了雙管的衝鋒槍能夠全方位掃射。
[The Honda Regnal, a tall robot walking on three spidery legs.  For weapons, it has a trio of spiked retractable cables and a flamethrower mounted on its head.] 本田王國出產的高大機器人，利用三支像蜘蛛的腿進行移動。作為武器，它擁有尖刺的伸縮電纜，在頭上也安裝了火焰噴射器。
[The North American beaver, the continent's largest rodent.  Its paddle-shaped tail helps ferry it through the water, and its prominent teeth can chew through wood, which it uses to build dam-like nests in lakes and streams.] 北美的河狸，陸地上最大的囓齒動物。其槳形的尾巴，能在水中擺動前進，突出的牙齒能夠咬斷木頭，並且能夠用來在水流中建造類似水壩的巢。
[The North American river otter is a shy water dwelling relative of the weasel living in large families along the banks of streams.  It is an excellent fisher and a resourceful survivor, using the abandoned dens of beavers and other animals to raise its own young.] 北美水獺是一個害羞的水棲鼬鼠群聚生活在溪流的沿岸。是一個捕魚好手也是聰明的生存者，會利用河狸的廢棄水壩或其他動物來扶養自己的小孩。
[The Northeastern coyote, a widespread canine pack hunter.  More timid than a wolf, it is an opportunistic feeder and prefers to hunt smaller and weaker prey.] 東北郊狼，廣泛分布的犬科獵手，比狼更膽小，偏好伺機狩獵弱小的獵物。
[The Northern bog lemming, a small, predominantly vegetarian rodent that spends its life in the murk of swamps and other wetlands.  Contrary to popular belief, these creatures are not particularly hapless or suicidal, but they can eat themselves into scarcity within a few generations.] 在北美活動的沼澤旅鼠，是一種群居的草食性小型囓齒動物，終其一生在沼澤和其他濕地生活。出乎意料的，這種生物在近代並不會自殺，卻反而會在食物匱乏時自相殘殺。
[The Northrop Watchman X-1 is a production series of heavily armored combat robots.  Initially designed for military patrol and escort service, it rolls on a set of hydraulic treads and is armed with a 3"/50 caliber gun.] 諾斯羅普守望者 X-1 是重裝甲戰鬥機器人系列的產品之一。最初設計是用於軍事巡邏和護送。它具有一套液壓履帶並裝備有一具 3"/50 口徑的火炮。
[The Northrup ATSV, a massive, heavily-armed and armored robot walking on a pair of reverse-jointed legs.  Armed with a 40mm anti-vehicle grenade launcher, 5.56 anti-personnel gun, and the ability to electrify itself against attackers, it is an effective automated sentry, though production was limited due to a legal dispute.] Northrup ATSV是大型、重裝甲、有一對膝蓋後彎雙腳的武裝機器人，配備一組40mm的反車輛榴彈砲、5.56mm的人員殺傷機槍，並能讓自己通電來對付攻擊者，它是一個效率極高的自動化哨兵，但因為它有合法性的爭議，製造的數量並不多。
[The Northrup Emancipator is the first and only automated tank ever produced, made shortly after the split-up of Northrup Grumman.  Clad in depleted uranium plating, and armed with advanced munitions and a 120-mm gun, it is capable of delivering extraordinary firepower.] 諾斯羅普解放者是史上唯一一款的全自動坦克，在諾斯羅普·格魯曼公司分裂後不久所製造的。包覆了貧鈾鍍層板，擁有先進的彈藥和一個 120mm 火砲，火力強大。
[The TX-5LR Cerberus is an upgrade to its predecessors.  It features a state of the art revolving laser cannon system with three barrels that charge from solar cells embedded in its hull.] 這個 TX-5LR 地獄犬槍塔是該系列的新型號。採用了先進的三管旋轉雷射砲系統，並且能利用嵌入於機體的太陽能板進行充電。
[The Virginia opossum, a small omnivorous marsupial native to North America.  About the size of a cat, it is hardy and adaptive, and a fairly common sight in urban areas.] 維吉尼亞負鼠，一種小型的雜食性有袋動物，原產於北美。體型約貓的大小，耐寒，適應性高，在城市地區相當常見。
[The black rat, an omnivorous rodent with sheer black fur and a long, rough tail.  Harbinger of pestilence, famine, and mange, it will sometimes swarm over the dead or dying.] 這隻黑鼠是一種雜食性動物，有著黑色毛皮與長長粗粗的尾巴。瘟疫、饑荒的帶原者，有時候會對著屍體或瀕死之人蜂擁而上。
[The deformed, animated corpse of a canine, a sinewy beast which can easily outpace its two-legged friends.] 這是隻強而有力的犬科畸形生物，向前的追擊速度比牠兩條腿的朋友更快。
[The domestic cow, a baleful, ruminating farm animal.  It is quite muscular, and the males can have a violent streak to accompany their nasty-looking horns.] 美洲野牛，一種壞脾氣的反芻動物。其肌肉相當發達，雄性個體有著可怕的角搭配著條紋。
[The eastern chipmunk, a tiny omnivorous rodent with a characteristic striped coat.  It spends much of the day patrolling its elaborate burrow and the precious stores of foraged food within.] 生活在美國和加拿大的東部的花栗鼠，這個小型的雜食性囓齒動物具有特別的條紋。他的習性會整天巡邏其精心製作的洞穴以及小心的存放食物。
[The foulest stench is in the air, 
The funk of forty thousand years, 
And grisly ghouls from every tomb, 
Are closing in to seal your doom!

The dancer doens't even notice you, it seems like something nearby is controlling it.] 
[The horrid spawn of a giant black widow spider.  Even as a newborn, this foul creature knows only how to kill.] 由可怕的巨大黑寡婦蜘蛛所生，雖然剛出生不久，這隻邪惡的生物什麼都不知道，只知道殺戮。
[The leopard slug, an omnivorous gastropod.  It consumes decaying matter as well as planted crops, and will attack and eat other slugs that cross its path.] 雜食性的豹紋蛞蝓。它會消化腐爛的物質與農作物，並且會攻擊吞食其他擋路的同類。
[The long-tailed weasel, a small but ubiquitous predator whose range extends across the continent.  It forms its den in small burrows, preferring to occupy the nesting holes of its prey.] 長尾巴的黃鼠狼，是一種體型小的獵食者，分布範圍橫跨整個大陸。其身形柔軟，能夠鑽到小洞穴中進行捕食。
[The masked shrew, a mouse-like creature with a pointed, whiskery snout.  It digs tunnels into the ground in search of bugs to eat.] 一隻有著尖口鼻像老鼠的生物，牠會挖洞到地下找尋可吃的蟲子。
[The multi-cooker's got a mind of its own!  Look out!!] 快看！那個大同電鍋有自己的意識！
[The northern woodland white-tailed deer, a quick and strong grazing animal.  Favored prey of coyotes, wolves, and giant spider mutants.] 棲息在北方森林的白尾鹿，靈敏健壯的草食動物，是郊狼、狼群、巨大蜘蛛變異體喜愛的獵物。
[The red fox, an omnivorous canine and largest of the true foxes, it is a wily hunter with a combative, suspicious temperament.] 紅狐狸，一種犬科動物，並且是狐狸中最大型的。牠是一個狡猾且好鬥的狩獵者。
[The snowshoe hare, a small grass-eater with a brown fur coat that changes to white in the wintertime.] 這種兔子，是一種有著棕色皮毛的草食動物，並且會在冬天時換毛成白色。
[The timber rattlesnake is the most venomous viper native to New England.  Climatic changes have extended its range far into the north.] 源自新英格蘭的木紋響尾蛇是一種最毒的毒蛇。由於氣候的變遷，在北方也可以看到牠的足跡。
[The white-footed mouse, a prolific rodent with a white underbelly and a long fuzzy tail.  A common sight in fields, forests, and research centers.] 有時又稱白足鼠，多產的齧齒類動物，有著毛絨絨的白色腹部與長尾巴，常見於田野、森林與研究中心內。
[These things were once considered pests not worth eating, then some marketing genius started selling them to people as a delicacy and they took off in popularity...  and price.] 
[This armored and augmented soldier's bionics crackle with energy.  Worse, it appears to remember its training.] 這隻武裝、強化過的軍人身上的生化插件發出能量的爆裂聲，更糟糕的是，它似乎還記得生前所受的訓練。
[This black bear's eyes ooze with black fluid, and its flesh is torn and scarred.  It shuffles as it walks.] 這隻黑熊的眼睛滲出黑色的液體，並且其血肉殘破不堪。正在跌跌撞撞的走著。
[This body has swollen to immense proportions, but still manages to hold itself together with semi-congealed acid all over its bloated body.  It clumsily moves around, but attacks with a large reserve of acid.] 
[This boomer, normally swollen and ready to burst, has strengthened and solidified.  The bile dribbling from its mouth also appears to have changed...] 
[This canines see-through thin, black veined and scab riddled skin, is tightly compressed around its skeletal frame.] 這個犬科動物瘦到能看穿身體，上面滿是滲出黑色液體的傷疤，皮膚緊緊的貼著骨頭，。
[This dinosaur looks like a giant prehistoric armadillo.  Its tail ends in a massive spiked club of bone.] 這種恐龍看起來像一隻巨大的史前犰狳。牠有根巨型的尾巴棒槌。
[This formerly-majestic moose has succumbed to the infection which is killing the world.  Shiny green blowflies swarm the vast suppurated patches of purulent flesh where its skin has sloughed away, and its remaining fur is black and matted with necrotic discharge.] 這隻駝鹿曾是那麼那麼的不可一世，但現在它卻屈服於感染之下。它身上腐爛的地方表皮已經脫落，旁邊有發光的麗蠅飛來飛去，它剩下的毛皮已經變黑，慢慢逐漸的壞死脫落。
[This human corpse drags itself along slowly with its arms.  Its legs are damaged beyond repair.] 
[This looks like a human body, but its flesh is snow-white, and its face is featureless save for a perfectly round mouth.] 看起來像是人類的軀體，但是血肉是雪白色的，且臉部沒有五官，只有一張大嘴。
[This monster exists only for testing purposes.] 
[This once-human body is barely recognizable, scrambling about on all fours, its nails and teeth both sharpened into dangerous looking spikes.] 人類的特徵已經幾乎看不出來了，行動是利用全部四肢進行移動，它的指甲與牙齒都變形成危險的尖刺。
[This recently-risen body moves quickly, darting its head back and forth and gnawing at its hands.] 
[This rotting corpse seeps a glowing ooze from its lesions.  A strange tattered jumpsuit marks it as an oddity across the wasteland.] 這隻腐敗的殭屍身上的傷口流出會發光的黏液；他身上破爛的傘兵服讓他看起來像是一個穿過荒野的太空人。
[This thing seems like a carp, only swollen and very very angry.  Death is the gift of the carp god.] 這隻東西看起來像是鯉魚，但是臃腫而且非常非常憤怒。死亡是鯉魚之神的恩賜。
[This zombie's face and body is completely covered by a protective suit.  It wanders around, unsteadily.] 這具殭屍的臉和身體完全覆蓋著防護服。它四處遊蕩，搖搖晃晃。
[Three high-powered searchlights with automated search AI and mounting, continually seeking targets.] 三個強力的探照燈被裝在一個機器上，擁有人工智慧，會自己尋找目標。

[With its gray skin swollen to near rupture with putrid gas, this cyst covered zombie looks like it could violently burst under the slightest of disturbances.] 這隻殭屍身上布滿了膿包，他蒼白的肌膚之下就快要被體內腐敗的氣體撐破，就算是極其輕微的打擊都能讓他爆炸。

[With its skin so tight the cracked bones are visible beneath it, covered in scar tissue and coils of scabbed black liquid and with eyes so deeply sunken into its skull they are barely visible, it's a wonder this once-human creature can move at all.] 它的皮膚緊緊的貼著骨頭，上面滿是滲出黑色液體的傷疤，眼窩深陷到頭骨之中以致於它們幾乎沒有視力，讓人好奇這樣的類人生物居然還能移動。

Any person that can travel the length and breadth of the apocalypse, rough it, slum it, struggle against terrible odds, win through and still know where their towel is, is clearly a force to be reckoned with.] 一條又大又軟的毛巾，可以用來擦乾你的身體。一個經歷過災變、遭遇過可怕生物的人仍然知道他的毛巾在哪裡，毛巾顯然有種神奇的魔力。

[A 35mm digital SLR (single-lens reflex) camera, with optical and digital viewfinders, zoom lens with auto-focus and stabilizer, and flash.  You can view your photos on it or transfer them with a memory card; it runs on conventional batteries.  Before the cataclysm, you could have taken professional-grade photos using this.] 一台35mm的單眼相機，他有一個光學觀景窗，也能從螢幕上看到觀察，自動對焦、抗手震、閃光燈。你可以直接在相機螢幕上觀看照片並把他們存到記憶卡裡頭，它使用傳統電池供電，在災變以前，你可以用他來拍攝專業等級的照片。
[A bottle of flammable liquid with a flaming rag inserted.  Throwing it will cause the bottle to break, spreading fire.  The flame may go out shortly if you do not throw it.  Dropping it while lit is not safe.] 一個裝有易燃液體的瓶子，瓶口的布條已經點燃。投擲出去後會讓瓶子破裂並散發出火焰。若是你不投擲出去，火焰可能會很快熄滅。把這東西丟在自己腳邊並不是個好主意…
[A bottle of flammable liquid with a rag inserted.  Use this item to light the rag.  You will, of course, need a lighter or matches in your inventory to do this.  After lighting it, throw it to cause fires.] 一罐瓶口塞著布條，裡頭裝有易燃液體的瓶子。使用這個物品將會點燃布條；當然你要有個打火機或火柴才行。點燃後，投擲出去會產生火焰。

In addition to its metalworking uses, you can activate it in order to destroy metal barriers.] 一個用來焊接或切割金屬的複雜工具，這個可繫式噴槍有一個握把、切割頭和兩個可重複裝填的瓦斯罐，除了以上用途外，你還可以用他來破壞金屬類的障礙物。

The power cell is not compatible with standard batteries; it must be re-energized via a special recharging station.] 一個手工製，從廢電器上拆下的可充電電芯。有足夠的電子技能，你就能夠把這東西連接到電器上來供電。用了這個模組就無法使用標準電池充電；必須透過特殊的充電站才能充電。

[A pair of electronic handcuffs, used by police and riot bots to detain captives.  Their continuous siren clearly identifies the wearer as an arrested criminal and alerts human police.  Wait for their arrival, don't try to escape or to remove the cuffs - they will administer an electric shock.
However, since the only police likely to respond are undead, you may have a long wait ahead, unless you get creative...] 一付電子手銬，通常是警察或鎮暴機器人用來逮捕嫌犯時使用。它會持續的發出警報聲，以警告嫌犯在移送過程中不要逃跑或者嘗試掙脫，否則會讓你嘗嘗電擊的滋味。
但是，當警察現在正忙著對抗殭屍，你可能要等很久才會到達移送目的地了，除非你有什麼其他特別的想法...

It could be useful for water taken from uncertain sources like a river, as it may be non-potable.] 這是由電池供電的裝置，用於淨化飲用水。使用於一個裝水容器將其內容物淨化。自不穩定地區 (像是河流) 所取來的水源可能會不太乾淨。
