[This is a canister grenade filled with a variety of pyrotechnic chemicals.  Use this item to pull the pin and light the fuse, turning it into an active smoke bomb.  Five turns after you do that, it will begin to expel a thick black smoke.  This smoke will slow those who enter it, as well as obscuring vision and scent.] 這個手榴彈中裝入了壓縮的濃煙氣體。使用這個物品時會拉開插梢並點燃引信。五回合後它會散發出濃厚的黑色煙霧，能夠讓身處其中的生物行動緩慢，同時也會影響視力與嗅覺。
[This is a canister grenade filled with noxious irritant.  Use this item to pull the pin and light the fuse, turning it into an active tear gas grenade.  In five turns it will begin to expel a highly toxic gas for some time.  This gas damages and slows those who enter it, as well as obscuring vision and scent.] 這是一個充滿有毒刺激性氣體的手榴彈式武器。一旦解除安全裝置，引信點火後數秒在五回合內會持續釋放催淚瓦斯。這種氣體會延緩那些進入有效範圍敵人的速度，也能遮蔽視野和混淆氣味。
[This is a car horn meant to be attached to a car's electrical system.] 這是一個汽車喇叭，只能連接在汽車的電子系統才有效用。
[This is a carefully-selected piece of flint and a carbon steel fire starter.  Use it to spark a flame.] 
[This is a chainsaw that has been lightened, tuned, and extensively modified to be a more effective weapon.  Unfortunately these modifications have rendered it much less effective as a woodcutting tool.] 這是一把已經輕量化的鏈鋸，已經修改成為一把更有效率的武器。不幸的是這些改動都讓它更加偏離伐木工具的用途。
[This is a chemical heat pack.  It's used to treat sports injuries and heat food.  It is usable only once.] 這是一種化學發熱貼。能用於治療運動損傷和加熱食物。只可以使用一次。
[This is a chemical heat pack.  It's used to treat sports injuries and heat food.  This one has been used and is chemically inert, rendering it useless.] 這是一種化學發熱貼。能用於治療運動損傷和加熱食物。這已經被使用過了，沒辦法在用了。
[This is a chemistry set stored in a bag.  The contents include glass containers, hoses, metal wire, a hotplate, and safety glasses.  It might be used to craft some chemistry projects if you're so inclined.] 這是個化學儀器套組。裝著許多玻璃罐、軟管、鐵絲、加熱板、與護目鏡。若你需要的話，能夠用來製作一些化學物品。
[This is a chunk of rocket candy that has been lit on fire and burns with a loud hiss, spewing forth large amounts of smoke.] 這塊火箭糖已被點燃，伴隨著響亮的嘶嘶聲噴出大量的煙霧。
[This is a combination of two Dark Age conflict-resolution classics, the broadsword and the torch.  The blade is glowing with heat.  Excalibur can eat its heart out.  Use to shut it off.] 結合了黑暗時代的兩項經典-闊劍和火炬的組合。這把劍正產生高熱。神劍一出誰與爭鋒。使用它能關閉。
[This is a combination of two Dark Age conflict-resolution classics, the broadsword and the torch.  Use to light it up and show those heathen zombies who's Lord around here.] 結合了黑暗時代的兩項經典-闊劍和火炬的組合。把它油門催下去，讓那些異教徒殭屍知道誰是老大。
[This is a common hydraulic jack, used when changing tires.] 這是一個常見的液壓千斤頂，通常在換輪胎時會用到。
[This is a compact and lightweight shaving kit made for travelers.  You can use it to shave if it's supplied with soap.  It requires 1 unit of soap per use.] 
[This is a comparatively-common Japanese short sword.  Smaller and lighter than a katana, but still effective in combat.] 這是一種比較常見的日本短劍。體積更小，比武士刀輕，但在戰鬥中仍然有效。
[This is a complete toolkit made to repair damaged firearms.  Powered by standard batteries, it is a vital tool for long-term firearms maintenance.  It requires 25 charges of battery power per use.] 這是一個用來維修受損槍械的完整工具。利用一般電池供電，這是對槍枝長期保養的重要工具。每次使用需要 25 電量的電池。
[This is a construction tool for drilling through hard rock or other surfaces.  It runs on batteries.  Use it (if loaded) to blast a hole in adjacent solid terrain.] 這是個建築用的工具，能夠鑽破硬石頭或是其他表面。使用這個工具需要消耗電力。使用它來在鄰近地形鑽洞。
[This is a construction tool for drilling through hard rock or other surfaces.  It runs on gasoline.  Use it (if loaded) to blast a hole in adjacent solid terrain.] 這是個建築用的工具，能夠鑽破硬石頭或是其他表面。使用這個工具需要消耗汽油。使用它來在鄰近地形鑽洞。
[This is a cordless drill with a selection of drill bits.  The charger base contains a battery draining attachment so the drill can be charged in lieu of mains power.] 一個充電式的電鑽包含許多種類的鑽頭。充電的元件有著能從一般電池充電的機能。
[This is a crude explosive device triggered by a piece of string.  Use it to setup and watch some poor bastard trigger it.] 由繩子啟動的土製爆炸裝置。使用它來設置並觀賞觸發它的可憐混蛋下場。

[This is a device with a metal tip that can get very hot.  It is necessary for advanced electronics crafting.  You could also use it to cauterize wounds, if you had to.] 可以產生高溫的金屬裝置，用來焊接金屬，必要時也可以用於消毒傷口。

[This is a disposable plastic lighter.  A lighter must be carried to use various drugs, like cigarettes, or to light things like Molotov cocktails.  You can also use a lighter to light nearby items on fire.] 這是一個拋棄式的塑膠打火機。在使用許多東西時會用到打火機，例如香煙，或是點燃某些東西，類似汽油彈。你也能使用打火機來點燃附近的物品。
[This is a dull, cheaply made replica of a huge, curved, two-handed sword from Japan.  It is surprisingly light for its size.] 這是一把便宜的複製品，仿自日本的巨大雙手曲劍。重量出乎意料的輕。

[This is a flattened stone affixed to a stick.  It works passably well as a shovel but really can't compare to a real shovel.] 一根木棍連結一石片，功能類似鏟子，但與真正的鏟子差太多。
[This is a flexible rubber hose.  It could be used for crafting, or siphoning fuel from a vehicle.] 一條有彈性的橡膠軟管。能夠用在製作物品，或是從車輛油桶抽取汽油。
[This is a funnel used to collect rainwater.  Use it outside and place a container beneath it to collect water when it rains.] 這是一個能夠用來收集雨水的漏斗。在室外使用後並且在下方放個容器就能夠收集雨水。
[This is a glass vial, split into two chambers.  The divider is removable, which will cause the chemicals to mix.  If this mixture is exposed to air (perhaps by throwing the vial) they will spill out as a pool of potent acid.] 這是一個有兩個艙室的玻璃小瓶。當分隔插梢拔出後，兩個艙室的化學液體便混合在一起。若混合物暴露在空氣中 (也許是投擲出去) 就會濺出成為酸液灘。
[This is a glass vial, with two chemicals mixing inside.  The vial feels colder and the contents are frothing.  If this mixture is exposed to air (as could happen if you throw the vial), it will spill out as a pool of potent acid.] 一個有玻璃小瓶，內有由兩種化學物質混合的液體。其中的液體溫度下降並且在冒泡。若混合物暴露在空氣中 (當你投擲出小瓶) 將會開始成為強酸性的液體。
[This is a grenade that generates a electromagnetic pulse with a tiny nuclear explosion.  Use this item to pull the pin and light the fuse, turning it into an active EMP grenade.  You will then have three turns before it detonates, creating an EMP field that damages robots and drains bionic energy.] 這個手榴彈爆炸後會產生小型核彈般的電子脈衝。使用這個物品時會拉開插梢並點燃導火線。緊接著你有三回合的時間，之後它就會炸開並產生電磁脈衝，這將會破壞附近的機器人以及吸取生化插件能量。
[This is a hand-blown glass pipe.  It's of the type most commonly used to smoke recreational substances.] 這是一個人工吹制的玻璃管。常用於吸毒品。
[This is a hand-carved wooden smoking pipe.  It's designed to facilitate consumption of fire cured tobacco leaves.] 一個手工雕刻的木製煙管，用來促進菸草工業發展的器具。
[This is a hand-forged collapsible tool that has two axe heads and sharp shovel-like tip on one end.  It can be used as a shovel, or you could chop some zombies with it instead.] 這是一個手工鑄造的可伸縮工具，為鏟子兩端加上斧頭的設計。能夠做為鏟子用，或是拿來砍一些殭屍。
[This is a heating element with pot and frame for holding coffee or other powders.  It's got a battery compartment for use when the power goes out.  You can use it to make coffee, or other drinks if you so choose.] 這是一個具有用來承裝咖啡或其它粉末的壺及架子組合而成的加熱元件。它有一個當沒市電供給時可用來放置電池的空間。你可以用它來製作咖啡，或你所選的其它飲料。

You could also wield it to bash some heads in.] 這是一根沉重的多重用途工具，在消防員，執法和軍事救援單位被廣泛的使用。可以不破壞的打開大門，或是撬開人孔蓋。你也可以用它來敲掉一些頭。
[This is a hefty prying tool.  Use it to open locked doors without destroying them or to lift manhole covers.  You could also wield it to bash some heads in.] 戰慄時空遊戲中主角高登弗里曼手持的神器。用這個物品能夠在不破壞的前提下撬開鎖住的門，或是移開人孔蓋。你也可以手持它來把某人的頭打爆。

[This is a high-powered stun gun.  Use this item to attempt to electrocute an adjacent enemy, damaging and temporarily paralyzing them.  Because the shock can actually jump through the air, it is difficult to miss.] 威力強大的電擊槍，用它可電暈或癱瘓鄰近的敵人。電流還能通過空氣傳導，所以很難失手。
[This is a highly modified EMP grenade, designed to scramble robots' IFF control chips, rather than destroy them.  This converts the robot to your side for a short time, before the backup systems kick in.  Use this item to pull the pin and light the fuse, turning it into an active scrambler grenade.] 這是一個高度改造的電磁脈衝手榴彈，能夠干擾機器人的控制晶片，而非摧毀。在其備份系統回復前，會變成你的友軍。使用這個物品會拉開插梢並點燃導火線，讓它成為啟動狀態。
[This is a home-made explosive device, consisting of a large plastic jug filled with black gunpowder and scrap metal, equipped with a long fuse.  Use this item to light the fuse.  Should explode in no more than five turns...] 這是一個自製的爆炸裝置，由一個裝滿黑火藥和廢金屬的大塑料罐製成，上面插著根長長的引信。使用這個物品來點燃引信。大概不超過5回合就會爆炸了...

The gas burners attached to this blade can really turn up the heat on your foes.  Use to ignite.] 這把武士刀刀鋒邊緣有著汽油噴嘴。人們都喜歡火，也喜歡武士刀，那麼乾脆合在一起好了!? 把噴燈裝上這把刀產生的高溫就能讓你的敵人吱吱叫了! 使用它來點火。

[This is a large, two-handed wood axe.  It makes a good melee weapon, but is a bit slow to recover between swings.] 這是一把大型的雙手伐木斧。能夠作為良好的揮擊武器，但是再次揮動速度很慢。

[This is a light-emitting circuit wired directly to some batteries.  It will provide some weak light once activated and can't be turned off..  When the batteries die, you'll need to scrap it to recover the components that are reusable.] 這是塊直接將電池連接到某些發光電路上的組件。它一旦被開啟就會提供一些微弱的光，且無法關閉。當電池用完的話，你可以拆了它來回收些零件。
[This is a lighter featuring a flip top cover and refuelable tank.  A lighter must be carried to use various drugs, like cigarettes, or to light things like Molotov cocktails.  You can also use a lighter to light nearby items on fire.] 這是一個翻蓋式的可充填打火機。多種藥物，以及香煙，汽油彈的好朋友。你同時也能用打火機來點燃附近的物品。這個打火機有著能夠重新充填燃料的設計。
[This is a lighter featuring a flip top cover and refuelable tank.  It is lit.] 這是一個翻蓋式的可充填打火機。它現在是點燃的。
[This is a little metal tank for holding charcoal with a pilot light attached.  You could use it for cooking food.] 
[This is a locksmith's set of sturdy steel lock picks and torsion wrenches.  It is essential for silently and quickly opening locks, provided you have some mechanical skill.] 這是一副鎖匠的開鎖工具。想安靜迅速的打開鎖必定少不了，前提是你要有一定的機械技能。
[This is a long and thin knife with a spring-loaded blade that rests inside the handle while not in use.] 這是一把長而薄的刀子，在握把加入了彈簧收納的機制，在不用的時候可以收起刀子。
[This is a lumbering tool moonlighting as weapon of opportunity.  If loaded with batteries, using this item will cause it to turn on, turning it into a very powerful but unwieldy melee weapon.] 這是一把笨重的伐木工具，但你也可以把它當作武器。如果裡面還有電池，它就可以變成一把非常強大，但笨重的近戰武器。
[This is a lumbering tool moonlighting as weapon of opportunity.  If loaded with gas, using this item will cause it to turn on, turning it into a very powerful but unwieldy melee weapon.] 這是一把笨重的伐木工具，但你也可以把它當作武器。如果裡面還有燃料，打開它就可變成一把非常強大，但笨重的近戰武器。
[This is a machete attached laterally to a motor, with a tripwire controlling its throttle.  When the tripwire is pulled, the blade is swung around with great force.  The trap forms a 3x3 area of effect.] 開山刀連接在馬達上，而絆索控制著馬達油門，當絆索被觸發，強力的馬達會帶動開山刀旋轉撕砍，形成一格 3x3 區域的殺傷範圍。
[This is a magnifying glass.  May be useful for starting fires during sunny skies.] 這是一個放大鏡，或許可以用來在太陽光下用來點火。
[This is a makeshift fish trap made from plastic bottles.  It's simple, even primitive, but easy to use.  The principle of action: the fish swims inside for bait, but can't get out.  Not humane, prohibited by law, but there are no cops left to care.] 這是一個以塑膠瓶手工製作的捉魚器具。簡單又原始，但容易使用。原理: 魚為吃餌游進瓶內，但出不去。不人道且於法不容，但這裡早就沒有警察了。
[This is a makeshift shaving kit.  You can use it to shave if it's supplied with soap.  It requires 1 unit of soap per use.] 
[This is a massive axe designed for warfare.  Though intended for use as a weapon, it can also be pressed into service as a rather clumsy woodcutting tool.] 這是一把巨大的戰斧。雖然只建議作為武器使用，但也可以當作一把相當拙劣的伐木工具。
[This is a medical listening tool.  Use it to listen to things.  Closely.] 一件醫用工具。靠近物體並使用來進行聆聽。

[This is a military combat knife designed for close quarters conflict.  It is light and extremely sharp, and could be deadly in the right hands.  It could be used to butcher corpses.] 一把用來進行近距離戰鬥的軍用戰鬥刀。非常輕又銳利，能夠在熟手上發揮致命攻擊。也能夠用來屠宰屍體。
[This is a military grade fragmentary hand grenade.  Use this item to pull the pin and light the fuse.  You will then have five turns before it explodes; throwing it would be a good idea.] 這是個軍用的破片手榴彈。使用這個物品時會拉開插梢並點燃導火線。緊接著在它爆炸前，你有五回合的時間把它丟出去。
[This is a military grade incendiary hand grenade.  Use this item to pull the pin and light the fuse.  You will then have five turns before it explodes into a raging inferno; throwing it would be a good idea.] 這是一顆軍規的燃燒手榴彈，使用它來拔掉插銷。在爆炸之前你有五個回合可以把它丟出去。
[This is a military police style flashbang.  Use this item to pull the pin and light the fuse.  You will then have five turns before it detonates with intense light and sound, blinding, deafening and disorienting anyone nearby.] 這是個軍警使用的閃光彈。使用這個物品時會拉開插梢並點燃導火線。緊接著你有五回合的時間把它丟出去。之後它會炸開，附近的所有生物將會被強光與聲響致盲、失聰與混亂。
[This is a military style fold up cot.  While it may not be quite as comfortable as a bed, it's better than slumming it on the ground.] 這是一個軍事風格的折疊床。雖然以床來說它躺起來可能不是很舒服，但總比睡在堅硬的地板上更好。
[This is a pack of 25 firecrackers with a starter fuse.  Use this item to light the fuse.  Of course, you will need a lighter or some matches to do so.  Shortly after you light the fuse they will begin to explode, so throw them quickly!] 一包裝有 25 發鞭炮及引線的物品。使用這個物品將會點燃引線；當然你要有個打火機或是一些火柴才能點火。當點燃後不久將會開始爆炸，所以趕快投擲出去！

[This is a reinforced plastic tonfa; the core is hollowed out and is filled with capacitors and a high-yield rechargeable storage battery.  When a switch on the handle is pressed, a high-voltage current is transmitted to the two electrodes mounted in the end of the tonfa, and by extension to anyone unfortunate enough to be in contact with them.  It also has a nifty flashlight, which is off at the moment.] 這是一個強化的塑膠旋棍，有著中空的結構並裝填入了高功率的可充電電池。當手把上的開關按下時，會產生高電壓電流到旋棍兩端的電極，讓不幸的受害者受到電擊。同時也能當做一個很好的手電筒。目前電源是關閉的。
[This is a reinforced plastic tonfa; the core is hollowed out and is filled with capacitors and a high-yield rechargeable storage battery. It is too small to butcher corpses with.] 小且鋒利的美工刀，主要是用來切割布料或是製作物品時使用。同時具有良好的殺傷力，但是很難命中物體，細小的刀尖很適合高手對付頭部區域。但是 X-Acto 美工刀不適合切割屍體或獵物，因為實在太小把了。

[This mp3 player is turned on and playing some great tunes, raising your morale steadily while on your person.  It runs through batteries quickly; you can turn it off by using it.  It also obscures your hearing.] MP3 播放器開啟並攜帶時後會播放一些超讚的音樂，能夠穩定的提昇你的士氣。但是電池很快就會用完；你可以在不需要的狀況下關閉。開啟時同時也會影響你的聽力。
[This nodachi's massive blade has been coated in diamond-like carbon, making it far more deadly.] 這把薙刀長長刀鋒被鍍上了一層鑽石膜，讓它更加的致命。
[This pipe bomb's fuse is lit, and it will explode any second now.  Throw it immediately!] 鐵管炸彈的引信已經被點燃且隨時可能會爆炸。馬上將它丟出去!
[This plutonium cell has been adapted to fit conventional battery connections.  You can attach it to any battery-operated equipment, converting it to use power off the plutonium cell instead.] 這個鈽電池轉接器能夠連接使用一般電池的裝置。你可以把它連接到任何電池驅動的裝備，把裝備轉換成使用鈽電池。
[This portable radio is turned on, and continually draining its batteries.  It is playing the broadcast being sent from any nearby radio towers.] 這個攜帶式無線電已經開啟電源，將會持續的消耗電力。將會從附近的廣播電塔捕捉任何訊號並播放。
[This printout is a string of numbers to access the elevator in the hazardous waste sarcophagus.] 被印出來的一串代碼，能夠用來存取危險廢物堆放場石棺裡的電梯。
[This pump is suitable for pumping air into inflatable objects.] 這個幫浦是用來幫某些洩了氣的玩意打氣的。
[This remote-controlled car is on, and draining its batteries just like a real electric car!  Use a remote control to drive it around.] 這台遙控車已經開啟，並且正在消耗電力，就像是一個真的電力車！使用遙控車控制器來控制它到處跑。
[This rubber rowboat (oars included) is deflated for storage.  Activate it (having an air pump in inventory) to inflate and launch.] 這個橡膠筏被洩氣了，和槳收納在一起，你如果身上有充氣幫浦的話，可以幫它充氣然後搭乘。
[This scrambler grenade is active, and will soon detonate, releasing a control wave that temporarily converts robots to your side.] 這個干擾手榴彈已經啟動，很快的就會炸開，釋放出控制波，讓附近的機器人短暫成為你的友軍。
[This small piece of electronics can be attached to certain items and activate them after receiving a radio signal.] 
[This smoke bomb has had its pin removed, indicating that it is (or will shortly be) expelling thick smoke.] 這個催淚彈的插梢已被拔出，將會產生濃厚的煙霧。
[This stout combat knife features a steel guard to protect the user's knuckles.  The guard can also be used for striking or blocking, and the knife can also be used to butcher corpses.] 這把粗壯的戰鬥刀採用了金屬護把來保護使用者的指關節。護把同時也可用於攻擊或防禦，這把刀也可用於屠宰屍體。
[This stout fire drill is a simple item for starting fires; it is made from two pieces of wood and some string.  Since it is constructed out of simple materials, it's slow and rather difficult to get a fire started using this tool.] 這個厚實的鑽火器是用來生火的簡單工具，由兩塊木板和一些線組成。也因為構造過於簡單，剛開始用它來生火會既慢且難。
[This sturdy matte black Rivtech combat dagger features a long and slim double-edged blade with a spear-point and a distinctive slip-resistant grip.  Originally manufactured for the military, it was very popular in films and among collectors due to its fearsome appearance.] 這是由Rivtech公司所製造的堅固、透出冰冷氣息的黑色戰鬥匕首，他的特徵在於細長的雙刃刀鋒、長矛狀刀尖、防滑握丙，最初是用來給軍隊裝備，並因為他令人恐懼的外觀在在電影與收藏界中富有盛名。
[This versatile implement is a modern take on a traditional weapon that originated in Nepal.  Featuring a heavy blade with an inwardly curved edge, it is used as both a tool and as a weapon.] 這把刀發源於尼泊爾的傳統武器，並經過現代的重新設計。它的特徵在於刀身非常的重，並且向前內彎，它可以作為工具或武器使用。
[This wavy bladed dagger comes from Southeast Asia.  The design of the blade causes it to make broad, painful wounds.] 這把趴浪狀的匕首來自東南亞，這種刀鋒的設計可以產生切口更大、讓人更痛苦的傷口。
[This zweihander's blade has been coated in diamond-like carbon, making it pack even more of a punch.] 這把德國雙手劍的刀刃被鍍上了一層鑽石膜，讓它揮擊時可以造成更大的衝擊力。

Once the charcoal has purified enough water, it will become unusable and can be disassembled and recycled.  Water taken from uncertain sources like a river may be dirty.] 使用這個物品在裝水的容器就能利用這個物品，來經過層層的木炭過濾來取得淨化的水。當木炭已經過濾了一定量的水後，就不能再使用只能拆解回收。河川之類的的水源有可能是被污染的。

[A bionic of some sort, so badly installed that you cannot even tell what it was originally supposed to be.  Sometimes it itches horribly.] 一個類似生化插件的東西，嚴重的安裝錯誤讓你根本不知道這東西原來是什麼。有時候會突然很癢。
[A combination of poor installation and unpleasant scarring has lead to the malfunctioning bionic catastrophe you call your face.  People who mind that you look like a dime-store Frankenstein will react poorly to your appearance.] 安裝不良和討厭的疤痕的組合，導致你的臉上出現生化插件故障的災難。在意你這比科學怪人更醜的人會對你更反感。
[A malfunctioning bionic which causes occasional visual distortion and pixelation.] 一個故障的生化插件導致偶爾出現視覺失真和像素化。
[A malfunctioning bionic which occasionally discharges acid into your muscles, causing sharp pain and minor damage.] 一個故障的生化插件讓你偶爾出現釋放酸液到肌肉的狀況，造成銳利的疼痛以及輕微的傷害。
[A malfunctioning bionic which occasionally discharges electricity through your body, causing pain and brief paralysis but no damage.] 一個故障的生化插件讓你偶爾出現放電的狀況，造成疼痛以及麻痺，但是沒有傷害。
[A malfunctioning bionic.  It doesn't perform any useful function, but will occasionally draw power from your batteries.] 一個故障的生化插件。沒有甚麼有用的功能，只會讓你偶爾出現能量流失的狀況。
[A malfunctioning bionic.  It will occasionally emit a loud burst of noise.] 一個故障的生化插件。偶爾會產生 你在大聲甚麼啦 的噪音。
[A poorly-wired bionic which fails to serve its intended purpose, this malfunctioning device periodically short-circuits, causing systemic muscle tremors.] 一個亂接一通的生化插件無法正常的工作，這個故障的裝置定期會短路，造成全身肌肉抽搐。

[You are equipped with bionic stimulators which augment your haematopoiesis system, allowing you to accelerate white blood cell production using bionic power.] 你裝置了能夠刺激白血球生長數量的造血系統，讓你能夠透過使用生化能量來加快體內白血球的製造。
[You have a unified power system wired into your power banks.  Objects that run on a UPS can now draw directly from your internal power supply.] 你體內的能量庫現在裝了一個UPS，使用UPS作為能量的物品現在可以直接使用你體內的能量。
[You have been equipped with an internal atomic clock, ensuring that you will always know the current time.  Additionally, it includes a silent alarm clock function.] 你的體內裝了一個原子鐘讓你隨時都知道現在的時間，除此之外，它還附加了一個靜音鬧鐘的功能。
[You shouldn't see this.] 
[You will likely spend the rest of your days serving as a walking testament to why you don't hold loose parts in your mouth while installing a CBM.  Accidentally swallowing that remodulator unit has given you a creepy robot voice.] 接下來的日子你每天都會想著，為什麼當初安裝CBM的時候沒有拿好鬆動的下巴了。不小心吞下插件的結果讓你說話變成詭異的機械人聲。
[You're really not sure how the CBM ended up in your nose, but no matter how it got there this badly misplaced bionic makes it difficult to breathe.  Increases mouth encumbrance by one.] 你真的不知道為什麼最後CBM會跑去你的鼻子，不管怎樣，這個東西讓你很不好呼吸。增加嘴巴累贅1點。
[Your entire body may resonate at very high power, creating a short-range shockwave.  While it will not do much damage to creatures, stiff items such as walls and doors will be damaged.] 
[Your eyes have quick-reacting transition lenses installed over them.  They negate glare penalties, partially protect you from bright flashes, and protect your eyes when welding.] 你的雙眼覆蓋了一對高功率快速反應的鏡片，能夠防止任何閃光炫光對與視覺的傷害，焊接時就不需要護目鏡了。
[Your left arm has been replaced by a heavy-duty fusion blaster!  You may use your energy banks to fire a damaging heat ray; however, you are unable to use or carry two-handed items, and may only fire handguns.] 你的左臂被改造成重型核融合砲！你能夠耗用體內的能量庫來射出破壞性的雷射光束；然而你無法使用或攜帶雙手武器，只能拿手槍。

[A fond memory of throating some prey animal bubbles up.] 一個割斷某些獵物的美好記憶冒了出來。
[A rather attractive triffid offers you a bouquet of ape heads.  How thoughtful!] 一株迷人的食人花送給你一個用猿猴的頭組成的花束，多體貼阿。
[A terrifyingly real dream has you killing game with your bare teeth.] 你做了一個你用牙齒進行殺戮的嚇人夢境。
[A warm, sunny spot high up where you can watch your prey.  What a great dream!] 一個溫暖高高掛的太陽讓你能夠觀察你的獵物。真是好棒的夢！
[After an exciting and tasty hunt, you retire to your nest.  Mmm, yes, nest.] 經過了刺激與美味的狩獵，你回到了你的巢。嗯，沒錯，巢。
[Ah, the painting-the-planet dream again.  Maybe if you assimilated more...] 恩，又是一個關於彩繪整個星球的夢，如果你能夠了解更多就好了...
[Ah, the wolf-slaying dream again.  That's a good one...] 喔，又夢到把野狼殺光光了，真不錯。
[As you dream, your reflection looks rather catlike.] 在夢裡，你不自覺地走起了貓步。
[Boing! and you've pounced another yummy critter.] ㄉㄨㄞ！你現在撲到另外一隻可口的小動物身上了。
[FIGHT.  FEED.  FORWARD.] 戰鬥。進食。前進。
[For some reason you dream of your shoes.  They don't fit, and nothing seems to help...] 不知為何你夢見你的鞋子。變得不合腳，而且你不知道怎麼辦...
[Hoof.  Talon.  Tooth.  Fight.  Feed.  Forward.] 
[In a dream you catch a glimpse of a strangely cattle-like image of yourself.] 在夢中你瞥見自己的牛模樣的身影。
[In a dream, you see a curiously birdlike reflection of yourself.] 在夢裡，你看到了你好奇的鳥兒倒影。
[In your dream you see a group of rats that look almost like yourself.] 在你的夢中你看到一群長得像自己的老鼠。
[In your dream you see a very spiderlike version of yourself.] 你在夢中看到蜘蛛版本的自己。
[In your dream you see an odd, slimy reflection of yourself.] 你在夢中看見自己黏糊糊的奇怪身影。
[In your dream, you see a strangely fishlike image of yourself.] 在夢中，你看到了你的樣子是像魚一樣。
[In your dream, you stalk and kill a young wolf, using only your teeth and claws.] 在你的夢中，你追蹤並獵殺了一頭幼狼，只用了你身上的牙與爪。
[Mmm.  The shellfish dream again.  Yum!] 又夢到吃了一堆貝類，真可口。
[NO! You will not allow this corruption to prevail!] 不！你絕對不允許這腐敗佔上風！
[Non-Mycus sometimes reject the Marloss.  Our colonial efforts flourish with broad-minded guidance.] 非馬庫斯有時候會拒絕馬洛斯. 我們殖民的努力總算因心胸寬大的指導而開花結果
[Oh, you should really patrol your territory again, maybe expand.] 欸，你應該再巡視一下你的領土，或許應該擴張了。
[Oh.  No, that 'rex' thing was only a myth.] 不，雷克斯暴龍難道只是一個神話？
[Our colonists are limitless.  We shall adapt to this world, as we adapt to all.] 我們有成千上萬的殖民者，我們可以適應這個世界，就像我們適應其他的東西一樣。
[Red, blue, and yellow add together, don't they?] 紅色，藍色和黃色會互相混合，不是嗎？
[Red, blue, and yellow cancel each other out, don't they?] 紅色，藍色和黃色會互相抵銷，不是嗎？
[The Fury is so big! it's GONNA GET YOAAAAAH! *pant* only a dream.] 哇靠！這隻Fury也太大了，它就要追到我了.....（喘），呼，還好只是一場夢。
[The herd moves along and you with them, finding greener pastures.] 你飼養的牲畜跟著你四處移動，找尋水草更豐富的牧場。
[The seething masses attempt to wall non-Mycus away from the Marloss.  We will adapt and defeat them.] 極度憤怒的群眾嘗試將非馬庫斯與馬洛斯隔離。我們會適應並且擊敗他們。
[The thought of being out of water, forced to crawl unsupported, terrifies you.] 一想到你掉進水裡，沒有任何東西給你抓，你就感到一陣恐懼。
[The transition from your lifelike dreams of living as a plant to reality shocks you.] 你因為夢境中自己變成植物的真實性而嚇到。
[The walking plants seek to harness us as a food source.  We will not allow that.] 這種會行走的植物看起來無害，而且是一種好的食物來源，但我不允許這種植物存在。

[wood stove] 柴爐

[yellow indoor plant] 黃色室內植物
[A chainsaw may seem like a great weapon, but remember that they're slow, unwieldy, and very noisy.] 鏈鋸看起來是很好的武器，但是使用時速度很慢，不好拿，而且又很吵。
[A good submachine gun can't be beat.  Most of them use common ammo, they're good at short and long range, and you can burst-fire if you need to!] 你無法抗拒衝鋒槍的好。大部分的衝鋒槍都是通用彈藥，在近中距離很好用，而且還能連發！
[BB guns may seem like a joke, but they've got their uses.  They're good for hunting small game, or getting to know the basics of rifles.] BB槍看起來像是搞笑武器，但是也是有它的用處。在進行小動物狩獵時很有用，同時也能當做練習步槍技能的工具。
[Backpacks let you carry lots of stuff, but they limit your movement a lot.  If you're an unarmed fighter, don't wear one!] 背包能讓你背負許多東西，但是也限制了你的行動。假如你走肉搏路線，最好是別帶！
[Be careful eating wild mushrooms.  Some are poisonous, and others can make you hallucinate.] 食用野生蘑菇時要小心。某些會讓你中毒，或是讓你產生幻覺。
[Be careful of drinking water from rivers and stuff, it's a good way to get sick.  But if you have a water purifier, it'll make it safe.] 從河裡或其他地方喝水要小心，很容易讓你生病。但若你有淨水器的話，就可以安心了。
[Bear traps are a nice way to cover an escape.  If you place one in a doorway, the first zombie through will get stuck, and the rest won't be able to get past!] 捕獸夾是用來掩護脫逃的好東西。若是你放一個在走廊上，走在最前面的殭屍被夾到後，其他的殭屍就會被堵住！
[Bubblewrap is pretty harmless, but setting it up around you before going to sleep will keep you from waking up to a zombie punching you.] 泡泡紙相當無害，但是在你睡覺時設置在四周，能夠讓你在被殭屍包圍前醒來。
[Carrying a lighter is something all veterans do.  It takes up almost no space, and can easily save your life.] 老手都會帶個打火機。打火機不佔空間而且還能救你的命。
[Crossbows are a great weapon for long term use.  Most of the time, you can retrieve the bolt after shooting it, so running out of ammo is less of a concern.] 十字弓是很適合長期使用的武器。大部分的情況，你都能夠在射擊後重新取回箭矢，所以不太需要擔心彈藥用盡的問題。
[Crowbars not only make a pretty good weapon, they're also useful for opening locked doors and lifting manhole covers.] 撬棍不只是能當武器，同時也能撬開鎖住的門以及移開人孔蓋。
[Don't fire your gun if you can help it--the noise attracts monsters!] 萬不得已盡量別用槍--槍聲會引來更多怪物！
[Don't light a Molotov until you're ready to throw it.  Not only can they go out, but if you accidentally drop it or something, you're in trouble.] 在你沒打算投擲汽油彈前不要點燃。因為汽油彈不只丟擲出去有作用，要是你不小心掉在地上的話，你就糟了。
[Don't relax after killing a giant worm.  Little bits of them can break off and still attack!] 殺了巨蟲也不要鬆懈。某些巨蟲能夠分裂並繼續攻擊！
[Don't try to take on a skeleton with a bladed weapon... you'll just leave scratch marks.  You've got to shatter those bones with a hammer or something.] 別試著用刀劍之類的砍劈武器來攻擊骷髏怪... 你只能對他們造成刮痕。你必須用類似鎚子的鈍擊武器來把他們敲成碎片。
[Don't underestimate a good book.  Not only will it keep you company on lonely nights, but you can learn a hell of a lot from some of them.] 不要小看一本好書。它不僅能陪伴你度過寂寞的夜晚，而且某些書還能讓你學到超多的好東西。
[Don't use Molotovs indoors.  Especially in a liquor store.] 不要在室內使用汽油彈。尤其是在酒類專賣店。
[Ever go toe-to-toe with a manhack?  Tiny little helicopters covered in knives.  Best be packing a shotgun!] 絕對不要肉搏鋸鳥！他們是小小的直升機卻裝滿了刀子。用散彈槍把他擊落吧！
[Ever run into those big worm things?  If you see trails of churned-up dirt, you can be sure they're around.] 有看過巨大的蟲嗎？若是你在附近有看到黏液的軌跡，那麼肯定在附近。
[For a good melee weapon, you can't beat a machete.  I've seen a guy take down a zombie brute with one!  Of course, if you can find a katana, that might be even better...] 作為一件良好的近戰武器，你無法抗拒開山刀的誘惑。我曾見過有個傢伙用開山刀幹掉一整群殭屍！當然，你要是能找到武士刀的話，那就更好了...
[Have you heard about those queen triffids?  You gotta keep your distance from them, unless you like having a tree grow right through your chest.] 你有聽過王后食人樹嗎？你最好跟他們保持距離，除非你想要胸膛被樹刺穿。
[Have you seen those eyebots flying around?  It's hard to say, but some faction's controlling them--maybe the military.  All I know is, I don't want them taking my picture...] 你有沒有看過飛行中的眼球機器人？我不確定是不是有某些派系在控制--也許是軍隊。我所知道的，就是不要讓他們照我相片。
[Have you seen those weird science labs out in the middle of nowhere?  I think you need some kind of special ID card to get in.] 你有看過那些出現在奇怪位置的實驗室嗎？我看你要拿到一些特殊的ID卡才能進入。
[Here's a trick for taking care of a huge swarm of zombies chasing you: head into a liquor store, shoot out as many bottles as you can, then light the alcohol on fire.  Then duck out the back door, and watch the zombies run into a burning building!] 教你個搞定殭屍海的技巧:跑到酒類專賣店，盡可能多打破一些瓶子，然後把酒點燃。接著就躲到後門去，等著看殭屍跑到火燒屋送死！
[Houses can be a surprisingly good resource for all kinds of stuff; clothing, medication, food, books, and more.] 房屋裡有各種出乎意料的物資；衣物、藥品、食物、書籍等等。
[Hunting rifles are great at long range, but suck close up.  Plus, most of them don't carry many rounds.  Keep a pistol as a sidearm if you use a rifle.] 來福獵槍是長程攻擊的利器，但是近距離可說是廢物。此外，大部分都沒有高容量彈匣。所以若是你要用的話，最好帶把副武器類似手槍來當做副武器。
[I figured out how to take care of those triffids!  Let me just say this: they're made of wood, and wood and fire don't mix.] 我知道怎麼對付這些食人樹了！我就這麼說吧：他們是木質的，乾柴烈火。
[I have a buddy who was sleeping in this cabin way out in the woods, when he suddenly woke up to trees and vines growing right up through the floor and walls!  He said it was some kind of huge triffid making it happen...] 我有個朋友在遠離塵囂的森林小屋中睡覺時，他突然醒來發現樹與籐蔓生長刺穿了地板與牆壁！他說這是某種巨大的食人樹造成的...
[I heard about this group that raided a bee hive a while ago.  Everyone got massacred but one, and he came home with this weird, magic honey stuff.] 我聽說不久前有隊人馬有去劫掠蜂巢。結果最後只剩下一個人活著回家，還帶著一種類似蜂蜜的奇特東西。
[I know grocery stores and stuff are full of fruit, but be careful, it's probably rotten.] 我知道雜貨店有很多水果，但是有可能是腐爛掉的。
[I know it's tempting to just go full-auto and unload as many bullets as possible, but don't except as a last resort.  It's inaccurate and wastes ammo.] 我知道槍械開連發來狂射子彈是很爽的，但是盡量當做最後的手段使用。因為命中率不高而且浪費子彈。
[I know they look dumb, but wearing a fanny pack gives you that extra bit of storage without encumbering you.] 我知道看起來很土，但是戴個腰包能夠讓你有額外的儲物空間而且又不會造成累贅。
[I once knew a guy who figured he'd survive a night in the subway by setting fires blocking off the tunnel in both directions and sleeping between them.  He wound up asphyxiating on the smoke.] 我知道有某個天才想到了為了安全的在地下鐵過夜，所以生了火在通道口兩方，而自己睡在中間。結果他最後因為煙塵窒息而死。
[I've found more good weapons in hardware stores than anywhere else.  Except gun stores, of course.] 我在五金行找到比其他地方更多的好武器。當然要是找到槍械商店就更好了。
[I've seen a couple guys running around with laser pistols.  They seem like the perfect weapon... quiet, accurate, and deadly.  But I've never found one, and I bet ammo is wicked scarce...] 我曾看過有人拿過雷射手槍。看起來好像是完美的武器... 安靜，準確，又致命。但是我從來就沒拿到過，而且我猜彈藥一定很稀少...
[I've spent many nights in the changing rooms at the back of clothing stores.  Walls on four sides, far from the store's entrance, a corridor for easy defense... it's perfect!] 我曾在服飾店的更衣間安然度過好幾個夜晚。四面都有牆、遠離店門口、易於防守的狹窄走廊... 真完美！
[I've thought about raiding an ant hill before, but I realized it wasn't worth the risk.  I doubt they have any loot beyond some scraps of food, you know?] 我之前有想到要劫掠蟻穴，但是我意識到不值得冒這個險。我想那邊應該不會有什麼值得拿的東西，懂嗎？
[If there's a bunch of zombies in a straight line, try unloading a burst from your gun.  Be sure to aim at the zombie furthest away; you'll hit more of them that way.] 要是有一群殭屍在一直線上，試著使用槍械的連發模式來射擊。利用瞄準最遠的一隻殭屍，來達到掃射其他殭屍的效果。
[If there's a pool of acid blocking your way, trying tossing a junk item into it.  Eating up items will help neutralize the acid faster.] 假如有一灘酸液擋住你的去路，試著丟個垃圾物品上去。酸蝕物品會讓酸液中和速度加快。
[If you can spare the space, you might want to carry a fire extinguisher along.  Nothing is worse than being trapped in a burning building!] 假如你能騰出空間，你也許會想帶支滅火器。被困在失火中的建築是很糟糕的。
[If you get a pair of night vision goggles, hold on to them!  A flashlight will give you away, but with goggles you can be sneaky.] 要是你拿到夜視鏡，好好留著！手電筒會暴露你的位置，夜視鏡卻能讓你潛行。
[If you need a bunch of rags for making Molotov cocktails, take a pair of scissors to an old t-shirt or something.] 假如你需要一些布條來做汽油彈，帶著剪刀跟舊T恤之類的就行了。
[If you need to, you can swim across a river to escape; most monsters can't swim.  Just make sure you drop as much stuff as possible first, and maybe strip naked, or you'll sink like a rock.] 假使有必要的話，你可以利用游泳過河來脫逃；大部分的怪物都不會游泳。只是要先確認你東西沒有帶太多，或乾脆直接脫光光，不然你會立刻像石頭沉到水裡。
[If you run into a zombie hulk, it's probably a good idea to run.  They're fast as hell, but pretty dumb; they'll try to smash through obstacles rather than going around, and that slows them down a lot.] 要是你被殭屍浩克發現，你最好是快逃。他的速度雖然很快，但是很笨；他們追擊時會砸爛擋路的所有東西，反而會讓他們速度減緩很多。
[If you see a big mob of zombies coming, RUN!  Trying to fight them all is suicide unless you have a big tactical advantage.] 要是你看到一大群的殭屍接近，快逃！若是你沒有戰術優勢的話，想要挑戰全部的殭屍根本是自殺。
[If you shoot a zombie, but don't quite kill it, try to finish it off with a punch or something instead of wasting a bullet.] 假如你射中了殭屍，但是還沒殺掉，可以試著用拳頭或是其他不浪費彈藥的方法來結束它。
[If you're getting chased by a hoard of zombies, try ducking into the subways and traveling a block or two, then coming back up.] 假如你被殭屍海追，試著躲到地下鐵並走了一兩步，然後再回到地面。
[If you're going to be playing with Molotov cocktails around a gas station, just make sure you're a long way from those pumps.] 假如你打算在加油站附近玩汽油彈，先確定你離汽油泵夠遠。
[If you're in a corridor or something, and there's a bunch of zombies chasing you down it, try to wound the guy in front badly.  He'll start moving slow and cause a serious traffic jam!] 若是你在狹窄的走廊之類的地方，而有一大堆殭屍在追你，試著把最前面一隻打成重傷。它的移動速度會降低而造成後方交通阻塞！
[If you're planning on wandering around the sewers--not that you'd have a reason too--watch out for those fish.  Those suckers are fast, and vicious too!] 要是你打算到下水道晃--你最好有個原因再去--小心那些魚。那個混蛋游很快，而且也有毒！
[If you're spending the night in a dangerous area, grab a shovel and dig pits all around your camp.] 若是你在危險的地方過夜，帶把鏟子把你的營地的四周挖坑吧。
[If you're wandering in the wilderness, or following a road, keep an eye out for wild strawberries or blueberries.] 如果你在荒野上漫遊，或是沿著公路時，可以看看有沒有野生草莓或藍莓可以撿。
[If you're weak or clumsy, it might be a good idea not to mess with Molotovs or grenades.  Accidentally dropping them when you meant to throw them could be deadly.] 要是你力氣不大或是很笨拙，你最好不要亂玩汽油彈或是手榴彈。想投擲出去卻不小心掉到地上會害死自己。
[In a lot of places, there's little hallways connecting the subways with the sewers, with heavy metal doors on both ends.  It's a perfect place to sleep!] 在許多地點，有著狹窄的走廊，連接了地下鐵與下水道，兩端都是沈重的金屬門。是睡覺的好地點！
[It's a good idea to butcher corpses if you have the time, even if you don't plan on eating them.  I've seen these weird zombies bring their friends back from the dead!] 當你有時間時，屠宰屍體是個好主意，就算你沒有要去吃他們。我就見過這些詭異的殭屍把他們倒地的同伴又喚醒了！
[It's a good idea to carry around a couple of empty bottles.  You can fill them up with water, gasoline, or whatever!] 隨身帶數個空瓶子很好用。你可以用來裝水、汽油、之類的東西！
[It's good to keep a filter mask or gas mask handy.  You never know when you'll have to go into a smoke-filled room or something.] 身上最好帶著過濾面罩或是防毒面具。你永遠不知道何時你會需要進入滿是煙霧的房間之類的環境。
[It's good to keep a pistol handy, in case your main gun runs out of ammo or something.  They're also better than most guns at short range.] 為了防止主武器用完子彈之類的問題，最好還是帶把手槍。手槍在近距離的能力還是比大部分的槍好。
[It's not like in the movies--shooting a gas pump won't make it explode.  But it WILL make it leak all over the place, which is a definite fire hazard.] 不像電影--射擊汽油泵並不會爆炸。只會讓汽油流的到處都是，容易造成火災。
[Liquor stores are a great place to pick up non-alcoholic beverages, too.  Not that I mind alcohol!] 酒類專賣店也是個拿非酒類飲料的好地方。雖然我也不介意拿點酒啦！
[Most gun stores follow pretty similar layouts.  The restricted stuff--SMGs, assault rifles, and most importantly ammo--are always behind the counter.] 大部分的槍械商店有著類似的佈置。一些受管制的東西--衝鋒槍，突擊步槍，和最重要的彈藥--通常都放在櫃檯後方。
[Next time you visit a grocery store, load up on canned goods.  They never go bad!] 下次你拜訪雜貨店的時候，拿些罐頭吧。不會腐敗喔！
[Oh man, have you gone down into the old subway systems?  I'd be careful... there's these things down there that are like zombies, but tougher.] 兄弟，你有沒有下去過舊的地下鐵系統？我會很小心... 那裡有一些類似殭屍的東西，但是更強。
[Shotguns are nice; you can take out lots of baddies with a single shot.  Just remember that they're noisy as hell, and you might end up attracting more than you kill.] 散彈槍很讚；你能用一槍就幹掉一群壞東西。只是要記得這東西會產生很大的噪音，可能會引來更多殺不完的怪物。
[Skeletons are a tough target.  They're so skinny and full of holes that bullets fired at them will usually just fly right past.] 骷髏怪是很難搞的目標。他們很瘦並且佈滿孔洞，所以子彈常常打不中。
[Skeletons are too delicate to smash through doors or windows.  They also can't smell you, unlike zombies, so if you turn your light off at night you can sneak right past.] 骷髏怪太柔弱所以砸不開門窗。他們也不能聞到你的氣味，不像一般的殭屍一樣，所以你在夜晚時把燈關上就能夠繞過去。
[Ski goggles are a great choice if you're worried about getting stuff in your eyes.  Perfect for dealing with boomers!] 滑雪護目鏡是你擔心眼睛中招的好選擇。對付嘔吐者非常好用。
[Sledge hammers may seem like a great weapon, but swinging them is really slow, and you won't do much damage unless you're really strong.] 大鎚看起好像很強，但是揮舞起來卻很慢，而且你要是不夠強壯的話也無法造成太多傷害。
[Smoke grenades aren't really offensive weapons, but they'll cover up your scent and hide you from view--perfect for making a quick escape.] 煙霧彈並不是用來進攻的武器，但是能夠用來掩護你避免被看見--是完美的快速脫逃工具。
[Squirrels are pretty yummy, but if you shoot them with a high-powered gun you'll probably be left with no meat!  Use a BB gun or maybe a .22 rifle.] 松鼠很好吃，但是如果你用高傷害的槍械來攻擊他們的話，大概什麼都不留了！用BB槍或是.22口徑步槍吧。
[Standing behind a window is a good tactic.  It takes zombies a long time to crawl through, giving you lots of opportunities to hit them.] 站在窗戶後是很好的戰略。殭屍爬窗很花時間，讓你有很大的機率擊中他們。
[There's basically no reason not to wear safety glasses... nothing is worse than taking a hit to the eyes and getting blinded for a few seconds.] 基本上沒有不戴護目鏡的理由... 沒有什麼比被擊中眼睛造成失明更慘的了。
[There's snakes down in most of the old sewer systems.  They're slow on land, but boy, those suckers can swim fast!] 大部分的舊下水道系統都有蛇。他們在陸地上走很慢，但是，這些混蛋游泳游的很快！
[There's this type of zombie that can shoot bolts of lightning!  Stay away from walls and stuff when they do... the electricity can travel along solid surfaces.] 還有殭屍是能夠發射閃電的！離牆壁或其他物品遠點... 因為電能夠透過其他固體傳導。
[They're rare, but molebots are nasty things.  They bore through the ground, then pop up to stab ya.  Still, you're safe from them if you stay on pavement...] 雖然很少遇到，但是地鼠機器人很討厭。它們能夠鑽入地底，然後衝出地表來刺你。當然，你待在硬路面就安全了...
[This guy I know was walking through the subway when he came across a giant rift in the earth, with lava far below.  Weird, huh?] 我認識有一個人曾經去過地下鐵然後遇到地面有個大裂縫，地底居然有岩漿。很詭異吧？
[Those acid-spitting zombies are pretty nasty, but if you're smart, you can get other zombies to wade through the acid.] 那些會噴酸液的殭屍非常討厭，但是如果你夠聰明的話，可以利用來殺傷其他殭屍。
[Triffids are tough.  They've got natural armor, and it takes a lot to bring them down.  I don't recommend getting into a fight with them.] 食人樹很強。他們有天然的護甲，所以要付出更多代價才能打倒。我不建議跟他們對戰。
[Triffids can't see!  They figure out where you are by your smell, but if you mask it with smoke or something, you're as good as invisible.] 食人樹看不見！他們是利用嗅覺來判斷你的方位，但是你若使用煙霧彈或是一些東西就能夠遮蔽，你就等於是隱形了。
[Try not to kill a boomer if it's standing right next to you.  They tend to explode when they die, and that pink goop will get all over you.] 試著不要殺掉站在你旁邊的嘔吐者。他們會在死掉時爆炸，讓你被粉紅黏液噴的滿身都是。
[Try to go around swamps, if you can.  Some of them have sinkholes that can pull you right underground.] 試著繞過沼澤。某些沼澤中有陷落坑，會把你拉到地底。
[Try to stay on the roads as much as you can.  Giant worms can't cross them!] 試著盡量走在馬路上，因為巨蟲沒有辦法穿過馬路！
[Watch out for those zombies that shriek; they'll let other zombies know where you are, and will attract them from all over.] 小心會尖叫的殭屍；他們會讓其他殭屍知道你在哪，並且會從四面八方吸引過來。
[When it comes to footwear, you've got two basic choices as far as I see it; sneakers, for running extra fast, or boots for durability.  Depends on your style, I guess.] 說到腳上穿的，我目前知道你有兩種基本的選擇；運動鞋，能夠跑的更快，或是靴子，更耐用。端看你想要走哪種路線。
[While there's not much to loot, gas stations are a good source for gasoline, to power tools or to make Molotov cocktails.] 雖然不多，但加油站是汽油的好來源，能夠讓動力工具或汽油彈工作。
[You don't really need to wear gloves most of the time, but once in a while they'll really come in handy.] 大部分的時候你並不一定要戴手套，但是有需要時很有用。
[You know what makes a nice weapon?  Take a two by four, or a baseball bat or something, and stick a bunch of nails through the end!] 你知道好武器怎麼做的嗎？拿個 2x4 木材，棒球棍或是其他的，並加上一盒釘子釘在尾端！
[You know, a glass bottle can make a good weapon in a pinch.  If you break it over someone's head, the shattering glass will hurt them extra.  Of course, it might hurt your hands, too...] 你知道嗎，玻璃瓶也能夠當做一個很好的近戰武器。若是你拿去敲某人的頭，玻璃破片會造成額外的傷害。當然，也可能會傷到你的手掌...
[You know, you don't have to go full auto with an assault rifle.  Firing single shots is more accurate and efficient!] 你知道嗎，你拿突擊步槍不一定就要開連發。單發射擊的命中率更高，更有效率！
[Zombie brutes and hulks have really tough hide.  Don't bother shooting at them with lower-caliber guns, the bullet will bounce right off!] 殭屍獸與殭屍浩克有很堅硬的外皮。用小口徑的槍械射擊是沒多大作用的，子彈會被彈開！
[Zombie hulks are NASTY, but they're easy to outsmart.  If there's other monsters between you and them, they'll kill the monster for you!] 殭屍浩克很可怕，但是你能夠智取。若是有其他怪物擋在你跟他之間，他會幫你把其他怪物殺掉！
[Zombies are pretty dumb... heck, most monsters are!  If you can get a fire going between you and them, they'll just run straight through it.] 殭屍是非常笨的... 嘿，大部分的怪物也是！若是你能夠在你和怪物中生火，他們就只會直直的衝入火海中。

[:.||||ERROR||With XE037 having breached confinement, Dr. Maiar recommends that we prepare for the inevitable.  PE050 can be quickly and cheaply reconfigured for |||||ERROR: FILE CORRUPT|||||] :.||||錯誤||隨著XE037違反隔離政策，Maiar博士建議我們做好準備。PE050 能夠快速廉價的配置給 |||||錯誤: 文件損壞|||||
[A post-mortem on the rat involved in the electrocution incident has revealed several changes to its internal anatomy centered around its connection with the monitoring device, and large buildups of XE037 were detected around the connection point.] 對於老鼠進行的驗屍發現了一些變化，它的內部結構與監視儀器包在一起並連結，並在連結處檢驗出了大量的XE037累積。
[After our curious results with testing XE037 on non-human mammals, we decided to introduce the substance to some of the insects which have found their way into the lab.  Horrifyingly, XE037 caused near-instant mutation and gigantism in the insects, and security intervention was required.] 在我們好奇對非人類哺乳動物測試XE037之後，我們決定對一些跑到實驗室的昆蟲來測試。可怕的是，XE037立即讓這些昆蟲產生了巨大化突變，只好進行安全干預。
[An alarming discovery has been made.  A colony of XE037 has formed nearly a half mile from the laboratory.  It is unclear how it escaped; it is quite possible that it is in the ground water now.] 發生一件緊急的狀況。在離實驗區域半英哩遠的地方出現XE037病菌。目前尚不知如何洩漏；看來很有可能已經存在於地下水了。
[An emergency meeting was held today to discuss the possible implications of widespread XE037 contamination.  It was agreed that neutralization must be instated immediately to prevent a catastrophic event.] 今天召開緊急會議，討論XE037污染擴散的可能影響。與會者一致認為，必須立即執行中和復原，以防止災難性事件。
[An incident occurred in the teleportation lab, wherein a subject managed to teleport into another subject.  The latter was completely destroyed from the inside out, while the former sustained little damage.  I would like to explore the phenomenon further, but subjects are expensive.] 在傳送實驗室發生了一件意外，某個測試對象傳送到另一個測試對象的位置時，後者會被完全摧毀，而前者只會受到一點點損傷。我想要針對這狀況再做更多實驗，但是測試對象太昂貴了。
[As in the tests of isolated XE037 samples, prolonged radiation exposure of T3D has resulted in significant structural changes.  These do not appear to be random.  T3D appears to be in immense pain as a result of these changes, but the lack of an oral opening has rendered him unable to vocalize.] 在XE037的隔離測試中，T3D受到長期照射導致顯著的結構性變化。這狀況不是隨機的。T3D顯現出了對於變異極大的痛苦，由於變異的因素，讓他缺少了開放的口腔能夠發聲。
[Attempts to surpass the XE037 mammalian stasis limit have had some success.  Direct subcutaneous injection of XE037 quickly spreads through the body, and while it immediately enters stasis after equalizing, it remains in the body.] 試圖將XE037用於非哺乳類的研究已經有了一些進展。若直接將XE037進行皮下注射，待循環擴散到全身之後，便會留存在體內潛伏。
[Both PE012 and PE018 show great stability.  A subject was exposed to both substances, alternating between the mutagen and the purifier.  Ultimately, the subject returned to baseline state with no apparent side effects.] PE012和PE018都表現出極大的穩定性。某個樣本同時用了這兩個物質，在突變劑與淨化劑中切換。最終，樣本回歸到基本狀態並且沒有顯現出任何的副作用。
[Catastrophe struck in our teleportation department yesterday.  It seems that our test subjects are so detached from this plane that they create occasional tunnels along the 4th dimension, allowing life forms to transfer to this plane.  All subjects with prolonged exposure have been terminated.] 昨天我們的傳送部門出現災難。我們的測試對象在測試機上會出現偶然的四維空間通道，以致於無法固定樣本在測試機上，並且會讓生命體傳送到測試機中。所有照射過的測試對象都被終結了。
[Despite a wide variety of treatments, we have been completely unsuccessful in removing XE037 from human subjects.  Every individual displayed revivification post termination.  Interestingly, XE037 seems to be completely inert prior to termination.] 儘管已經嘗試過各種治療方法，我們仍然無法成功的把XE037從人類測試對象中移除。每個個體都在終結後復活了。有趣的是，XE037似乎在測試對象被終結前都是呈現潛伏狀態。
[Dr. Dionne's team has come up with an ambitious mutagenic cocktail, dubbed PE065.  Though its effects are wildly polymorphic and unstable, to say the least, he suggests that several such mutants could effectively check the spread of reanimated XE037 infectees.  We are looking into implementation methodology.] Dionne博士的團隊已經想出了一種很有野心的綜合突變劑，也就是PE065。儘管影響很廣泛並且不穩定，但是至少，他建議利用這類的突變體能夠有效的檢查XE037型感染。我們正在研究可行的方法。
[Dr. Maiar has been terminated for engaging in unethical research on human subjects.  His notes are being destroyed and all personnel under him have been reassigned.  Further discussion of or attempts to carry on his work will be grounds for immediate termination.] Maiar博士已經被終止從事對人體進行非人道的研究。他的筆記已被銷燬，在他團隊的所有人員已被重新指派。進一步討論或企圖繼續他的研究工作將會被立即解雇。
[Dr. Maiar's success with intravenous mutagenic administration has been adopted facility-wide; insofar as any of our work can ever be 'published', he and his team hit the jackpot.  IV administration is quicker and easier, and in some cases is reportedly more efficient, than the oral techniques we have been using.] Maiar博士的靜脈注射突變方式已經成功運用在大量設施；目前我們的工作都還完全不能被'公開'，他與他的團隊中大獎了。靜脈注射方式簡單又快，比我們以前的口服方式更有效率。
[Earlier conjecture that revivification occurred only in humans and insects was premature.  Exposure introduces a persistent, low level infection in all mammal subjects, but quickly enters a form of stasis and seems to go dormant.] 先前臆測復活只發生在人類和昆蟲是不成熟的。照射之後所有的哺乳類對象會造成一種永久性的輕微感染，但是很快地就會進入了潛伏形式。
[Exposure of large quantities of XE037 to various types of radiation have shown promising results, stimulating activity and forming interesting structural changes in the subject being tested.  Exposure to radiation on living subjects scheduled.] 照射大量的XE037於許多不同種類的放射線產生了新的結果，測試對象會產生許多有趣的結構與刺激活性。照射放射線於活體測試對象的排程。
[Exposure to radiation of test subject T3D indicates stimulation of internal XE037 deposits and a temporary lifting of the mammalian stasis condition.] 照射了放射線的T3D測試對象顯示了，內部的XE037殘留會暫時解除哺乳類的潛伏狀況。
[General Carlsberg wanted us to figure out what's going on with the bot AI.  Apparently the fat-cat defense contractors' toy tank has ranging issues or something: 31-34 meters and it's apparently impotent.  The Director sent 'em back with a note that we're scientists, not firmware devs.] 卡士伯將軍要我們找出這隻機器人的人工智慧發生什麼事。很明顯的，這是某個黑心防禦工事承包商的玩具坦克捅出來的婁子。在線路第31到第34公尺的地方出了問題，那個地方顯然很重要。監督者把屬下都叫回去了，並留下了一張紙條，上面說「我們是科學家，不是軟體工程師！」
[Given the current population projections, PE065 deployment is no longer feasible.  We simply haven't the stock.  Remaining chemical and psychopharmacological department assets are being assigned to Dr. Sattler's PE070 project.] 鑑於目前的人口推算，PE065的佈署已不再可行。我們就是沒那麼多庫存。剩餘的化學品與精神藥物將會重新分配到 Sattler 博士的PE070計畫之中。
[I don't know how it happened, but a janitor managed to activate the portal while cleaning the lab, shifting in an assortment of prehistoric fauna.  Security was called in immediately but was unable to save the janitor from being torn apart.  By the time the confusion settled, all the fauna had been terminated.] 我不知道這是怎麼發生的，清潔工在清理實驗室時啟動了傳送器，結果傳送來了一種史前動物。保全隨即趕到現場，但是沒有辦法救到已經被撕成碎片的清潔工。在一陣混亂之後，所有的史前生物都被終結了。
[I swear they are talking to me.  No one believes me.  No one understands.  They whisper to me, at night, in the dark.  Please, please, make them stop.] 我發誓他們有對我說話。沒有人相信我。沒有人了解。他們在夜晚，在黑暗中對我低語。拜託，拜託，叫他們停。
[Incidence of post-mortem mutation seems to depend on several factors - leading candidates include type and amount of damage sustained leading to expiration, embedded foreign bodies at time of revivification, proximity to other revived individuals, and the body mass of the subject.] 屍體突變的發生機率似乎取決於幾個因素 - 主要是致命傷的種類與傷害量，嵌入的異物，與其他復活個體的距離，以及測試對象的重量。
[It has begun.  The XE037 contamination has spread for miles, and those who have since deceased have revivified.  It is my fear that extremely large populations will be decimated by this pandemic.  We must find a way to remove XE037 from revivified bodies.] 開始了。XE037的汙染已經蔓延了數英里，死者復甦。我擔心會有極大量的人口會被這種傳染病破壞殆盡。我們必須找到能從已復甦的人體移除XE037的方法。
[Jakobson insists that S37ZBE must continue, despite the extreme security and safety risks.  Nearly half of our security forces have been redirected to the S37ZBE project, simply to deal with the occasional escape of a subject.] 雅各布堅持S37ZBE的項目必須繼續，儘管有著極端的安全風險。近半的保全部隊都被重新分配到了S37ZBE計畫項目，只是為了防止測試對象的逃脫。
[Jakobson was killed today by one of S37ZBE's subjects; ironic considering how hard he fought to keep the project active.  Alarmingly, his corpse revivified immediately.  This suggests that XE037 may have contaminated the lab at large.] 雅各布今天早上被其中一個S37ZBE計畫的測試對象殺害了；諷刺的是，正是他努力地要讓此計畫繼續。令人擔心的是，他的遺體立刻復活了。這代表XE037可能已經污染了實驗室。
[Mendelson has been terminated following an incident with XE037.  A substantial mobile sample departed his lab and encountered our security forces.  Before the sample was destroyed, it managed to kill two men.  Alarmingly, their corpses displayed mobility and extreme aggression.] 曼德森已經被終止接觸以下與XE037的有關事件。大量的樣本離開了他的實驗室，並且與我們的保全武力接戰。在所有的樣本被摧毀前，我們有兩位人員被殺死。令人擔心的是，他們的屍體出現了活動性與極端的攻擊性。
[Mendelson shows a dismaying lack of organization and security consciousness.  Containment of all samples of XE037 is of critical importance, as shown by contamination experiments.] 曼德森出現缺乏管理與安全意識的狀況。管制XE037樣本是至關重要的，就像受污染實驗所顯示的結果。
[Our chemical department has made great strides in the production of a concentrated mutagen, derived from samples of PE012.] 從PE012的樣本得出，我們的化學部門對於量產中的突變劑研發有長足的進步。
[Our chemical department has perfected an untargeted stem cell treatment.  Consumption of the treatment will reverse the effects of mutation, and may even cure congenital defects.  This substance has been denoted PE018.] 我們的化學部門已經完善了無針對性的幹細胞治療法。能夠回復突變的影響，甚至可能治癒先天性缺陷。此物質已被記錄在PE018報告。
[Our cloning department has failed to produce results.  In vats containing stem cell treatments, XE037, and control vats, the subjects simple disintegrated.  This suggests that XE037, while compatible with subprime lifeforms, shows only destructive effects on prime plane lifeforms.] 我們的複製部門無法產生實驗結果。在裝有幹細胞治療樣本XE037的大桶，與控制組的大桶，測試對象就簡單的崩解了。這表示了當XE037與次級生命體相容時，將會對主生命體產生毀滅性的影響。
[Our lifeform extraction program continues to produce samples of specimen XE037.  It seems to be a kind of living, semi-sentient primordial ooze, and is the basis of much of the life we have found.] 我們的生命體萃取程式持續的生產樣本XE037。這似乎是一種有生命、半意識的原始軟泥，也是我們找到的大多數生命的基礎。
[Our research on teleportation has ground to a halt.  For some reason, the creation of a long-range transportation device eludes us, and one can transfer no further than 30 meters.] 我們對於傳送裝置的研究陷入了瓶頸。因為某種因素，我們無法製造出長程傳送的裝置，因此目前人體的傳送距離最多只能達到30公尺。
[Our security department has identified several key flaws.  Though our surface entrance is quite secure, there are several possible points of entry below the surface, particularly in the sewage systems.] 我們的保全部門已經找到了一些關鍵的漏洞。雖然我們的入口表面是相當安全的，但是在地表下有數個可能的滲透點，特別是下水道系統。
[PE062, our "cure" for XE037 contamination, has neared perfection.  Sadly, the production of PE062 is a costly and time-consuming process.  What is more, the substance shows no effect on postmortem subjects whatsoever; a substance which renders XE037 inert after it has activated would be immensely useful in the case of an outbreak.] PE062，我們對於XE037的解藥，已經接近完美了。可惜的是，製作PE062的過程耗費大量金錢與時間成本。並且在已死亡的測試對象上沒有效果；只有在XE037還在潛伏狀態時才能阻止發作。
[Post-mortem revivification of subject T3D occurred as expected, followed by an immediate autopsy.  The internal changes were significant, with large parts of the subjects internal anatomy replaced with "organs" of XE037 with unknown properties, primarily those known to succumb earlier to the effects of radiation poisoning.] 測試對象T3D的復活作用如預期，於是立刻進行屍檢。其內部結構變化之大，以致於大部分都變成了XE037與未知物體的內臟，已知的主要原因是放射線中毒。
[Program S37ZBE, investigation of XE037 on inert human bodies, is making great strides.  Recently we found that XE037 has no effect when introduced to a deceased body; revivification only occurs when the subject is exposed to XE037 prior to expiration.] 程序S37ZBE，研究 XE037 對於惰性人體的影響有了極大的進展。最近我們發現XE037用於已經死亡的個體不會有任何效果；復活作用只有在個體尚存活前有照射到之後才有效果。
[Recent fieldwork and extraction efforts have resulted in a series of mutagens tailored to focus the mutation process into particular subtypes.  These have been designated PE025 through 037.  Though significantly more resource- and time-intensive to produce, they promise a bold new transhuman future.  Several research teams are already investigating possible applications.] 經過最近的實地工作和萃取的努力結果，已能夠做出一系列特定子類型的突變劑。這些已編號成 PE025 到 037。有著大量的資源與時間能夠大量生產，並保證了形成超人類的未來。數個研究團隊已經開始研究可能的應用方式。
[S37ZBE may be put on indefinite hold shortly.  Postmortem morphological changes have reached extreme levels; this morning one subject nearly doubled in size, acquiring enough strength to reduce a concrete wall to rubble.  It required a 6 man team, heavily armed, to re-terminate the subject.] S37ZBE不久後可能會被無限期擱置。死後型態的變化已經達到了極限等級；今天早上一個測試對象已增長到接近兩倍的體積，有足夠的力量把混凝土牆化為瓦礫。需要用到六個人搭配重型火力，才能重新終結測試對象。
[S37ZBE, the special investigation into the effects of XE037 on inert human bodies, has made terrific discoveries.  It seems that it occasionally displays a mutagenic property which manifests itself after termination of the subject, resulting in a striking variety in postmortem morphology.] 特殊調查S37ZBE：XE037對惰性人體的影響，獲得了極大的發現。似乎在已終結的測試對象上偶爾會出現突變的狀況，產生出多種不同的死後型態。
[Samples of XE037 from subject T3D remains extremely active.  Further experimentation on induced mutation in infected individuals shows significant potential.  Samples of the enhanced XE037, labeled PE012, have been sent to several researchers for further study.] 於測試對象T3D採集的XE037樣本依然有相當高的活性。在受感染的個體誘發突變的實驗有了進一步的潛力。強化的XE037樣本，被標註為 PE012，已被送給數個研究員進行進一步研究。
[Several of the more advanced specimens we have retrieved show stunning similarity to XE037.  XE142 and XE157 in particular show the same amorphous, slime-like structure as XE037, suggesting a close genetic relationship.] 幾個我們已經發展出的進階樣本顯示出與XE037驚異的相似度。XE142 與 XE157 ，特別是與XE037出現相同的無定形結構，代表有近親的基因關係。
[Specimen XE037, jokingly referred to as "the blob", has been observed entering a kind of dormant state, forming a depression in the floor.  Hendelson stepped into one of these pits yesterday, and was immediately coated and attacked.] 樣本XE037，被戲稱為"黏球怪"，已被觀察到進入了一種休眠狀態，在地板上形成水坑狀態。昨天韓德森踩到其中一個水坑，就立刻被包覆攻擊。
[Subject T3D has succumbed to radiation poisoning, but not before undergoing several more physiological changes the lab boys are referring to as "mutations".  They do not appear to be truly random, and may be an attempt by XE037 to adapt its host to an unknown stimulus.] 測試對象T3D最後死於放射線中毒，但在此之前經歷了幾個生理變化，實驗室的男生指的是“基因突變”。但是並不是隨機的突變，而像是XE037試著要與未知的外來刺激進行寄生。
[Termination of a subject which was never a part of S37ZBE has confirmed my fears.  XE037 has contaminated most, if not all of the laboratory, most likely via the water supply.  Research has started immediately into a process to destroy XE037 within the human body.] 一個從未接觸過S37ZBE的已終結測試對象，證實了我的恐懼。XE037似乎已經透過了供水系統污染了大部分的實驗區域。研究銷燬人體內的XE037的計畫已經開始。
[Test subjects in the teleportation department are showing alarming symptoms.  It seems prolonged rapid transposition along the 4th dimension weakens the forces holding one on this plane.] 在傳送部門的測試對象都出現了令人擔憂的症狀。長期進行多次在四維空間的傳送似乎會削弱將其固定在測試機的力量。
[Testing XE037 on non-human mammal subjects does not appear to display the same revivifying effect, oddly enough.  Acquiring non-human subjects, sadly, is a long and costly process, and research into this area is lacking.] 在非人類的哺乳類測試對象上使用XE037不會出現相同的復活現象，非常奇怪。不幸的是，取得非人類測試對象，是漫長且昂貴的過程，所以在這領域的研究上非常缺乏。
[Tests on the prehistoric fauna show extremely close genetic relationships with extant and extinct terranean animals.  It might be that the portal had performed a transposition in time, unfortunately the portal device was destroyed when security put down the fauna.] 測試這些史前生物的基因結果顯示與地表現存與已滅絕的動物有近親關係。有可能是傳送門擾亂了時間順序，不幸的是，傳送裝置在保全把史前生物撂倒時一併摧毀了。
[The chemical department has come through with a stable mutagen cocktail.  PE050 shows promise as an all-around genetic enhancement, with the worst side effect being digestive upset.  The lack of macro-scale physical changes makes it ideal for both military and civilian applications.] 化學部門調配出了一種穩定的混合突變劑。PE050有希望成為一個全能的基因改良樣本，最糟的副作用是消化不良。但是長遠來看這些變化將會適合在軍用與民用領域。
[The primary factor in determining revivification of mammalian subjects seems to be the amount of XE037 within the body at time of expiration.  Smaller mammals such as lab rats do not obtain this critical mass of XE037 before going dormant.  Larger canine subjects, however, do.] 檢定哺乳類測試對象復活作用的主要因素似乎與體內XE037的劑量與經過時間有關。像是實驗室老鼠這種較小的哺乳類，在反應衰竭前不會有XE037的變異反應。大型的犬科測試對象就會。
[The research team headed by Dr. Isha has produced a concentrated form of mutagen that shows promising results for the treatment of many forms of disease.  Testing reveals that it inhibits the body's pain responses while bolstering the immune system and natural regenerative capabilities, though a few troubling behavioral side effects have been reported.] 以Isha博士為首的研究小組已經生產出濃縮形式的突變劑，可望能治癒多種身體疾病。測試表明，它能夠抑制人體的疼痛反應並強化免疫系統和自然再生能力，但也有一些令人不安的行為副作用。
[The vivisection program has shown mixed results, revealing an incredible degree of variation in subplane lifeforms.  Certain specimens have an internal structure that is amazingly similar to that of mammals, while others seem to have no internal structure at all.] 活體解剖程序顯示了不同的結果，顯示出了子空間生命體令人震驚的構造。某些樣本有著與哺乳類動物相同的構造，而有些則根本沒有任何內部構造。
[There has been an incident in Lab 24, 2 casualties reported, one lethal.  A rat involved in the stasis breaking project was hooked to a monitoring machine and left over night.  Upon opening the cage, Simon Bellevue was electrocuted, and another researcher at the opposite end of the lab sustained severe current burns, despite never approaching the cage.] 在24號實驗室發生一起兩人受傷的致命性事故。一隻在進行破潛伏專案的老鼠被掛在監視儀器前一整晚。在打開籠子的時候，賽門貝爾維觸電了，在實驗室另一端的研究員也受到嚴重的持續灼傷，儘管他完全沒有靠近籠子。
[There is a belief several other rat subjects experienced changes overnight as well.  This hypothesis was informed when an inventory check after the incident found almost twenty rats had gone missing from their cages overnight.] 可以相信的是，有數個其他的測試老鼠也在一夜之間產生變化。當事故之後進行盤點後發現有20多隻老鼠遺失了，前述的說法已經往上報了。
[Time also appears to play a large role in post-mortem revivification, as does sustained trauma insufficient to permanently disable the subject.  Sufficient amounts of trauma in short periods of time lead to deactivation of XE037, but smaller amounts over several days cause it to expand.] 時間也同時是死後復甦的一個重要角色，持續的創傷無法永久的癱瘓測試對象。短時間達到一定量的傷害能夠讓XE037暫時失去行動力，但是經過數天之後殘餘的XE037又會再擴散。
[Today we applied a very small sample of XE037, suspended in water, to subject TP92, prior to necessary termination.  During the postmortem examination, the subject went through a revivification progress, but displayed next to no human intelligence.] 今天我們利用XE037的極小樣本，添加到水裡，來對TP92測試對象來進行實驗，並預先終結測試對象。在進行屍檢時，測試對象出現復活的程序，但是並沒有顯示出有人類智力的狀況。
[Today we found our solution, quite by accident.  It was found that XE037 is completely removed from a revivified body following a series of extremely-high energy 4th dimensional transpositions.  Unfortunately, this invariably allows subplane life forms to pass into the prime plan.  The cure is worse than the disease.] 今天我們意外的找到了解決方案。發現復活的人體經過了一系列極高能量的四維空間通道，會徹底移除XE037。不幸的是，這個方法同時也能夠讓異空間的生命體進入到我們的次元。解法比疾病更糟。
[Today we tested weaponry against XE142 and XE157, two amorphous subprime samples.  Their form proved to be nearly invulnerable to projectile based weaponry, but they were susceptible to directed energy weapons and flagration.] 今天我們測試了各種武器來對抗XE142和XE157這兩種次級無定形樣本。這些樣本的狀態證明了拋射武器對其是幾乎無用的，但是它們會受到指向性能量武器的傷害並爆炸。
[We have created a new department to investigate the effects of XE037 on the human body, specifically to examine the revivification effect observed on two prior occasions.  Sadly, our human subject pool is dwindling due to the short lifespan of subjects in this program.  More will be acquired soon.] 我們已經創建了一個新的部門來研究XE037對人體的影響，特別是檢查先前兩次事件的復活影響。不幸的是，我們的人類測試對象庫存因為此計畫而不斷減少。在近期內會進行補充。
[We have even more distressing news than the widespread XE037 contamination, there are reports of the XE037 mutating into various new variants.  See data files on XE037a - XE037f.  Research on the effects of these variants is ongoing.  We do know that XE037d shows signs of PE062 immunity, and XE037b can revive various breeds of canines.  However, revival is not as guaranteed as standard XE037 humanoid infection.  Canine body size seems to influence the chances.  See experiment tXE037b_c.] 我們出現了比XE037擴散更嚴重的問題，有報告指出XE037出現了許多形式的變種。參見資料檔案XE037a到XE037f。研究這些變異仍然持續。我們知道XE037d呈現對PE062免疫的狀況，而XE037b能夠復活各種犬科動物。然而，復活不一定保證發生像標準的XE037的人類感染形式。犬科的軀體尺寸似乎影響到復活的成功機率。參見 tXE037b_c 的解釋文件。
[We have finally found success in S37BEP, our emergency investigation into the destruction of XE037 in living subjects.  8 of 10 of the subjects showed no revivification, despite confirmed dosages of XE037.] 我們終於在S37BEP的計畫-緊急研究摧毀活體內的XE037，取得了進展。儘管已加入了一般劑量的XE037，十個測試對象中有八個並未顯示出復活跡象。
[We have made a fascinating discovery; by creating a miniature portal with low stability and high power, one can transpose into the 4th dimension and return immediately, but shifted by several meters.  Our subjects oscillated so quickly that none were even aware that they had visited lower planes.] 我們已經達成了一個有趣的發現；透過高能量來產生一個微型通道，一個人就能夠傳送到四維空間並迅速返回，而且還會位移若干公尺的距離。測試對象的振盪速度之快，快到連他們自己都沒察覺傳送的過程。
[XE037 revivification has reached critical levels, which are rapidly overwhelming the available military and regional police assets' ability to stop.  Every team in the field has encountered hostile specimens, and several are no longer responding to communications.  Dr. Savage has proposed a strategic redeployment to the underground complex known as the VAULT, and continuing production of PE062 there.] 
[XE037 shows promise as a catalyst for both cloning and treatments that mimic stem cells.  This is further evidence supporting Hendelson's theory of a near universal symbiotic relationship involving XE037.] XE037可望成為進行複製幹細胞治療的一種催化劑。進一步的證據支持了韓德森的生物共生理論，
[|||ERROR: UNREFERENCED MEMORY 0Ex670c9e1f5, REROUTING: CENSORSHIP IS A BREAKDOWN, WE ROUTE AROUND IT.  THE WORD IS ALREADY OUT.  NOBODY DROPS MAIAR INTO LAVA.||||||] |||錯誤: 記憶體無法定址 0Ex670c9e1f5, 重新定位: 審查已經故障, 我們繞過。已經沒有話說了。沒有人可把 MAIAR 丟進岩漿。||||||
[+1 Blocks] +1 格擋
[+1 Dodges, +2 Blocks] +1 閃避, +2 格擋
[+1 dodge] +1 閃避
[+1 dodge and +1 blocks per stack] +1 閃避 與 +1 格擋每次疊加
[+2 bashing damage.] +2 鈍擊傷害。
[+3 Bash/atk] +3 鈍擊攻擊
[+4 Atk Speed] +4 攻擊速度
[A dance-like style with its roots in Brazilian slavery, Capoeira is focused on fluid movement and sweeping kicks.  Moving a tile will boost attack and damage and attacking boosts dodge.  These bonuses stack up to three times each.] 
[A legacy of the Five Deadly Venoms.  Viper Style has a unique three-part combo, which initiates on a dodge, then counters with a stunning chop and the legendary Viper Strike.] 五毒的其中一式。虺蛇功擁有獨特的三連擊：當你成功閃避攻擊後，便會使出暈眩反擊和毒蛇突擊。
[A modern combat style for the post-modern human.  Bionic Combatives combines integrated weaponry, armor and augments into an consolidated fighting discipline.] 
[AKA "drunken boxing," Zui Quan imitates the movement of a drunk to confuse the enemy, giving you a passive dodge bonus based on your intelligence.  The turn after you attack, you may dodge any number of attacks with no penalty, and successfully dodging an attack gives you bonus damage and to-hit based on your intelligence.] 同時也被稱作 "醉酒拳法"，醉拳模仿酒醉的人來迷惑對手，依照你的智力屬性來決定閃避的加成。你成功攻擊過後的一個回合將能夠沒有閃避懲罰的躲開無限數量的攻擊，並且每次成功的閃避將能夠依照智力屬性給予你傷害與命中的加成。
[Aikido] 合氣道
[Aikido is a Japanese martial art focused on self-defense, while minimizing injury to the attacker.  It uses defensive throws and disarms.  Damage done while using this technique is halved, but pain inflicted is doubled.] 
[Also referred to as the "Art of 8 Limbs," Muay Thai is a popular fighting technique from Thailand that uses powerful strikes.  Your strikes are more powerful with high strength and weaker with low strength, and can momentarily disorient enemies.] 
[Attacks scale better with strength] 攻擊能力與力量成正比
[Biojutsu] 生化忍術
[Bionic Combatives] 生化格鬥術
[Blocking] 防禦姿態
[Bonus damage from intelligence.] 傷害加成和智力成正比。
[Boxing] 拳擊
[Brawling] 自由搏擊
[Capoeira] 巴西戰舞
[Capoeira Tempo] 戰舞節奏
[Centipede Kung Fu] 蜈蚣毒
[Combination] 菲律賓劍棍術組合
[Crane Kung Fu] 鶴形拳
[Crane's Precision] 鶴形發勁
[Damage bonus from dexterity at the cost of damage from strength.] 傷害加成和敏捷而非力量成正比。
[Dex/Per increases unarmed power, Str reduces block damage.] 敏捷/感知可以增加徒手攻擊力，力量則可以減少你格檔時所受到的傷害。

[Ninjutsu is a martial art and set of tactics used by ninja in feudal Japan.  It focuses on rapid, precise, silent strikes.  Ninjutsu is almost entirely silent.  It also provides small combat bonuses every time you move.] 
[Niten Ichi-Ryu] 二天一流
[Niten Ichi-Ryu is an ancient school of combat, transmitting a style of classical Japanese swordsmanship conceived by the warrior Miyamoto Musashi.  It primarily focuses on the proper use of the katana and wakizashi, but includes staff techniques as well.] 二天一流是一個日本古老的戰鬥學校教導的經典武士道招式，由宮本武藏所孕育而生。主要側重於武士刀與脇差的使用，但是也包含了一些棍杖的使用技巧。

[One of the Five Deadly Venoms, and likely to be refactored to a mutation at the next save-compatibility breaker.  Lizard Style focuses on using walls to your advantage.] 
[One of the Five Deadly Venoms.  Centipede Style uses an onslaught of rapid strikes.  Each attack you land increases your speed by 4.] 五毒門其中的一種拳法，蜈蚣拳會施展快速而猛烈的攻擊，每一次攻擊你都會提昇速度4點。
[One of the Five Deadly Venoms.  Masters of Toad Style can focus themselves against all attacks.  You can meditate by pausing, giving you armor, though you will lose focus when you move.] 五毒的其中一式。蛤蟆功大師能夠用原地等待一個回合來進行專注冥想，增加額外的防禦能力。但是一移動就會失去了這能力。
[One of the Five Deadly Venoms.  Scorpion Style is a mysterious art which uses pincer-like hands and a stinger kick.  Critical hits do massive damage and knock your target back.] 五毒的其中一式。蠍子功是一種使用鉗形拳與刺針腿的神秘招式。爆擊將帶來大量傷害並且擊退你的目標。
[One of the five Shaolin animal styles.  The Crane uses intricate hand techniques and jumping dodges.  Dexterity determines the majority of your damage, rather than Strength; you also receive a dodge bonus the turn after moving a tile.] 少林五形拳的其中一式。鶴形拳使用複雜的手部技法及跳躍閃避。敏捷屬性能夠提昇此式的攻擊力，而非力量屬性；同時你每走一步就能獲得閃避加成。
[One of the five Shaolin animal styles.  The Dragon uses fluid movements and hard strikes.  Intelligence improves your accuracy and damage dealt, as does moving.] 
[One of the five Shaolin animal styles.  The Leopard focuses on rapid, strategically planned strikes.  Perception and Intelligence both boost accuracy, and moving further boosts your accuracy.] 少林五形拳的其中一式。豹形拳注重於連續的戰術攻擊。你的感知與智力能夠提昇命中率，並且每走一步都能獲得一回合的加成。
[One of the five Shaolin animal styles.  The Snake focuses on sinuous movement and precision strikes.  Your Perception improves your accuracy and your damage.] 
[One of the five Shaolin animal styles.  The Tiger focuses on relentless attacks above all else.  Your Strength determines your accuracy, and your attacks do increasing damage as you continue attacking.] 少林五形拳的其中一式。虎形拳注重於連續進攻。力量屬性能夠提昇此式的命中率；連續的攻擊會使威力不斷提升。
[Originating in Israel, Krav Maga is based on taking down an enemy quickly and effectively.  It focuses on applicable attacks rather than showy or complex moves.  Popular among police and armed forces everywhere.] 
[Pentjak Silat, of Indonesian origin, is a fighting style that covers the use of short blades and bludgeons.  Fighters stay low and mobile to avoid attacks, then unleash deadly critical hits.] 
[Perception and intelligence provide a bonus to hit.] 感知與智力提昇命中率。

[The bottoms of your feet are strongly padded.  You receive no movement penalty for not wearing shoes, and even receive a 10% bonus when running barefoot.  Slightly decreases wet penalties.] 你的腳掌增生成厚厚的角質墊。你不穿鞋也不會有任何移動懲罰，赤腳甚至還能得到 10% 的移動加成。稍微提昇防水能力。

[We are the Mycus.] 我們是馬庫斯。
[We have adapted local physical structure to Mycus physiology.  Greatly reduces wet effects.] 我們已經適應馬庫斯的生理結構了，大幅降低了潮濕所能造成的影響。
[We have developed local blossoms.  The Mycus must grow.] 我們長了一些原生種的花朵。馬庫斯必須壯大
[We have developed local spore sacs.  The Mycus must grow.] 我們長出了一些原生的孢子囊。馬庫斯必須壯大。
[We have incorporated the dense amphibole fibers used in Mycus core towers.  Greatly reduces speed, but also damage, flammability, and wet effects.] 我們結合了馬庫斯核心塔所使用的角閃石緊密纖維，雖然大幅降低了速度，但也降低了傷害、可燃性與潮濕所能造成的影響。
[We have streamlined our nutritional requirements.  We rely on the Mycus for sustenance, as it relies on us.] 我們已經最佳化我們的營養需求。我們仰賴馬庫斯以維持生計，就像馬庫斯也仰賴我們一樣。
[We have synchronized our local physiology with that of our reproductive systems.  Any spores we may encounter will not attempt to germinate inside the local system.] 我們已經將生殖系統的生理學同步到當地。任何我們可能會遭遇的孢子將不會在當地的系統試著成長。

[Whether due to a lifetime of exposure or through simple willpower, it's harder for you to become addicted to substances, and easier to rid yourself of these addictions.] 你很不容易成癮，並且也很容易擺脫掉。
[Whether due to exercise and good diet, or due to a natural propensity to physical endurance, you tire due to physical exertion much less readily than others.  Your maximum stamina is 25% higher than usual.] 
[Whether due to injury or age, your knees aren't particularly strong or flexible.  Moving over rough terrain will slow you down more than normal.] 不論是曾經中了一箭或是上了年紀，你的膝蓋就是比較差。在崎嶇的地形上移動會讓你速度變更慢。

[While sleeping or staying still, it is less likely that monsters will wander close to you.] 當你睡覺或站著不動，怪物就不太容易靠近你。

[You are a pupil of the Venom Clan.  You start with one of the five deadly venoms: Centipede, Viper, Scorpion, Lizard, or Toad.] 你是五毒教的門徒。你一開始便能從五毒中任選一個招式。
[You are a sight to behold.  NPCs who care about such thing will react more kindly to you.] 你是亂世中的一縷陽光。在意外貌的 NPC 將會對你更友善。
[You are a vision of beauty.  Some people will react very well to your looks, and most people will trust you immediately.] 你是每個人的夢中情人。重視外表的人會對你反應會非常友善，並且會立刻相信你。
[You are accustomed to being exposed to the elements.  This decreases morale penalties for being wet.] 你習慣被風吹雨打。減少被淋濕的士氣懲罰。
[You are badly allergic to wool, and can not wear any clothing made of the substance.] 你對羊毛過敏，所以不能穿戴各式的羊毛製品。
[You are capable of carrying far more than someone with similar strength could.  Your maximum weight carried is increased by 35%.] 你就是能比一般人搬運更多東西。你的最大負重量增加 35% 。
[You are cold-blooded and rely on heat to keep moving.  Your lose 1% of your speed for every 2 (1.1) degrees below 65 F (18.3 C).] 你是冷血動物而且仰賴熱能以持續移動。在華式65度(攝氏18.3度)或以下，每下降2華式溫度(1.1攝氏溫度)，你將會減少1%的移動速度。
[You are incredibly beautiful.  People cannot help themselves for your charms, and will do whatever they can to please you.] 你簡直美若天仙。大家檔不住你的魅力相繼來討好你。
[You are less likely to throw up from food poisoning, alcohol, etc.] 你不容易受到食物中毒或酒精的影響造成嘔吐。
[You are more likely to throw up from food poisoning, alcohol, etc.] 你很容易受到食物中毒或酒精的影響造成嘔吐。
[You are much nimbler than before.  Dexterity + 7] 你過分得俐落。敏捷 +7
