[You are slow to grasp new ideas and thus learn things more slowly than others.  Note that this only applies to real-world experience, not to skill gain from other sources like books.] 你很難掌握做事的要領，導致學習能力比一般人差。注意這只能套用在實際經驗的學習，而非從書上學的技能。
[You are smarter.  Intelligence + 2] 你更聰明了。智力 +2
[You are terrible at organizing and storing your possessions.  You can carry 40% less volume.] 要你把東西整理好就是要你的命。你的儲物空間少了 40% 。
[You are the tree under which humankind will shelter during these dark times.] 在這些黑暗時刻，人類以樹為庇護，你往樹下看著。
[You burn calories like gasoline-soaked tinder.  You consume three times as much food as the average human.] 你消耗的熱量宛如被扔進火種的汽油。你需要吃掉一般人的平均三倍多的食物。
[You can clearly see that this is for dev purposes only.] 你可以清楚的認出這是專給開發者使用的。
[You can handle intoxicants well.  Their effects clear up more quickly for you.] 你能夠較快代謝酒精。酒醉的狀況能很快解除。
[You can manage to find space for anything!  You can carry 40% more volume.] 你能夠更有效率的整理你的背包！你能夠多騰出 40% 的儲物空間。
[You can now extend and reabsorb sensory organs at will, and can therefore ignore most shocks that would overwhelm lesser beings.] 你現在可以隨意的延展或是收縮知覺器官。也能忽略大部分對低等生物造成的打擊。
[You can run more quickly than most, resulting in a 15% speed bonus on sure footing.] 你能跑的比一般人快，得到 15% 的速度加成。
[You can see clearly, even in the darkest caves and under moonless skies.  Activate to toggle NV-visible areas on or off.] 即使是在最黑暗的洞穴以及沒有月光的夜晚，你也能夠看清一切。使用來切換夜視與否。
[You can see in pitch blackness as if you were wearing night-vision goggles.  Activate to toggle NV-visible areas on or off.] 你能夠在黑暗中看的清清楚楚，就像戴上夜視鏡一樣。使用來切換夜視與否。
[You can see incredibly well in the dark!  Activate to toggle NV-visible areas on or off.] 你能夠在黑暗中看的一清二楚！使用來切換夜視與否。
[You can sense things you never imagined.  Perception + 7] 你的感官強大到了無法想像的地步。 感知 +7
[You can shrug off almost anything!  You get a 30% bonus to all hit points.] 你幾乎不怕所有事情！你獲得 30% 的HP加成。
[You can simply take the punishment from lesser beings and keep going.  You get a 40% bonus to all hit points.  Stacks with Tough, etc.] 你可以輕鬆地面對各種傷害威脅並且持續地生活下去。你獲得身體全部位的40%生命加成。根據身體強壯程度而可疊加。
[You can survive injuries that would incapacitate humans: you get a 20% bonus to all hit points.  Stacks with Tough, etc.] 你可以忍受那些原本可讓人類殘廢的傷害。你獲得身體全部位的20%生命加成。根據身體強壯程度而可疊加。
[You can't run as fast as most, resulting in a 15% speed penalty on flat ground.] 你跑的比一般人慢，造成 15% 的速度降低。
[You can't tell what you are anymore.  Everything and yet nothing, like you weren't meant to exist.  But you do, and you're a force, no matter what happens.] 你再也不知道自己是什麼了。無物為真，就像你並不存在。但你卻存在，而你是個氣場，不管發生了什麼。
[You carry your rugged body with the dignity you deserve.  Strength +2.] 你的體態反應著你該有的尊嚴。力量+2。
[You could probably sleep through a firefight.] 你大概可以在一場槍戰中不醒來的繼續睡。
[You defend the realm all night and all day.] 你能夠日日夜夜守衛你的領土。
[You despise eating fruits.  It's possible for you to eat them, but you will suffer morale penalties due to nausea.] 你最厭惡吃水果。就算硬吃了水果也會立刻嘔吐並且影響你的士氣。
[You don't experience guilt like others do.  Even when you know your actions are wrong, you just don't care.] 你並不會產生任何罪惡感。即使你知道行為是錯的，你也不在意。
[You don't feel right unless you're carrying as much as you can.  You suffer morale penalties for carrying less than maximum volume (weight is ignored).  Xanax can help control this anxiety.] 你不把你的背包裝滿你就覺得渾身不對勁。你背負的體積若小於最大值會受到士氣懲罰。抗焦慮藥能夠控制這種情形。
[You don't like thinking about violence.  Your combat skills advance much slower than usual, and you feel more guilt about killing.] 你不喜歡暴力。你的戰鬥技能成長速度比一般人慢，殺戮造成歉疚也更高。
[You don't sleep often.  But when you do, you need very little of it.] 你不常睡覺。當你睡覺時，也只要非常少的時間。
[You dry out seriously quickly, requiring three times as much liquid to stay hydrated.] 你簡直是行動脫水機，需要比一般人的平均三倍多的水份。
[You eat faster, and can eat and drink more, than anyone else!  You also enjoy food more; delicious food is better for your morale, and you don't mind unsavory meals as much.] 你能夠比一般人吃喝的更快、更多！你同時也更會享受食物；美味的食物能更大幅提昇你的士氣，而且你也不討厭難吃的食物。
[You feel as though you are slowly weakening, but it's so slight a feeling that it does not affect you at all.] 你感覺到你慢慢的衰弱，但是這感覺很輕微，所以還不會有影響。
[You feel nauseous almost constantly, and are more liable to throw up from food poisoning, alcohol, etc.  You can, if desired, think yourself into vomiting, too.] 你經常感到噁心，而且更容易因為食物、酒精等中毒而嘔吐。如果你想的話，你想吐就吐得出來。
[You feel very sluggish when not in direct sunlight.  You suffer a 5% drop in speed when in shade, and a 10% drop in speed when in the dark.] 你若是沒有受到陽光照射就會覺得異常虛弱。你若是在陰影下會降低 5% 的速度， 在黑暗中降低 10% 的速度。
[You find it difficult not to sink roots when able.  You extract nutrients and water whenever on diggable terrain, but move more slowly.] 你發現當你可以的時候，你很難不往地下深根。你隨時隨地都在可挖掘的地形上萃取養分與水，但這會減緩你的移動速度。
[You find yourself hungry.  A lot.  You need about twice as much food as the average human.] 你發現自己很容易餓。你需要一般人的平均兩倍多的食物。
[You find yourself needing to sleep quite often.  You'll spend about half your time in or around bed.] 你發現自己需要經常睡覺。你會花半天左右的時間內賴在床上。
[You frequently let out a piercing howl.] 你常常會撕心裂肺的號啕大哭。
[You get the feeling that you're on the cusp of becoming something greater than yourself.] 你覺得你的身體膨脹欲裂。
[You get to see your exact amount of HP remaining and health, instead of only having a vague idea of whether you're in good condition or not.] 
[You have Avian Bone Syndrome--your bones are nearly hollow.  Your body is very light as a result, enabling you to run and attack 20% faster, but also frail; you can carry 40% less, and bashing attacks injure you more.] 你有禽骨綜合症 - 你的骨頭幾乎是空心的。由於你的身體很輕，讓你能夠提昇 20% 的攻擊速度，同時也有缺點；你的負重能力降低到 40%，並且鈍擊攻擊讓你受到的傷害更大。
[You have a an exceptional memory, and find it easy to remember things.  Your skills will erode slightly slower than usual.] 你的記性比一般人好。你的技能衰退得比一般人慢許多。
[You have a beak for a mouth.  You can occasionally use it to peck at your enemies, but it is impossible for you to wear mouth gear.  Slightly reduces wet effects.] 你的嘴巴就像是鳥一樣。能夠用來啄傷敵人，但是你就再也無法穿戴嘴部裝備了。稍微增加防水能力。
[You have a fin-like tail.  It allows you to swim more quickly.  Slightly increases wet benefits.] 你有鰭狀的尾巴。讓你能夠遊的更快。稍微增加防水能力。
[You have a flattened nose and thin slits for nostrils, giving you a lizard-like appearance.  This makes breathing slightly difficult and increases mouth encumbrance by 1.] 你有個扁平狹小的鼻子就像蜥蜴一般。讓你的呼吸稍微變困難了，嘴巴累贅 +1
[You have a flexible mind, allowing you to learn skills much faster than others.  Note that this only applies to real-world experience, not to skill gain from other sources like books.] 你有一個靈活的腦袋，能讓你學習技能的速度比一般人快。注意這只能套用在實際經驗的學習，而非從書上學的技能。
[You have a growling, rough voice.  Persuading NPCs will be more difficult, but threatening them will be easier.] 你有個粗劣的聲帶。說服 NPC 會更困難，但是較容易威脅他們。
[You have a handsome set of feline whiskers around your mouth.  These make you more aware of vibrations in the air, and improve your ability to dodge very slightly.] 你嘴部的周圍有一副很帥氣的貓鬚。這些鬍鬚讓你對空氣中的顫動更加敏感，並且稍微增加你的閃避能力。
[You have a hard time falling asleep, even under the best circumstances!] 就算處在最佳環境之下你也很難入睡。
[You have a hard time remembering things.  Your skills will erode slightly faster than usual.] 你很難記住事情。你的技能衰退得比一般人快許多。
[You have a high tolerance for pain.] 你對於疼痛的忍受程度比一般人高。
[You have a huge rack of antlers, like those of a moose.  They prevent you from hearing headwear that is not made of fabric, but provide a weak headbutt attack.] 你有一對大型的架狀角，就像駝鹿。讓你無法穿戴非布制的頭部裝備，並提供些微的頭槌攻擊。
[You have a long and semi-stiff lizardlike tail.  You can't effectively lash it in combat, but it significantly improves your balance.] 你擁有一根像蜥蜴般半硬不軟的長尾巴。你無法隨心所欲的在戰鬥中甩動它，但它確實地提昇了你的平衡。
[You have a long but hairless tail.  It's a pretty effective balancing aid, but does look, uh, ratty.] 你有著無毛的長尾巴。相當有助於平衡，但是看起來，呃，老鼠樣。
[You have a long tail that ends in a heavy, bony club.  It does not improve your balance at all, but allows for a powerful bashing attack.] 你有個末端像重鎚般的長尾。雖然不能增加身體平衡，但是能讓你使出強力的鈍擊攻擊。
[You have a long tail that ends in a vicious stinger, like that of a scorpion.  It does not improve your balance at all, but allows for a powerful piercing attack.] 你有個長尾末端是毒針，像是蠍子一樣。雖然不能增加身體平衡，但是能讓你使出強力的穿刺攻擊。
[You have a long tail with a tuft on the end.  You find yourself instinctively swatting away flies with it, though it's not as effective at balancing you as you'd like.] 你有著長尾巴，末端為毛球狀。你發現自己會把附近的蒼蠅趕跑，但是這不會影響你的身體平衡。
[You have a long, fluffy-furred tail.  It greatly improves your balance, making your ability to dodge much higher.  However, you find yourself wagging when happy...] 你有著長而蓬鬆的尾巴。能夠大幅增進身體平衡，讓你更容易閃避。然而，你發現開心的時候會不自主的搖尾巴...
[You have a long, graceful tail, like that of a big cat.  It improves your balance, making your ability to dodge higher.] 你有一條長而優雅的尾巴，就像個大貓一樣。能夠增加你的身體平衡，讓你閃避能力提高。
[You have a long, thick, lizardlike tail.  It helps you balance a bit but also makes a serviceable whip.] 你有著長而厚，像是蜥蜴一般的尾巴。能夠幫助你平衡同時也能當做鞭子使用。
[You have a major digestive disorder.  Though it causes you to vomit frequently, you have found that you can trigger your vomit reflex on demand, too.] 你有著重大的消化失衡問題。雖然這會讓你頻繁的嘔吐，你也發現若有需要，你可以隨時觸發嘔吐反應。
[You have a pair of antennae.  They allow you to detect the presence of monsters up to a few tiles away, even if you can't see or hear them, but prevent you from wearing headwear that is not made of fabric.] 你長出一對觸角。就算你看不見或聽不見，也能讓你偵測到怪物的存在，只是你不能穿戴非布製的頭部裝備。
[You have a pair of bumps on your skull.] 你的頭部出現一對硬塊。
[You have a pair of large curled horns, like those of a ram.  They allow you to make a strong bashing headbutt attack, but prevent you from wearing any headwear.] 你有一對蜷曲的大角，像公綿羊一樣。能讓你使出強力的鈍擊性頭錘攻擊，但是你再也不能穿戴頭部裝備了。
[You have a pair of large, feathered wings.  Your body is too heavy to be able to fly, but you can use them to slow your descent during a fall, and will not take falling damage under any circumstances.] 你有一對大型的羽翼。但是你的身體太重了所以不能飛，但是你可以使用這對羽翼來減緩下墜速度，讓你在任何情況都不會受到墜落傷害。
[You have a pair of large, leathery wings.  You can move them a little, but they are useless, and in fact put you off balance, reducing your ability to dodge slightly.] 你有一對大而堅韌的翅膀。你能夠稍微拍動它，但是沒有什麼用，反而會干擾你的身體平衡，造成閃避能力稍微下降。
[You have a pair of large, translucent wings.  They are too small to lift you, but are powerful enough to greatly speed your movement, with some effort and noise.] 你有一對巨大且半透明的翅膀。翅膀太小不足以讓你飛起來，但已足夠大幅增加你的移動速度，使用這對翅膀需要花一點力氣並且製造出一些噪音。
[You have a pair of long, pointed horns, like those of an antelope.  They allow you to make a strong piercing headbutt attack, but prevent you from wearing any headwear the is not made of fabric.] 你長出一對長而尖的角，就像羚羊。能讓你使出強力的穿刺性頭錘，但是你再也不能穿戴非布製的頭部裝備了。
[You have a pair of small horns on your head.  They allow you to make a weak piercing headbutt attack.] 你長出一對小角在頭上。能讓你使出些微的穿刺性頭錘攻擊。
[You have a pair of stubby little wings projecting from your shoulderblades.  They can be wiggled at will, but are useless.] 你的肩胛骨突出一對短小的肉翅。雖然你可以拍動他，但是完全沒有用處。
[You have a rare allergy that prevents you from eating wheat.  It's possible for you to eat them, but you will suffer morale penalties due to nausea.] 你有罕見的小麥過敏症。就算硬吃了也會立刻嘔吐並且影響你的士氣。
[You have a second set of clear eyelids which lower while underwater, allowing you to see as though you were wearing goggles.  Slightly decreases wet penalties.] 你有第二對的透明眼皮能夠在水中時閉上，還能看清四周就像戴蛙鏡一樣。稍微減少潮溼懲罰。
[You have a set of prominent rodent-like whiskers around your mouth.  These make you more aware of vibrations in the air, and improve your ability to dodge slightly.] 你嘴部的周圍有一副顯著的類似嚙齒類動物的鬍鬚。這些鬍鬚讓你對空氣中的顫動更加敏感，並且稍微增加你的閃避能力。
[You have a short, stubby tail, like a rabbit's.  It serves no purpose.] 你有一個小小短短像兔子的尾巴。沒有任何影響。
[You have a threatening snarl in your voice.  Persuading NPCs will be near impossible, but threatening them will be much easier.] 你有著能發出高威脅性聲音的聲帶。說服 NPC 幾乎是不可能，但是要威脅卻是更容易。
[You have a very large and very beautiful pair of brightly-colored wings.  They can't lift you, and they make balancing tricky, but they certainly catch air and attention!] 你有一對非常巨大而且美麗的閃亮翅膀。翅膀無法用來飛行而且讓你難以平衡，但它們的確很容易引人注意!!
[You have a very strong genetic base.  If you mutate, the odds that the mutation will be beneficial are greatly increased.] 你有非常健全的基因基礎。若你發生突變，得到有利的突變機率將會提昇許多。
[You have always been able to fall asleep easily, even when sleeping in less than ideal circumstances.] 你總是很好入睡，即時是在不理想的睡眠環境下。
[You have claws on the ends of your fingers, and can extend or retract them as desired.  Gloves will still get in the way, though.] 你的手指末端長出了爪子，而且可以隨意伸長或縮短，雖然現在手套有點礙事。
[You have claws on the ends of your fingers.  If you aren't wearing gloves, your unarmed attacks deal a minor amount of cutting damage.] 你的手指末端突變成了爪子。假如你沒有戴手套，你的徒手攻擊能夠造成額外的砍劈傷害。
[You have developed several vines sprouting from your shoulder area.  They're bulky and get in the way.] 有多種藤蔓在你的肩膀上發芽。它們數量多而且有點礙事。
[You have four handsome limbs, and then those mutant 'hand' and 'foot' things.  They probably aren't worth concealing.] 你有著漂亮完整的四肢以及那些突變出的手腳。這些事實也許不值得隱瞞。
[You have full control of your vines, and can grow new ones and detach old ones more or less at will.] 您可以完全控制你的藤蔓，也能依自己的意願來控制生長。
[You have grown a thick shell over your torso, providing excellent armor.  You find you can use the empty space as 16 storage space, but cannot wear anything on your torso.  Somewhat reduces wet effects.] 你的軀幹長出了一層薄殼，可作為極佳的護甲。你同時在裡面還找到 16 單位的儲物空間，但是你就不能再軀幹上穿上任何東西了。稍微增加防水能力。
[You have grown even more massive, to the point where you cannot usefully fit into human-sized clothing or vehicles.  Much of it is powerful muscle mass (Strength +4), but it's a real pain to haul around.] 你長得更大了，最明顯的一點就是連大尺碼你也穿不下，大卡車也坐不下了。有著強大的肌肉(力量+4)，但是這麼大的軀體要進行長途旅行是很痛苦的。
[You have grown large, curved, and wickedly sharp talons in place of your big toes.  Fortunately, they don't get in the way of your walking.  Unfortunately, they do prevent you from wearing footgear, which does cause some problems.] 你的大拇指長出了大而彎曲的尖銳爪子。幸運的是，並不會影響你走路。不幸的是，你沒辦法穿腳部裝備，這會造成一些問題。
[You have grown noticeably taller and broader.  Much of it is useful muscle mass (Strength +2), but you find it throws off your balance and you get in your own way (+1 Torso and Arm Encumbrance).] 你明顯的長更高了。肌肉也發達許多(力量+2)，但是你發現身體平衡備受干擾，導致軀幹與手臂累贅+1
[You have no qualms about bending the truth, and have practically no tells.  Telling lies and otherwise bluffing will be much easier for you.] 你很容易就能扭曲事實，也很難被揭穿。說謊或吹牛對你來說就像家常便飯。
[You have practiced fighting with weapons.  You start with your choice of Eskrima, Fencing, or Pentjak Silat.] 你對於使用武器的格鬥術有研究。你開始時便能夠選擇菲律賓劍棍術、擊劍、印尼刀術任一種。
[You have problems with eating meat.  It's possible for you to eat it, but you will suffer morale penalties due to nausea.] 你沒辦法吃肉。就算硬吃了肉也會立刻嘔吐並且影響你的士氣。
[You have received some martial arts training at a local dojo.  You start with your choice of Karate, Judo, Aikido, Tai Chi, or Taekwondo.] 你在道場受過一些武術訓練。你一開始便能夠從 空手道、柔道、合氣道、太極拳、跆拳道 中任選一個招式。
[You have studied the arts of the Shaolin monks.  You start with one of the five animal fighting styles: Tiger, Crane, Leopard, Snake, or Dragon.] 你跟少林寺方丈學過少林功夫。你一開始便能從五形拳中任選一個招式。
[You have taken some self-defense classes at a nearby gym.  You start with your choice of Capoeira, Krav Maga, Muay Thai, Ninjutsu, or Zui Quan.] 你在健身房學過一些防身術。你一開始便能夠從 巴西戰舞、以色列格鬥術、泰拳、忍術、醉拳 中任選一個招式。
[You heal a little faster than most; sleeping will heal more lost HP.] 你生命值回復的速度比一般人快了一些；睡覺時回復較多生命值。
[You heal a little slower than most; sleeping will heal less lost HP.] 你的復原能力比一般人差了點；睡眠時回復的HP比較少。
[You hiss when speaking.  Persuading NPCs will be more difficult, but threatening them will be easier.] 你說話的時候會發出嘶嘶聲。想說服 NPC 會更加困難，但威脅他們會更容易。
[You lack skin pigmentation due to a genetic problem.  You sunburn extremely easily, and typically use an umbrella when going out in the sun.] 你的皮膚缺乏色素，幾乎是透明的。你若受到陽光直射會容易造成曬傷，出門時帶把傘吧。
[You like 75 percent of the world, cannot tolerate milk or milk based products.  It's possible for you to eat them, but you will suffer morale penalties due to nausea.] 你就像是其他世界上75%的人一樣，無法忍受牛奶或其他乳製品。就算硬吃了也會立刻嘔吐並且影響你的士氣。
[You make less noise while walking.  You're also less likely to set off traps.] 你走路時發出較小的聲響。你也比較不容易觸發陷阱。
[You make more noise while walking.  You're also more likely to set off traps.] 你走路時發出更多聲響。你也很容易觸發陷阱。
[You metabolize nutrients so rapidly that you can convert food directly into useful tissue.  Excess nutrition will convert to HP, rather than being wasted.] 你代謝的營養素快到可以直接將食物轉化為有用的組織。過剩的營養將會轉化成HP，而不是浪費掉。
[You need less sleep than the average person.] 你需要睡眠的時間比一般人少。
[You need sleep more often, but still spend most of your time awake.] 你需要睡眠的頻率更高，也會影響到你清醒的時間。
[You never learned to read!  Books and computers are off-limits to you.] 你不識之無！書籍與電腦跟你是不同世界的。
[You occasionally shout uncontrollably.] 你偶爾會失控大叫。
[You positively adore pain, in all its varied forms.] 你積極的崇拜疼痛，不管是任何形式。
[You possess natural night vision, and can see two squares instead of one in pitch blackness.  Activate to toggle NV-visible areas on or off.] 你擁有天然的夜視能力，在黑暗中能比一般人多看清周圍一倍。使用來切換夜視與否。
[You prefer to sustain yourself using your roots and direct nutrient extraction/synthesis.  You can still consume 'food', though, if you have to: you merely prefer it aged a little.] 你喜歡以你自己的根部以及直接萃取營養的組織來養活你自己。如果必須的話，你還是可以消耗一般的食物，不過你還是比較喜歡腐壞的食物。
[You recover from pain faster than normal.] 你能夠比以前更快速的平復疼痛。
[You recover from pain much faster than normal.] 你平復疼痛的速度難以想像。
[You recover from pain slightly faster than normal.] 你能夠比以前更快的平復疼痛。
[You require more food than most people.] 你對食物的需求比一般人多。
[You require more resources than most, but heal more rapidly as well.] 你比一般人需要更多資源，但也回復得更快速。
[You seem to get full faster now, and food goes through you more rapidly as well.] 你現在似乎更快更容易吃飽，而且食物也消化得更快。
[You shan't need to migrate south with your layer of down.  It's even better with no apes around to kill you for it!] 你不應該也不需要往南移居。你應該更慶幸的是沒有一群猴子圍住並想殺死你!!
[You simply can not carry as much as people with a similar strength could.  Your maximum weight carried is reduced by 35%.] 你就是沒法像一般人一樣搬運這麼多東西。你的最大負重量減少 35% 。
[You smell awful.  Monsters that track scent will find you very easily, and humans will react poorly.] 你的身體散發出噁爛的臭味。連怪物都想找到你把你殺了，更不用說人類對你的反應了。
[You sometimes look back on your days before your tail came in.  But you're better now.] 在你的尾巴不見的時候你常常往後看。但你現在好多了。
[You sometimes scream uncontrollably.] 你有時候會失控的尖叫。
[You spent a lot of time actively maneuvering on skates before the cataclysm, and are better at staying on your feet when checked or blocked.] 在大災難之前，你大量的時間都奉獻給了如何巧妙地運用溜冰鞋，遭受障礙或阻擋時你也更能保持穩定。
[You suffer from a minor chemical imbalance, whether mental or physical.  Minor changes to your internal chemistry will manifest themselves on occasion, such as hunger, sleepiness, narcotic effects, etc.] 你的內分泌失調，不論是生理或心理。主要表現在飢餓、疲倦、犯癮上。
[You tend to specialize in one skill and be poor at all others.  You advance at half speed in all skills except your best one.  Note that combining this with Fast Learner will come out to a slower rate of learning for all skills.] 你只專注在其中一個技能而不理會其他的。你只有最高技能的學習速度是全速，其餘的都是半速。若與快速學習並用的話會造成全部技能學習速度都降低。
[You understand almost everything about which you think, with minimal effort.] 你唯一無法解答的事情就是: 有什麼是自己不知道的。
[You were competitive at national levels, and had considered teaching your art.  Defending against the entire town may still be a challenge, though.] 你過去是國家代表選手，並且考慮傳授你的技巧。但是要對抗整個城市的人看來還是有點太拼了。
[You were just through with the administrative formalities for your residency when the cataclysm struck.  "Your" hospital was overrun and evacuated, but there's always work for a good doctor.] 當大災難爆發的時候,你在這裡體驗了各種行政上的繁文縟節。"你的"醫院已被殭屍佔領，醫院人員也已疏散，但對一個好醫生來說，隨時隨地都能找的到事情來做。
[You were shaping up to be a pretty decent student of the martial arts before the Cataclysm struck.  Time to see just how good you really were.] 在災變來襲前你被塑造成一個相當不錯的武術學生。現在就是看看你到底多行的時間了。
[You will occasionally need to use an inhaler, or else suffer severe physical limitations.  However, you are guaranteed to start with an inhaler.] 你三不五時就需要使用吸入器，不然就會受到多重生理限制的痛苦。還好你一開始身上就帶了一個吸入器。
[You will periodically suffer from delusions, ranging from minor effects to full visual hallucinations.  Some of these effects may be controlled through the use of Thorazine.] 你常常受到妄想症的困擾，小從幻聽大至幻覺。靠抗精神病藥能控制部分症狀。
[You're a quick reader, and can get through books a lot faster than most.] 你學過速讀，你能夠比一般人更快的速度讀完一本書。
[You're a real head-turner.  Some people will react well to your appearance, and most people have an easier time trusting you.] 你總是讓人忍不住再看一眼。重視外表的人會對你反應會更友善，並且比較容易相信你。
[You're a slow reader, and it takes you longer to get through books than most.] 你讀書讀很慢，你讀完一本書的速度比一般人慢。
[You're accustomed to eating plants directly, and can get nutrition from grass as well as underbrush.  Eat either one by activating this,  standing over your target, and pressing E.] 你習慣直接吃植物，吃草或灌木都能讓你獲得營養。站在上面按E來進食。
[You're an excellent navigator and your ability to spot distant landmarks is unmatched.  Your sight radius on the overmap extends beyond the normal range.] 你是一個優秀的領航員，你發現遠處地標的能力無與倫比。你在大地圖的能看到的距離比一般人更遠。
[You're getting quite used to hunting and killing ...game.  For food.] 你變得相當習慣於狩獵與殺戮...遊戲。為了食物。
[You're hideously deformed.  Some people will have a strong negative reaction to your appearance.] 你畸形程度讓人看不下去。重視外表的人會對你非常歧視。
[You're just generally quick!  You get a 10% bonus to action points.] 你的個性就是急！你獲得 10% 的行動點數加成。
[You're minorly deformed.  Some people will react badly to your appearance.] 你有些許畸形。某些人可能會歧視你。
[You're not much to look at.  NPCs who care about such things will react poorly to you.] 你讓人不屑一顧。重視外表的 NPC 會歧視你。
[You're perfectly coordinated.] 你的肢體協調程度完美無敵。
[You're quite the heavy sleeper.  Noises are unlikely to wake you up.] 你一睡覺就睡得很死。噪音不太會吵醒你。
[You're skilled at clearing obstacles; terrain like railings or counters are as easy for you to move on as solid ground.] 你擅長翻越障礙；翻越欄杆或櫃檯對你來說就像在平地走路一樣。
[You're sure you'll fly someday.  In the meantime, there's still nests to build.] 你相信你總有一天會飛。同時，你還有巢還沒建。
[You're the perfect candidate to lead a pack.] 你就是領導的最佳人(狼)選。
[You're the perfect candidate to tidy this mess.] 你就是來處理這個爛攤子的最佳人選。
[You've *finally* sprouted a pair of arms from your midsection.  They flail more-or-less uncontrollably,  making you feel rather larval.] 你的腹部總算長出了一對手掌。它們或多或少會不受控制地揮動,，讓你覺得好像是一對幼蟲一樣。
[You've always felt that there is more to the world than we can see.  Whether driven by religious beliefs or philosophical interest, you find great inspiration in studying holy texts and experiencing mystical things.] 你總是感覺到這個世界不是用眼睛所看到的這麼簡單。無論是被宗教信仰或哲學興趣所驅使，你在學習宗教經文或體驗神秘經驗時都能帶給你很大的啟發。
[You've developed a serious appetite for pain, and take pride in your scars.] 你出現了對於疼痛感的期待，對自己身上的傷疤感到驕傲。
[You've developed some sort of hair growing out of your chitin.  It's a bit warmer than not having hair.] 你的甲殼質上長了一種特殊的毛髮，讓你感到更溫暖了些。
[You've developed the ability to control your vines; they make good lashes.  You can even rappel down sheer drops using them, but disconnecting HURTS.] 你能夠控制自己身上的藤蔓，它們是良好的鞭子。你甚至可以利用它們來垂降，但要是斷掉的話會痛。
[You've developed the ability to stockpile calories and then sleep for extended periods of time.] 你能夠藉由囤積熱量，然後睡一段很長的時間。
[You've developed the necessary anatomy and techniques to control your web-generation.  Activate this to start or stop weaving webs.] 你已經發展出了必要的結構和技術來控制蜘蛛網生成。啟用它來開始或停止編織蜘蛛網。
[You've gotten rid of that terribly imprecise mouth and now imbibe your food like a proper person.  Chewing was tiresome anyway.] 你終於擺脫了那副討厭的嘴巴。現在你可以像個一般人攝取食物。嚼食實在太無聊了。
[You've grown a chitin exoskeleton made of thick, stiff plates.  It provides excellent physical protection, but reduces your dexterity by 1 and encumbers all body parts but your eyes and mouth.  Greatly reduces wet effects.] 你已經長出了完整的昆蟲甲殼板。能夠提供絕佳的物理傷害保護，但是降低了敏捷 1 點，同時全身除了眼睛與嘴巴以外都受到累贅。大幅增加防水能力。
[You've grown a chitin exoskeleton, much like that of an insect.  It provides considerable physical protection, but reduces your dexterity by 1.  Somewhat reduces wet effects.] 你長出了像是昆蟲的外骨骼。能夠防護可觀的物理傷害，但是降低了敏捷 1 點。也增加了一些防水能力。
[You've grown a set of gills in your neck, allowing you to breathe underwater.  Slightly increases wet benefits.] 你的脖子長出了一對鰓，讓你能夠在水下呼吸。稍微增加防水能力。
[You've grown a set of gills, running from your neck up behind your ears.  They allow you to breathe underwater and slightly increase wet benefits.] 你的耳朵後一直延伸到脖子上長了一對䚡，你現在可以在水下呼吸，身體弄濕時也有一點好處。
[You've grown sleek brown fur, providing some protection from cold.] 你長出了光滑的棕色毛皮，能夠保暖。
[You've had a revelation: by killing the weaker creatures, who would only die anyway, you preserve resources for those better able to survive.] 你有了啟示：殺了那些軟弱的生物，反正它們也會死，你能留著那些資源來生存。
[You've put on some additional weight around your body.  It slows you down a little, but helps your swimming and warmth.] 你已經在身體增加了一些額外的重量。這會讓你行動慢一點，但是增加了溫暖以及游泳能力。
[You've started blooming where your scalp used to be.  Your blossoms have a pleasant aroma, are visually striking, and are quite sensitive.] 你的頭上長出了一朵花，而且有著令人感到愉快的芳香，色彩鮮艷，並且非常敏感。
[You, like many children, hated eating your vegetables; however, you didn't outgrow it.  It's possible for you to eat them, but you will suffer morale penalties due to nausea.] 你這個長不大的個性就像許多小孩一樣，討厭吃青菜。就算硬吃了蔬菜也會立刻嘔吐並且影響你的士氣。
[Your DNA has been damaged in a way that causes you to continually develop more mutations.] 你的DNA出現受損情況，造成你不斷的出現突變。
[Your arms have grown vibrantly colored feathers.  They effectively waterproof your arms and take the edge off hits, but really get in the way.  They're simply too small to help you in the air.] 你的手臂長滿了七彩的羽毛。能有效的讓你手臂防水，並且能閃避攻擊，但是有時很礙事。因為羽毛太小，所以不能讓你飛。
[Your arms have transformed into eight tentacles, resulting in a bonus of 1 to dexterity, permanent hand encumbrance of 3, and inability to wear gloves.  You can make up to 7 extra attacks with them.  Somewhat decreases wet penalties.] 你的手臂變形成了 8 根觸手，增加敏捷 1 點，增加了手部累贅 3 點，並且再也不能戴手套。但是你戰鬥時可進行 7 次額外攻擊。稍微增加防水能力。
[Your arms have transformed into four tentacles, resulting in a bonus of 1 to dexterity, permanent hand encumbrance of 3, and inability to wear gloves.  You can make up to 3 extra attacks with them.  Somewhat decreases wet penalties.] 你的手臂變形成了 4 根觸手，增加敏捷 1 點，增加了手部累贅 3 點，並且再也不能戴手套。但是你戰鬥時可進行 3 次額外攻擊。稍微增加防水能力。
[Your arms have transformed into tentacles, resulting in a bonus of 1 to dexterity, permanent hand encumbrance of 3, and inability to wear gloves.  Somewhat decreases wet penalties.] 你的手臂變形成了觸手，增加敏捷 1 點，增加了手部累贅 3 點，並且再也不能戴手套。稍微增加防水能力。
[Your big teeth have grown in.  Folks had best show some more respect.] 你的門牙長大了，人們最好對你尊敬些。
[Your bloodstream has developed antibiotic properties.  Your wounds will never become infected.] 你的血液發展出抗菌能力。你的傷口永遠不會被感染。
[Your body alters itself rapidly, and without your intervention or conscious control.] 你的身體常常在起變化，你無法阻止也無法控制。
[Your body breaks very easily.  Its maximum HP is 50% lower than usual and you heal slower.  Stacks with Glass Jaw.] 你的身體很容易骨折。最大HP降低了 50% ，並且康復速度變慢。搭配玻璃下巴簡直極品。
[Your body can't take much abuse.  Its maximum HP is 25% lower than usual and you heal slightly slower.  Stacks with Glass Jaw.] 你的全身無法遭受太多傷害。最大HP降低了 25% ，並且康復速度稍微變慢。搭配玻璃下巴簡直極品。
[Your body dries out easily; you need to drink more water.] 你的身體很容易脫水；你需要補充更多的水份。
[Your body excretes very fine amounts of a chemical which prevents you from sticking to webs.  Walking through webs does not affect you at all.] 你的身體能產生定量的化學物質讓你不會被蜘蛛網黏住。走過蜘蛛網對你完全沒有影響。
[Your body has become permanently cold-blooded.  Your speed lowers--or raises--for every 2 (1.1) degrees below or above 65 F (18.3 C).] 你已經是永久的冷血動物。在華式65度(攝氏18.3度)以上或以下，每增加或下降2華式溫度(1.1攝氏溫度)，你將會增加或減少1%的移動速度。
[Your body has become radioactive!  You continuously emit heavy levels of radiation, some of which will be absorbed by you, and some of which will contaminate the world around you.] 你的身體已經輻射化了！你持續散發大量的輻射，某些會被你吸收，某些則會汙染你四周的環境。
[Your body has become radioactive!  You continuously emit low levels of radiation, which results in a chronic case of radiation poisoning.] 你的身體變成是輻射化的！你持續散發微量的輻射，這會導致慢性的輻射中毒。
[Your body has become radioactive!  You continuously emit moderate levels of radiation, some of which will be absorbed by you, and some of which will contaminate the world around you.] 你的身體已經輻射化了！你持續散發中量的輻射，某些會被你吸收，某些則會汙染你四周的環境。
[Your body has developed a wonderful defense mechanism.  Instead of normal blood, you bleed a strong molecular acid which will damage any creature foolish enough to harm you.] 
[Your body is coated with a fine slime, which oozes off of you, leaving a trail.  Greatly increases wet benefits.] 你的身體會滲出一層薄黏液並覆蓋全身，會留下痕跡。大幅增加防水能力。
[Your body is covered with large quills.  Whenever an unarmed opponent strikes a part of your body that is not covered by clothing, they will receive significant damage.] 你的全身覆蓋了又大又長的刺。只要敵人與你徒手對戰時攻擊到你沒穿衣服的部份，就會受到極大的傷害。
[Your body is extremely fragile.  Its maximum HP is 75% lower than usual and you heal much slower.  Stacks with Glass Jaw.] 你的身體極度容易骨折。最大HP降低了 75% ，並且康復速度非常慢。搭配玻璃下巴簡直極品。
[Your body is more or less one consistent whole: a single, giant, omni-cell that alters itself as needed.] 你的身體大體上仍是一個前後一致的個體；一個單獨且巨大的全細胞會根據身體需求轉換成而適當的狀態。
[Your body is simply immune to diseases.  You will never catch an ambient disease.] 你的身體不會感染一般的的疾病。你不會受到環境疾病的影響。
[Your body is slowly wasting away!] 你的身體正在緩慢的分解！
[Your body is unusually inhospitable to parasitic lifeforms.  You will never become infested with internal parasites.] 你的身體對寄生物來說環境惡劣，你永遠不會被寄生物感染。
[Your body is very slowly wasting away.] 你的身體正慢慢的削瘦。
[Your body produces a potent venom.  Cutting or stabbing attacks from mutations have a chance to poison your target.] 你的身體會產生毒液。從突變砍劈或穿刺有一定機率毒害你的目標。
[Your body produces and anchors webbing.  Too bad you can't seem to control the process.  There is a chance that you will leave webs in your wake.] 你的身體會產生並拋出蜘蛛網。可惜的是你無法控制這過程。在你醒來的時候有機率留下蜘蛛網。
[Your body produces low-level pheromones which puts mammals at ease.  They will be less likely to attack or flee from you.] 你的身體會產生微量的費洛蒙，能讓哺乳類動物認為你是盟友。哺乳類動物不太會攻擊或逃跑。
[Your body produces low-level pheromones, identifying you as a friend to many species of insects.  Insects will attack you much less.] 你的身體會產生微量的費洛蒙，會讓昆蟲認為你是盟友。昆蟲不太會攻擊你。
[Your body's ability to digest fruits, vegetables and grains is severely hampered.  You cannot eat anything besides meat.] 你身體消化水果、蔬菜、穀物的能力大大降低。你無法吃肉類以外的食物。
[Your body's ability to digest meat is severely hampered.  Eating meat has a good chance of making you vomit it back up; even if you manage to keep it down, its nutritional value is greatly reduced.] 你身體消化肉類的能力大大降低。吃肉之後很有可能會讓你嘔吐；即使沒有吐出所獲得的養分也很有限。
[Your body's slime output has become sticky and gel-like.  Greatly increases wet benefits.] 你身體類似膠狀的分泌物變得更為黏滑。大幅增加於潮濕狀態的好處。
[Your bones are very light.  This enables you to run and attack 10% faster, but also reduces your carrying weight by 20% and makes bashing attacks hurt a little more.] 你的骨頭很輕。讓你能夠奔跑及攻擊速度得到 10%% 的加成，但是會讓你減少 20% 的負重，另外鈍擊也會讓你傷害加大。
[Your brain has caught up with your eyes.  You can see much better in the dark, but sunlight seems much brighter now.  Activate to toggle NV-visible areas on or off.] 你的大腦終於趕上了你的雙眼，你現在在黑暗中可以看的更清楚，但是白天的陽光變得更刺眼。使用來切換夜視與否。
[Your brain has evolved beyond human imagination.  You'll show them the REAL meaning of 'gray goo'!] 你的大腦已經進化到人類難以想像的地步。你會讓人類知道什麼才是正港的外星人。
[Your broken limbs mend themselves without significant difficulty.] 你的斷肢開始自行復原了，沒有大礙。
[Your cardiovascular system has caught up with your muscular physique, so who needs pathetic human cars? Strength +4.] 你的心血管系統已經配合上了你的肌肉體魄，那麼誰還需要可悲的人類汽車？力量+4。
[Your chitin hair has thickened and spread across your body.  It provides minor warmth and helps you sense nearby vibrations.] 你甲殼質上的毛髮變得更粗了，並且蔓延到你的整個身體，它使你的身體更加的不怕冷，而且可以讓你感受到附近的振動。
[Your claws have grown tougher and slightly gnarled.] 你的爪子變得更粗更硬。
[Your digestive system is capable of digesting cellulose and other rough plant material.  You can eat underbrush by activating this, standing over your target, and pressing E.] 你的消化系統能夠消化纖維素。你能夠吃下灌木之類的植物（站在上面按E）。
[Your digestive system is specialized to allow you to consume decaying material.  You can eat rotten food, albeit for less nutrition than usual.] 你的消化系統特化成可以消化腐敗的食物。你能吃腐敗的食物，儘管營養比較少。
[Your ears have extended into long, pointed ones, like those of a canine.  They enhance your hearing, allowing you to hear at greater distances.] 你的耳朵向上拉長變成像狗一樣。能夠增強你的聽力，讓你聽得更遠。
[Your ears have extended into long, pointed, velvety ones, like those of a feline.  You find it easier to tune in on sounds from afar.] 你的耳朵拉長為毛茸茸的貓狀耳朵。你發現能夠輕易的聽見遠處的聲響。
[Your ears have grown longer and rounder, much like those of a bear.  You can hear things a little farther away.] 你的耳朵變成又大又圓，就像是熊一樣。你的聽力稍微增加。
[Your epidermis has turned into a thin, flexible layer of chitin.  It provides minor protection from cutting wounds.  Slightly reduces wet effects.] 你的表皮轉化成了薄而有彈性的甲殼層。能夠對抗輕微的砍劈傷害。稍微提昇防水能力。
[Your exoskeleton has hardened considerably--restricting movement, granted--and boasts a fine coat of hairs that put feline whiskers to shame.] 你的外骨骼被相當的強化了，上面還長出了一層連貓鬍鬚都會感到羞愧的美麗毛髮，但是你的移動想必會受到一些限制。
[Your extremities are covered in painful sores.  The pain is worse when they are covered in clothing.] 
[Your eyes are compound, like those of an insect.  This increases your perception by 2 so long as you aren't wearing eyewear.] 你的眼睛變成了像是昆蟲一樣的複眼。能夠增加你的感知 2 點，只是你的眼睛再也不能穿戴任何東西了。
[Your eyes bulge out several inches from your skull.  This does not affect your vision in any way.] 你的眼球凸出了幾吋。沒有什麼影響。
[Your eyes have mutated to pick up radiation in the infrared spectrum.] 你的眼睛突變成能夠以特殊的光譜看見輻射。
[Your eyes have mutated, now having a slitted pupil and glittering in light, much like those of cats.  This is visually striking, but it isn't helping you see at night.] 你的眼睛突變了，在燈光下有著發光的瞳孔，就像是貓一樣。這只是看起來很炫，但是無法幫助你在夜晚視物。
[Your eyes have mutated, with a brilliant iris and slitted pupil similar to that of a lizard.  This is visually striking, but doesn't seem to affect your vision.] 你的眼睛發生突變，有著類似蜥蜴般的虹膜與瞳孔，雖然看起來很嚇人，但是不會影響到你的視力。
[Your eyes have turned...green.  It's tough to tell the exact shade as it seems to shift.  The effect is ...pleasant.] 你的眼睛變成了...綠色。陰影對你來說不存在。效果...真讚。
[Your eyes still bulge, yet your pupils look Different somehow.  Water doesn't seem to cause any trouble at all, though.] 你的眼睛仍然凸出眼眶，而且你的瞳孔看起來有些不太一樣，用水沖好像不會有問題。
[Your face and jaw have begun...changing.  Masks and such fit OK, but you're noticeably mutated.] 你的臉與下巴開始...變化。目前還可以帶上面具之類的嘴部裝備，但是你其實已經出現突變了。
[Your face and jaw have extended, giving you an alert and attentive appearance.] 你的臉與顎部變長，讓你的外表更引人警覺與注意。
[Your face and jaws are a shorter version of those found on alligators.  They look NASTY-as do the bite wounds they can inflict-but prevent you from wearing mouthgear.] 你的臉與顎部比鱷魚稍微短了一號。他們看起來令人作噁而且咬嚙可以造成傷害，但你也不能戴上嘴部裝備。
[Your face resembles that of a bull, with a significant snout.  It looks fearsome but prevents you from wearing mouthgear.] 你的臉就像是一頭公牛，有著明顯的鼻子。看起來很嚇人，而且讓你不能穿戴嘴部裝備。
[Your fangs have grown extremely large and incredibly sharp.  They make it impossible to wear mouthgear and difficult to eat...  but leave nasty wounds when you bite.] 你的獠牙特化的非常長且銳利。讓你無法穿在嘴部裝備，並且進食困難... 但是咬人的時候會留下可怕的傷痕。
[Your feet have fused into hooves.  This allows kicking attacks to do much more damage, provides natural armor, and removes the need to wear shoes; however, you can not wear shoes of any kind.  Somewhat reduces wet effects.] 你的腳掌特化成了蹄。能夠讓你的踢擊造成更多傷害，也像是天然的護甲，移除了穿鞋的需求；所以你再也不能穿任何的鞋子。並增加防水的能力。
[Your fingernails are long and sharp.  If you aren't wearing gloves, your unarmed attacks deal a minor amount of cutting damage.] 你的手指甲突變成又長又銳利。假如你沒有戴手套，你的徒手攻擊能夠造成額外的砍劈傷害。
[Your flesh is a pleasing gel-like consistency.  Your bodily functions seem to be moving around, and your leg-equivalents flow comfortably.] 你的血肉看起來是令人愉快的持續膠狀狀態。你的身體功能看起來仍可以四處移動，你的"腿"也舒適的流動著。
[Your flesh regenerates from wounds incredibly quickly.] 你的血肉能夠以不可思議的速度再生。
[Your flesh regenerates slowly, and you will regain HP even when not sleeping.] 你的血肉能夠緩慢的再生，不論你是否在睡覺，HP都會慢慢回復。
[Your frame has adapted for life in confined spaces.  You seem a little shorter and bulkier, trading muscle mass for mobility.  (+2 Strength, -2 Dexterity)] 你的骨架已終生適應於狹窄的空間。你似乎比以前矮且壯,以大片的肌肉群取代了靈巧度。(增加2點力量，減少2點敏捷。)
[Your fur has grown out and thickened, providing noticeable protection from attacks as well as considerable insulation.] 你長出了又粗又應的毛皮，賦予你不少防禦力，也提供你對於溫度變化的理想絕緣體
[Your fur's grown out significantly around your cheeks and neck.  It provides minor protection against attacks.] 你的下巴與頸部長滿了明顯的毛皮。能夠對抗輕微的傷害。
[Your guts have developed the ability to handle poisonous food.  Mostly.] 你的內臟發展出消化大部分有毒食物的能力。
[Your hands and feet are heavily webbed, reducing your dexterity by 1 and preventing you from wearing gloves.  However, you can swim much faster.  Slightly decreases wet penalties.] 你的手掌與腳掌長出厚厚的蹼，讓你的敏捷下降 1 點，並且無法戴手套。但是你能夠游泳遊的更快。稍微增加防水能力。
[Your hands have fused into quasi-paws.  Fine manipulation is a challenge: permanent hand encumbrance of 1, difficulty with delicate craftwork, and your gloves don't fit.  But they handle water better.] 你的手融合而成類似爪子。進行精細的動作很困難：手掌累贅永久+1，無法進行複雜的物品製作，也不能戴手套。但是爪子可以用來舀水。
[Your head can't take much abuse.  Its maximum HP is 20% lower than usual.] 你的頭部無法受到太大的傷害。頭部比一般人少了 20% 的HP。
[Your hearing has evolved further and is now on par with wolves.  You can hear things significantly farther away.] 你的聽力因為長成一對狼耳而增強。你能夠更明顯的聽見遠處的聲響。
[Your hearing is better than average, and you can hear distant sounds more easily.] 你的聽力比一般人好，能夠輕易聽見遠方的聲音。
[Your hearing is poor, and you may not hear quiet or far-off noises.] 你的聽力不佳，你聽不見細微或遠處的聲響。
[Your immune system is particularly good at resisting infections.  You have an increased chance for bad wounds and infections to heal on their own, and only suffer reduced penalties from them.] 
[Your index fingers have grown into huge talons.  After a bit of practice, you find that this does not affect your dexterity, but allows for a deadly unarmed attack.  They also prevent you from wearing gloves.] 你的手指突變成了大型的爪子。經過了練習，你發現這不會影響你的敏捷，反而能讓你使出致命的徒手攻擊。只是你再也不能戴手套了。
[Your jaw and nose have extended into a bearish muzzle.  You could bite with it, and it looks impressive, but it prevents you from wearing mouthgear.] 你的下顎與鼻子延伸成為了熊一般的口。你能利用來進行嘶咬攻擊，而且看起來很有殺氣，但是讓你不能穿戴嘴部裝備。
[Your jaw and nose have extended into a wolfish muzzle.  It lends itself to biting in combat and looks impressive, but prevents you from wearing mouthgear.] 你的下顎與鼻子延伸成為了狼一般的口。適合在戰鬥中進行嘶咬攻擊，而且看起來很有殺氣，但是讓你不能穿戴嘴部裝備。
[Your legs are extremely limber and fast-moving.  You run 30% faster on flat surfaces.] 你的腿很有彈性並且可以動得很快。你在平地的跑步速度提升 30%。
[Your legs have transformed into six tentacles.  This decreases your speed on land by 20%, makes your movement silent, increases your swimming speed, and reduces wet penalties.] 你的腿變形成了 6 根觸手。減少了你在陸地的移動速度 20%，但是卻是無聲移動。還能增加你的游泳速度，也稍微增加防水能力。
[Your limbs are significantly more flexible than any pathetic human arm or leg.  +3 Dexterity, -2 Strength.] 你的四肢比任何可悲的人類手腳明顯的靈活許多。增加3點敏捷，減少2點力量。
[Your limbs seem to have a little more 'give' to them.  +1 Dexterity.] 你的四肢似乎更容易彎曲。增加1點敏捷。
[Your lower-tentacles have developed suckers.  They make land movement marginally more tiring, but do a good job of keeping you set in place.] 你下盤的觸手長出了吸盤。會在陸地移動時增加疲勞度，但是讓你能夠牢牢地固定在原地。
[Your mandibles have developed extensible fangs, allowing you to bite quickly or ensure your venom goes home, as desired.  Activate to extend or retract your fangs.] 你的下顎骨已發展出可伸縮的獠牙，讓你能夠快速的咬住目標並保證毒液能到達你想到的地方。啟動來伸出或縮回獠牙。
[Your metabolism is a little slower, and you require less food than most.] 你的新陳代謝比較慢，所以你需要吃的食物也比一般人少。
[Your morale will shift up and down at random, often dramatically.] 你的士氣會戲劇性的忽高忽低。
[Your muscle response is dependent on ambient temperatures.  You lose 1% of your speed for every 5 (2.8) degrees below 65 F (18.3 C).] 環境溫度的高低反應在你的肌肉上。在 65 F (18.3 C) 溫度以下，每低於 5 (2.8) 度就會降低你的速度 1%。
[Your muscle response is highly dependent on ambient temperatures.  You lose 1% of your speed for every 3 (1.7) degrees below 65 F (18.3 C).] 環境溫度的高低大量反應在你的肌肉上。在 65 F (18.3 C) 溫度以下，每低於 3 (1.7) 度就會降低你的速度 1%。
[Your muscles are a little stronger.  Strength + 1] 你的肌肉變得強壯些了。力量 +1
[Your muscles are generally slow to move.  You run 10% slower.] 你的肌肉變得移動緩慢。你奔跑速度下降 10%。
[Your muscles are much stronger.  Strength + 4] 你的肌肉更加的強壯。力量 +4
[Your muscles are noticeably bulging.  Strength + 7] 你的肌肉明顯的鼓脹。力量 +7
[Your muscles are perfectly developed.] 你的肌肉完美的發展了。
[Your muscles are quite slow to move.  You run 20% slower.] 你的肌肉運動速度相當緩慢。奔跑速度下降 20%。
[Your muscles are stronger.  Strength + 2] 你的肌肉變得更強壯了。力量 +2
[Your muscles are very slow to move.  You run 30% slower.] 你的肌肉運動速度非常緩慢。奔跑速度下降 30%。
[Your mutated flesh is immune to the damaging effects of acid.] 
[Your optic nerves and brain caught up with your eyes.  Now you can see pretty well at night.  Activate to toggle NV-visible areas on or off.] 你眼球的視神經與大腦相連了。現在你在夜晚能看的相當清楚。使用來切換夜視與否。
[Your optic nerves and brain have mutated to catch up with your eyes, allowing you to see in the infrared spectrum.] 你的視神經與腦發生突變，改變了你的整體視力，能讓你看見紅外線光譜。
[Your paws are bone, muscle, and claw with a thin layer of skin and fur.  They might as well be made of stainless steel.] 你的手是由骨頭、肌肉還有爪子構成，外面覆蓋一層皮膚和毛皮，他們或許也可以用不鏽鋼組成。
[Your paws are much larger now.  Manual dexterity is is difficult: permanent hand encumbrance of 2, serious problems crafting, and no gloves.  But you can swim more effectively.] 你的雙掌大了許多。手部不易做出靈巧動作：手部的累贅程度永久加2點，製作物品會有嚴重的問題，當然也不能戴手套。但是你游泳的效率會好很多。
[Your protective shell has grown large enough to accommodate--if need be--your whole body.  Activate to pull your head and limbs into your shell, trading mobility and vision for warmth, protection, and shelter.] 你的保護殼已經長大到足以包覆你的全身-如果有需要的話。按下啟動鈕以將你的頭與四肢收入殼內，犧牲移動力與視力以增加溫暖，保護以及庇護所。
[Your pseudopod-like limbs can fit into anything!  +4 Dexterity, -4 Strength.] 你的類動植物偽足四肢可以穿戴任何裝備。增加4點敏捷，減少4點力量。
[Your scent is particularly strong.  It's not offensive to humans, but animals that track your scent will do so more easily.] 你的體味特別濃。對人類是沒影響，只是動物很容易追蹤到你。
[Your scent is quite weak.  Animals that track your scent will do so with more difficulty.] 你的氣味很微弱。生物不容易由氣味追蹤到你。
[Your sense organs are all over the place: eyes extending and retracting, 'ears' of various shapes migrating about, and taste & smell are uncontrollable.  The world is a horrible mixup.  Ugh!] 你的感覺器官完全失效了。眼睛張大又變小，耳朵的形狀一變再變，味覺與嗅覺也無法控制。這是個可怕的世界啊啊啊!!
[Your senses are a little keener.  Perception + 1] 你的感官稍微變強了。感知 +1
[Your senses are keener.  Perception + 2] 你的感官更加強化了。感知 +2
[Your senses are keenly honed.] 你的精明程度完美無敵。
[Your senses are much keener.  Perception + 4] 你的感官極大的強化。感知 +4
[Your skin is coated in a light bark, like that of a tree.  This provides resistance to bashing and cutting damage and minor protection from fire.  Greatly reduces wet effects.] 你的皮膚覆蓋了一層樹皮，就像樹木一樣。能夠提供抗鈍擊、抗砍劈、防火的一般保護。大幅增加防水能力。
[Your skin is covered in a pattern of red spots.] 你的皮膚長滿了一系列的紅色斑點。
[Your skin is covered in small, woody thorns.  Whenever an unarmed opponent strikes a part of your body that is not covered by clothing, they will receive minor damage.  Your punches may also deal extra damage.] 你的全身覆蓋了又細小的木質荊棘。只要敵人與你徒手對戰時攻擊到你沒穿衣服的部份，就會受到些許傷害。你的拳頭也能造成額外的傷害。
[Your skin is covered with fine spines.  Whenever an unarmed opponent strikes a part of your body that is not covered by clothing, they will receive moderate damage.] 你的皮膚覆蓋了細小的刺。只要敵人與你徒手對戰時攻擊到你沒穿衣服的部份，就會受到一定的傷害。
[Your skin is fragile.  Cutting damage is slightly increased for you.] 你的皮膚容易受傷。砍劈對你的傷害稍微增加。
[Your skin is light green and has a slightly woody quality to it.  This provides a weak armor, and helps you retain moisture, resulting in less thirst.  Greatly decreases wet penalties.] 你的皮膚成為淡綠色並稍微木質化。能夠作為輕裝甲，並從空氣中獲取濕氣，減少口渴程度。大幅增加防水能力。
[Your skin is rather pale.] 你的皮膚沒有血色。
[Your skin is slightly rough.  This has no gameplay effect.] 你的皮膚變粗糙了。這沒有任何影響。
[Your skin is tough.  Cutting damage is slightly reduced for you.  Slightly decreases wet penalties.] 你的皮膚是硬的。能夠稍微減少砍劈傷害。也能稍微減輕身體潮溼的懲罰。
[Your skin simply cannot handle ultraviolet radiation, such as sunlight.  It will seriously burn you.] 你的肌膚就是無法承受紫外線，例如陽光。將會嚴重的灼傷你。
[Your skull bulges noticeably with your impressive brain.  Intelligence + 7] 你令人印象深刻的大頭顯示了你的過人才智。智力 +7
[Your system has adapted to radiation.  While irradiated, you will actually heal slowly, converting the radiation into hit points.] 你的身體系統已經適應了輻射。當暴露在輻射中時你反而會慢慢回復生命值。
[Your system is rather tolerant of poisons and toxins, and most will affect you less.] 你的身體對於毒素有較高的容忍能力，並且對你影響也較小。
[Your teeth have grown into two-inch-long fangs, allowing you to make an extra attack when conditions favor it.] 你的牙齒特化成兩吋長的獠牙，在特定的狀況能夠增加額外的攻擊。
[Your toes have grown wriggly, and you can't imagine why you wear that stuff on your feet.  Take it off.  It's in the way.] 你已長出蠕動的腳趾。而且你無法想像為何你腳上還穿著那鬼鞋子。拿掉它吧。礙事的東西。
[Your tongue is forked, like that of a reptile.  This has no effect.] 你的舌頭是分岔的，像是一些爬蟲動物。沒有任何影響。
[Your upper earlobes have grown noticeably higher.  Fortunately, they don't get in the way of your headgear, much.  Unfortunately, they also don't seem to help your hearing any.] 你的上半耳垂明顯的長更高了。幸運的是，長高的耳垂並沒有阻礙你戴上頭部裝備。倒楣的是，你的聽力並沒有改善。
[Your upper tentacles have grown large, hook-barbed rakes on the ends.  They're quite vicious, but really aren't suited for fine manipulation.] 你上半身的觸手長的更粗大，還在末端長出了鉤刺。雖然看起來滿凶狠的，但它們真的不太好控制。
[Your venom has become particularly strong.  You're confident that your bites or other cutting/stabbing natural attacks will take your target down quickly.] 你的毒性變得更劇烈了。你有自信能用毒牙，或是砍劈和穿刺的其他攻擊能夠快速放倒你的目標。
[Your visage is disgusting and liable to induce vomiting.  People will not want to interact with you unless they have a very good reason to.] 你的臉讓人看到就反胃。人們都盡可能的不理你。
[Your vision has become particularly acute: you suspect you could pick out zombies much farther away.  Perception +4.] 你的視覺變得特別的敏感，你現在可以從很遠的地方就發現殭屍。感知+4。
[Your visual processing has shifted: though you can see better in the dark, you're nearsighted in the light.  Maybe glasses would help.  Activate to toggle NV-visible areas on or off.] 你的視覺改變了，雖然你在黑暗中可以看的更清楚，但是你在光線下會變成近視，或許眼鏡對你會有幫助。使用來切換夜視與否。
[Your webbing is easily strong enough to support your weight.  You'll use it to descend down any sheer drops you may encounter.] 吐絲製成的結網足夠支撐你的體重。你可以使用它以輕鬆爬下任何陡峭的地形。

[A birdie is one under par, but how much is a zombie? Your clubhouse was overrun by the undead, and you fled with your trusty driving wedge.] 低於標準桿 1桿叫做博蒂，那多少桿才能打爆殭屍？你的高爾夫球俱樂部被殭屍入侵，你開著高爾夫球車逃了。
[A birdie is one under par, but how much is a zombie? Your clubhouse was overrun by the undead, and you fled with your trusty driving wedge.] 低於標準桿 1桿叫做博蒂，那多少桿才能打爆殭屍？你的高爾夫球俱樂部被殭屍入侵，你開著高爾夫球車逃了。
[A child of Crom hailing from the bitter north; you are a barbarian, as fearsome and formidable as the untamed land you call home.] 你是一名野蠻人，凜冽北境Crom的子民，就如同他們稱為家鄉的未開化之地一樣，強大且令人敬畏。
[A child of Crom hailing from the bitter north; you are a barbarian, as fearsome and formidable as the untamed land you call home.] 你是一名野蠻人，凜冽北境Crom的子民，就如同他們稱為家鄉的未開化之地一樣，強大且令人敬畏。
[A low paid security guard, things have suddenly gotten a lot more dangerous than patrolling the grounds warding off potential thieves.  You don't have any particularly useful skills, but you do have some useful equipment since you were on the job when things started going south.] 作為一個低薪的保全，現在事情已經變得不是只有巡邏找小偷這麼簡單了。妳沒有任何特別有用的技能，但是妳還是有一些有用的裝備在身上。

Thanks to your quick feet, you were among the lucky few to survive and escape from the creatures.] 妳正要開始妳的首場要賽時，但災變緊接著就爆發了。從所未見的生物，開始攻擊觀眾，僅有極少數的人勉強逃離這場屠殺。感謝妳的飛毛腿，讓妳成為從那些生物中逃離的少數倖存者。

[When the diagnosis came back positive you signed up for a series of experimental bionic surgeries that saved your life.  Now you're healthier than you ever were before, thanks to a suite of bionic systems powered by standard batteries.  Make the most of your second chance at life.] 當你通過了手術前的診斷之後，你簽下了一系列曾救你一命的仿生學實驗性手術。由於這一套由電池供電的仿生系統，現在你比以前健康多了。也大大增加了你存活下來的可能性。

Now you're healthier than you ever were before, thanks to a suite of bionic systems powered by standard batteries.  Make the most of your second chance at life.] 當你通過了手術前的診斷之後，你簽下了一系列曾救你一命的仿生學實驗性手術。由於這一套由電池供電的仿生系統，現在你比以前健康多了。也大大增加了你存活下來的可能性。

The government has turned you into an infiltration and recon specialist: you have night vision, an alarm and a hacking module.  And it all runs off piles and piles of everyday household batteries.] 妳的身體植入了數個價值連城的生化插件，是由人民繳的稅金支付的。政府培育妳成為滲透和偵察的專家；妳擁有夜視、警報、以及駭客模組，由妳自身供電。

[Since birth, your sole purpose in life has been the advancement of genetic science, willingly or not.  Once the cataclysm struck, you left the lab, and wandered aimlessly, ending up in a forest.] 自你出世以來，你的用途就是用來進行基因科學的實驗，不管你願不願意。當災變爆發，你離開了實驗室，漫無目的的在森林遊蕩。

[The Last Firefighter] 最後消防員
[The building you had chosen to reside in has suddenly caught fire!  You might want to leave.] 你正決定要在這個建築定居的時候就突然失火了！你最好快逃吧。
[When the apocalypse broke out, you were funnelled into a nearby shelter.  Here you have lived, never leaving, lest the unknowns of the outside world hurt you.  Supplies are running low, and for the first time since the cataclysm, you will be forced to face the outside world.] 在末日災情爆發時，你躲到一個附近的避難所。你在這裡生活，從未離開過，與世隔絕。隨著補給減少，你不得不被迫到外面的世界。
[Whether due to stubbornness, ignorance, or just plain bad luck, you missed the evacuation, and are stuck in a city full of the risen dead.] 不論是固執、無知、或只是運氣不好的原因，你就是錯過了疏散行動，並困在一個滿是活死人的城市。
[Wilderness] 荒野
[You find yourself amongst trees.  The screaming and the moaning is fainter this far from civilization, but you'd better know what you're doing out here.] 你發現你身處在樹林之間。在這遠離文明之地，那些尖叫與呻吟聲似乎都與你無關，但你最好知道你是為了做什麼而來到這裡。
[You have survived the initial wave of panic, and have achieved (relative) safety in one of the many government evac shelters.] 你在疫情爆發之初存活，並且在其中一所（相對）安全的政府避難所生活。
[You knew the day was going to be bad when it started with your partner getting eaten by a perp before you even had coffee.  The scene back at the station house looks bad, real bad.  This is going to be an all-nighter.] 你才正準備喝口咖啡時，夥伴就被嫌犯吃了。這狀況看起來真糟，看來沒得睡了。
[You start drunk to the point of incapacitation, depressed, infected, surrounded by fire, naked, and sick with the flu.  This day went downhill really fast.] 你開始時酒醉、沮喪、感染、被火包圍、全裸並且感冒。今天真不好過。
[You were at school when the principal shambled in and ate one of the students, and before you knew it the entire campus was overrun by monsters.  Guess school's out forever.] 
[You've been locked in a lab with no (obvious) way out!  Find a way to escape or starve to death.] 
[You've crashed your precious helicopter, it'll never fly again.  Monster don't bother you, life without your Loach is worthless anyway.] 
[You've survived for as long as you could inside of the mall you worked at as a security guard.  Find a way out and try your best to survive.] 你在百貨商城的警衛經驗讓你在商城裡存活許久。找到出路並盡力生存吧。
[Comprised of an automatic rifle carbine designed to fire a pistol cartridge, submachine guns can reload and fire quickly, sometimes in bursts, but they are relatively inaccurate and may be prone to mechanical failures.] 泛指輕型的連發槍械能夠發射手槍子彈，衝鋒槍能夠快速的射擊以及裝填，但是相對的命中率就不高，並且容易遇到機械故障。
[Handguns have poor accuracy compared to rifles, but are usually quick to fire and reload faster than other guns.  They are very effective at close quarters, though unsuited for long range engagement.] 
[Rifles have terrific range and accuracy compared to other firearms, but may be slow to fire and reload, and can prove difficult to use in close quarters.  Fully automatic rifles can fire rapidly, but are harder to handle properly.] 
[Shotguns are easy to shoot and can inflict massive damage, but their effectiveness and accuracy decline rapidly with range.  Slugs can be loaded into shotguns to provide greater range, though they are somewhat inaccurate.] 
[Your ability to dodge an oncoming threat, be it an enemy's attack, a triggered trap, or a falling rock.  This skill is also used in attempts to fall gracefully, and for other acrobatic feats.] 
[Your ability to stay afloat and move around in bodies of water.  This skill keeps you from drowning, affects your combat effectiveness and speed in deep water, and determines the detriment of swimming with heavier gear.] 
[Your general competence in building construction.  This governs the complexity of structures that can be built, and the time required to build them.] 
[Your overall skill in using bows and firearms.  With higher levels, this general experience increases accuracy with any bows or firearms, but is secondary to practice with the type of ranged weapon in question.] 
[Your skill and finesse in personal combat, both with and without a weapon.  Higher levels can significantly increase the accuracy and effectiveness of your physical attacks.] 
[Your skill in accessing and manipulating computers.  Higher levels can allow a user to navigate complex software systems and even bypass their security.] 
[Your skill in bargaining, haggling, and trading with others.  Higher levels increase the odds of getting the better end of a deal, and might even see you convincing others to give you free stuff.] 
[Your skill in combining food ingredients to make other, tastier food items.  It may also be used in certain chemical mixtures and other, more esoteric tasks.] 
[Your skill in dealing with electrical systems, used in the craft and repair of objects with electrical components.  This skill is an important part of installing and managing bionic implants.] 
[Your skill in effecting emergency medical treatment.  Higher levels allow better use of medicines and items like bandages and first aid kits, and reduce the failure and complication rates of medical procedures.] 
[Your skill in engineering, maintaining and repairing vehicles and other mechanical systems.  This skill covers the craft of items with complex parts, and plays a role in the installation of bionic equipment.] 
[Your skill in fighting with blunt weaponry, from rocks and sticks to baseball bats and the butts of rifles.  Skill increases damage, and higher levels will improve the accuracy of an attack.] 
[Your skill in fighting with knives, spears and other such stabbing implements.  Skill increases attack accuracy as well as the chance of inflicting a deadly and critical blow.] 
[Your skill in fighting with weaponry designed to cut, hack and slash an opponent.  Lower levels of skill increase accuracy and damage, while higher levels will help to bypass heavy armor and thick hides.] 
[Your skill in hand-to-hand fighting.  For the unskilled, it's a good way to get hurt, but those with enough practice can perform special blows and techniques to quickly dispatch enemies.] 
[Your skill in operating and steering a vehicle in motion.  A higher level allows greater control over vehicles at higher speeds, and reduces the penalty of shooting while driving.] 
[Your skill in setting and disarming traps safely and effectively.  This skill does not affect the detection of hidden traps, or the evasion of traps that are triggered.] 
[Your skill in speaking to other people.  Covers ability in boasting, flattery, threats, persuasion, lies, and other facets of interpersonal communication.  Works best in conjunction with a high level of intelligence.] 
[Your skill in surviving the wilderness, and in crafting various basic survival items.  This also covers your ability to skin and butcher animals for meat and hides.] 
[Your skill in the craft and repair of clothing, bags, blankets and other textiles.  Affects knitting, sewing, stitching, weaving, and nearly anything else involving a needle and thread.] 
[Your skill in throwing objects over a distance.  Skill increases accuracy, and at higher levels, the range of a throw.] 
[Your skill in using bow weapons, from hand-carved self bows to complex hunting crossbows.  Quiet and effective, they require strength of body and sight to wield, and are not terribly accurate over a long distance.] 
[Your skill in using heavy weapons like rocket, grenade or missile launchers.  These weapons have a variety of applications and may carry immense destructive power, but they are cumbersome and hard to manage.] 
[Your skill in working with raw materials and shaping them into useful objects.  This skill plays an important role in the crafting of many objects.]

Classic BEAR TRAP returns in this issue!] 你對野外生存了解嗎? 如果你沒做過圈套表示你根本不懂陷阱! 閱讀這本"陷阱生活"來了解野生動物的習性，並了解如何殺死他們。這篇教你如何製作傳統的『捕熊陷阱』!

[HOME GROWN SCIENCE: Several governors & legislators from the New England region discussed a new regional initiative today, which relaxed laws that limit the distance a hazardous-material laboratory or factory can be from a city.  "This should keep our economy going strong for years to come, with all the military R&D facilities being established,", one mayor remarked.] 土生土長的科學：一些來自新英格蘭地區的州長和議員今天討論了一個新的區域性措施，將會對危險物質實驗室或工廠與城市間放寬距離的限制。一位市長表示："加上所有將要建立的軍事研發設施，這舉將會讓我們今後幾年的經濟持續強勁。"

[LASERS - NEXT BIG THING?: Top defense researchers remarked during demonstration of a prototype today: "We are still working on it, the laser weapon lacks power, but has a technically almost unlimited range," one said] 『雷射 - 下一個重大突破?』: 一名頂尖防禦機構的研究員展示著雷射原型機，並表示"我們還在開發中，現在雷射做為武器使用威力稍嫌薄弱，一但開發好理論上武器的射程是無限遠的"。

No word yet on if this is a deliberate tactic or a side effect of the earlier bombings.] 公告：「當心酸雨」。有些具腐蝕性的化學物質飄到空中同雨雲結合引起化學反應成可致死的酸雨。目前尚無法認定這是人為的蓄意計畫或僅是先前實驗室爆炸案的副作用。

[RIOTS CAUSED BY "NEW DRUG": Rumors of riots were quelled today.  "These are isolated incidents" said a local police chief.  "The violence is random and senseless, our current theory is a street drug gone terribly wrong"] 『"新藥"造成的騷動』: 關於騷動的傳聞在今日獲得了官方的回應，地方警長表示"這是一些個別案例，隨機且沒有理由的發生，這跟我們以往對付的街頭賣毒案例完全不同"。
[ROBOCOP BEATS CRIME: Due to the common usage of Securibots and their ability to respond more rapidly than people, crime is down 54% and dropping.  Police chief says "Don't trip an alarm and you have nothing to worry about"] 機械戰警打擊犯罪：由於保安機器人的日益普及，及他們優於一般人類的敏捷能力，犯罪率已經降至54%且持續下降。警察總長宣稱：「只要不觸發警鈴，你就能安全無虞。」
[ROBOT RAMPAGE: Three Protesters injured when surrounding a Military base, protesting automated turrets which put guards out of jobs.  "We warned them, turrets will open fire on anyone without a military ID," a general said.] 機器人爆走：三名因為某個軍事基地以自動砲塔代替警衛而失業的抗議者在包圍軍事基地時受傷。一名將軍指出：「我們警告過他們，砲塔會對任何沒有軍事ID卡的人開火。」
[SECURIBOTS: Keeping your home safe, ready the second the alarm goes off...  Who needs people?] 保安機器人：居家必備，完全防衛，警鈴一響，敵人撤退。

[SPACE TELEPORTATION - TRUTH OR FICTION?  Scientists addressed a growing conspiracy theory today "The plutonium consumed is massive.  We cannot use teleportation to reach aliens, unless they live on some kind of parallel world."] 空間傳送門 - 真相還是謊言？今日的科學家平息了不斷散播的陰謀論 “儘管消耗了巨量的鈽，我們仍然無法用傳送門跟外星人接觸，除非他們生活在某種平行世界。”

While intended to advertise a new flavor called Isotope RU-238 'FRUIT', most of the text is dedicated to a long list of possible side effects: anxiety, insomnia, severe insomnia, dizziness, tremors, nausea, headache, vomiting, delusions, hallucinations, rhabdomyolysis, internal burns, thyroid cancer, extensive internal bleeding, upper gastrointestinal bleeding, diarrhea, cardiac dysrhythmia, cardiovascular collapse, suicidal ideation, seizures, ataxia, amnesia, mania, stroke, neurodegeneration, malignalitaloptereosis, necrotizing fasciitis, recurrent flu, and pinkeye.] 這是一張Rivtech出品的能量飲料廣告單，上面印著"原子力渴望"的字樣。雖然主打飲料中含有同位素RU-238"水果"，但可能的副作用列表還是佔了大部分說明: 焦慮、失眠、嚴重失眠、頭暈、發顫、噁心、頭痛、嘔吐、妄想、幻覺、橫紋肌溶解症、自燃、甲狀腺癌、擴散性內出血、上腸胃道流血、腹瀉、心律失調、心血管阻塞、自殺傾向、癲癇、共濟失調、健忘、狂躁、咳嗽、神經退化、梅林斑狀疽熱症候群、壞死筋膜炎、復發性流感與紅眼症。

[After firing your gun, you will probably notice a Recoil alert in the lower right.  Generally speaking, the more damaging the ammo, the worse the recoil.  Recoil severely reduces your chance to hit, but you can eliminate recoil by pausing ('.') for a turn or moving normally.  High strength reduces recoil, so weak characters might want to stick to .22 or 9mm guns.] 
[Hitting a monster will stun it briefly, allowing you to escape or get in another attack.  Your dexterity and melee skills are used to determine whether an attack hits, while strength affects damage.] 擊中敵人時會短暫的震暈它，讓你有空檔可以逃離或是繼續追擊。你的敏捷和近戰能力決定攻擊的命中率，而力量則會影響傷害大小。
[If you press 'i' and then the letter of your weapon, you'll see its combat stats.  Bashing damage ignores most armor, but varies greatly and requires strength.  Cutting damage is a fixed amount, but is blocked by armor.  The To-hit bonus affects your chances of hitting.  The amount of time it takes to swing your melee weapon depends on both its size and weight; small, compact weapons are the fastest.] 
[It's dark down here!  Fortunately, you have a flashlight.  Press 'a' and then select your flashlight to turn it on.] 這裡一片漆黑！不過幸好你有帶著手電筒 ，按下 'a' 鍵，然後選擇你的手電筒來開啟它。
[It's dark down here!  Without a source of light, you'll be limited to seeing only one space in any direction.  You'll encounter darkness while underground or at night.  Press '<' to go back upstairs, and look around for a flashlight.] 這裡一片漆黑！少了光源你只能看到周圍一格的範圍，只要是在地鐵或是晚上都是這樣，按下 '<' 鍵回到樓上，去找把手電筒吧。
[Most monsters will have to smash their way through a closed door.  If a door is locked or stuck, you can smash it by pressing 's' and then a movement key.] 大部分的怪物都必須要破壞關閉的門才能通過。若是門被鎖住或是卡住，你能夠利用's'選擇方向來砸爛該門。(xap)
[Once you have a loaded gun wielded, you can fire it.  Press the 'f' key to fire a single shot.  With many guns, you can fire a burst by pressing 'F'.  You'll automatically target the last monster you shot at, or the closest monster to you.  You can change your target with the movement keys, or cycle through monsters with '<' and '>'.  To fire, press 'f' or '.'; to cancel, hit the escape key.] 
[Taking damage often causes pain.  Small amounts of pain are tolerable, but as it gets worse your stats will drop and you will move much slower.  To reduce pain, take painkillers like codeine, or simply wait it out.] 受到傷害通常會造成疼痛。小數值的疼痛能夠被忍受，但是隨著數值的增加你各種屬性受到的影響也就越大。要減少疼痛，服用止痛藥，類似可待因，就能簡單的把疼痛降低。
[That brown '+' next to you is a closed door.  To open it, either simply walk into it, or press 'o' and then a movement key.] 你身旁的棕色 '+' 符號代表一扇闔上的門，直接走過去或是按下字母 'o' 配合方向鍵來開啟。
[That drug you just took is a painkiller.  Painkillers are very important to keep on hand, as pain both penalizes your stats and makes you slower.  Be careful, as the stronger painkillers can make you woozy, and some are even addictive.] 你剛剛吞下去的是止痛藥，身上隨時帶著止痛藥是重要的，因為受傷不但會降低能力值還會減緩你的移動速度。不過要注意，藥效太強的止痛藥會讓你頭暈目眩，還有可能會上癮。
[That drug you just took placed an effect on you.  To check your effects, press '@'.  Most only last a short while, while others, like chronic disease, last until cured by some other means.] 你剛吃下去的藥起了作用。按下 '@' 來檢視。大部分症狀都會在短時間內治癒，不過有少數慢性疾病會一直維持到你用其他方法治療為止。
[That yellow > next to you is a staircase leading down.  To go downstairs, step onto the staircase and press the '>' key.  Similarly, a yellow < is stairs leading up, and can be followed with the '<' key.] 在你身旁的黃色>符號代表向下的樓梯，站在符號上按下 '>'即可下樓，同理<符號代表往高一層的樓梯，按下 '<'即可上樓。
[The '@' character in the center of the screen represents you.  To move, you can use the numpad, the vikeys (hjklyubn), or the arrow keys.  To have your character wait in place, press '.'] 在畫面中央的'@'符號代表玩家你。要移動，你能夠使用九宮數字鍵、hjklyubn、或是方向鍵。要讓你的角色在原地等待，按下'.' (xap)
[The Examine command is useful for grabbing items off window frames, around corners, etc.  It's also used for interacting with a few terrain types.  Interactive terrain is usually designated with a '6' symbol.] 
[The item you just picked up has been wielded as a weapon automatically.  This happened because it is a good melee weapon, and you were empty-handed.  This usually is faster than than picking it up, then wielding it.] 你剛撿取的物品被自動手持作為武器了。這是因為該物品是好的近戰武器，而你是空手的。這樣動作會比撿取東西再從物品欄進行手持動作要快的多。(xap)
[The item you just picked up has been wielded as a weapon automatically.  This happened because you do not have space in your inventory to stash the item, and so you must carry it in your hand.  To expand your inventory space, try wearing clothing with a lot of storage space, like a backpack, or cargo pants.] 你剛撿取的物品被自動手持作為武器了。會發生這種狀況通常代表你的物品欄沒有足夠的儲物空間能夠收藏該物品，所以你必須用雙手拿著。要拓展儲物空間，試著穿上有許多儲物空間的衣物，類似背包，或是工作褲。(xap)
[The item you just picked up is a comestible!  To eat a comestible, press 'E'.  Comestibles are items you can use up, like food, drink, pills, etc.  Most food expires eventually, so be careful.  Some comestibles, especially drugs, can cause subtle, long-term effects.] 
[The item you just picked up is a firearm!  Guns are very powerful weapons but they require ammunition.  Firearms have many special attributes.  Most modify the damage done by their ammunition.  They also have dispersion, which affects their chance to hit.  Some guns are semi-automatic, while others can fire a burst.  Some firearms (mainly bows and other muscle-powered weapons) have a range, which is added on top of the ammo's range when firing.] 
[The item you just picked up is a good weapon!  To wield a weapon, press w, then pick what to wield.  To wield nothing, either drop your weapon with d, or press 'w-' to put it away.  A zombie has spawned nearby.  To attack it, simply move into it.] 你剛撿取的物品是很好的武器！要手持武器，按下'w'，並選取要手持的物品。要變為徒手狀態，可以用'd'來丟棄武器，或是'w-'來收起。有殭屍在附近要攻擊的話只要朝著其方向移動即可。(xap)
[The item you just picked up is a tool!  To activate a tool, press 'a'.  Some tools have a set charge, which can be reloaded once depleted.  Other are single-use items, and still others are reusable.] 你剛撿起來的是一個工具！按下 'a' 鍵來使用它。有些工具有使用次數，重新裝載後可以再次使用。而其他工具不是一次性就是無限次數的。
[The item you just picked up is a type of clothing!  To wear clothing, press W and then select an item.  To take off clothing, press T, or simply take it off and drop it in one action by pressing d.] 你剛撿取的物品是一種衣物！要穿戴衣物，按下'W'並選擇物品。要脫下衣物，按下'T'，或是簡單的按下'd'來把該物品脫下並丟棄在地上。(xap)
[The item you just picked up is ammunition, used with a gun.  It has many special attributes.  The damage value is the maximum done on a standard hit; a critical hit or headshot will do much more damage.  Some monsters or NPCs will wear armor which reduces the damage from gunfire; a high Armor-pierce value will reduce this effect.  The Range is the maximum range the ammo can achieve, and the dispersion affects its chance to hit.] 你剛撿取的物品是彈藥，使用於槍械上。有許多不同種類的屬性。傷害屬性指的是正常命中時的數值；爆擊命中或是爆頭將能造成更
大的傷害。某些怪物或是NPC會穿戴護甲來降低遭受的傷害；高穿甲屬性數值能夠降低護甲的影響。距離屬性指的是彈藥的有效距離
，而彈著分散屬性影響了命中率。(xap)
[The item you just picked up went into your inventory, the shared storage space of all the clothing you're wearing.  To view your inventory, press 'i'.  You can then press the letter of any item to get more information about it.] 
[The nearby { is a display rack, and the blue background indicates that there are items there.  If you examine the square by pressing 'e', you can pick up items without moving to the square.] 附近的 { 符號為展示架，而藍色背景指的是有物品在這。若是你按下'e'來檢視該格子，你就能夠在不移動到該格子上的情況下撿取物品。(xap)
[To see what the symbols around you mean, press ';'.  You'll be able to scroll around and get information on the terrain, monsters, and items in the world around you.] 要了解各符號代表的意義，按下';'。你將能夠四處捲動，並了解地形地物的各種資訊，包括各種在你周圍的怪物與物品。(xap)
[To use a gun, first wield it with the 'w' key.  Next you need to reload using the 'r' key, assuming you have the proper ammo.  If you wish to unload your gun, possibly to change ammunition types, press 'U'.] 在使用槍之前，你需要先按下 'w' 鍵來進行手持動作，假設你有帶相對應的子彈的話使用 'r' 鍵來進行裝填子彈。你可以按下 'U' 鍵來卸下彈夾以換上不同的類型的子彈。
[Welcome to the Cataclysm tutorial!  As you play, pop-ups like this one will appear to guide you through the basic game actions.  Pressing spacebar will close the pop-up.] 歡迎來到災變的教學模式！當你遊玩的時候，類似這個彈出訊息將會指導你進行基本的遊戲操作。按下 空白鍵 將會關閉這個彈出
訊息。(xap)
[When you kill a monster it will often leave behind a corpse.  Corpses can be important sources of food, but you must Butcher them by standing on the corpse and pressing 'B'.  You'll need a bladed weapon in your inventory, preferably a small, very sharp one.  An unskilled butcher may only get a few pieces of meat, or none at all.  Note that many monsters, such as zombies, leave tainted meat, unsuitable for consumption.] 當你殺害了怪物通常會留下屍體。屍體有時是重要的食物來源，但是你必須先站在屍體上按下'B'來進行屠宰。你必須在物品欄中有刀刃的武器，最好是小而尖銳的。一個沒技巧的屠宰可能只能得到少量的肉，甚至完全沒有。注意，許多的怪物，像是殭屍，會留下感染的肉，這是不適合食用的。
[You can close an opened door by pressing 'c' and then a movement key.  Closing doors behind you can often slow down throngs of monsters greatly.] 
[You can smash through windows by pressing 's' and then a movement key.  A smashed window takes a long time to climb through, and it's possible to hurt yourself on the broken glass, but it's a good last-ditch escape route.  You can smash through other things, too.] 
[You don't have space in your inventory to store the item you just tried to pick up.  You need to wear something with storage space, like a backpack or cargo pants, to gain more storage space.] 你的物品欄沒有足夠的儲物空間來儲存你要撿取的物品。你需要穿戴上有提供儲物空間的東西才能增加空間，像是背包或是工作褲。
[You just activated a grenade!  You probably want to throw it.  To throw an item, press 't' and then select the item to throw.  The maximum range depends on your strength and the object's weight and size.  Throwing isn't very good in most combat situations, but if you've got some fire power...] 你剛拉下了手榴彈的插梢！你最好趕快投擲出去。按下 't' 來選取物品進行投擲。投擲的最遠距離取決於你的力量和物品的重量及大小。
投擲物品的動作在大部分的戰鬥中起不了什麼太大的作用，除非你丟的是手榴彈之類的東西...
[You just drank a bottle of water, reducing your thirst level and reducing the water level in the bottle.  You'll probably want to drop empty bottles, or you might want to save them to refill from a water source later.] 你剛喝了一瓶水，止了些渴也讓瓶中的水減少了。你可以選擇丟掉空瓶，或是留著拿來裝水。
[You just placed a trap.  Traps are permanent until set off, and can be an important defensive tactic, particularly when sleeping in unsafe territory.  Try stepping on that _ -- don't worry, it's a harmless bubblewrap trap.] 
[You just put on an article of clothing that protects against the environment.  The most common and important are respiratory devices, which will protect you against smoke, air-born toxins or organisms, and other common hazards.  However, they also make it a little harder to breath when running, so you'll move more slowly.  To check encumbrance, press @.] 
[You just put on an article of clothing that provides ample storage space.  This will allow you to carry much more stuff, but be aware that there is also a limit on the weight you can carry which depends on strength.  The item you put on also encumbered your torso.  This will make combat a little more difficult.  To check encumbrance, press @.] 
[You just put on an article of clothing that provides physical protection.  There are two types of damage that clothing defends against, bashing, and cutting.  Most monsters deal bashing damage, but cutting is often the more deadly of the two.  Bullets are considered cutting damage.] 
[You just stepped on a space with one or more items.  If you wish to pick it up, press ',' or 'g'.] 你現在腳下有一個或多個道具，你可以按下 ',' 或是 'g' 來撿取。
[You're carrying more volume than you have storage for, which means you are carrying some stuff in the crook of your arm or in some other awkward manner.  While overloaded like this, you will suffer SEVERE encumbrance penalties, making combat dangerous.  Either drop an item, or possibly wield something-- the object you are wielding does not take up inventory space.] 
[~ is a terrain symbol that indicates water.  From a water source like this, you can fill any containers you might have.  Step onto the water, then press the pickup key (',' or 'g'), then select a watertight container to put the water into.] ~ 是一個代表含水的地形符號，類似這樣的水源你可以拿容器裝水，站在水上面按下 (',' 或是 'g') 鍵來選擇一個水密容器裝水。

[Use the arrow- or keypad keys to navigate the left list.
Press [%s] to select highlighted armor for reordering.
Use   [%s] / [%s] to scroll the right list.
Press [%s] to assign special inventory letters to clothing.
Use   [%s] to equip an armor item from the inventory.
Press [%s] to remove selected armor from oneself.
 
[Encumbrance and Warmth] explanation:
The first number is the summed encumbrance from all clothing on that bodypart.
The second number is the encumbrance caused by the number of clothing on that bodypart.
The sum of these values is the effective encumbrance value your character has for that bodypart.] 
[Warmth:] 保暖度:
[You will not drown today.] 你今天不會溺水。

[ AUTO PICKUP MANAGER ]  自動撿取管理器 
[%1$d item matches: %2$s] 
[* is used as a Wildcard. A few Examples:

wooden arrow    matches the itemname exactly
wooden ar*      matches items beginning with wood ar
*rrow           matches items ending with rrow
*avy fle*fi*arrow     multiple * are allowed
heAVY*woOD*arrOW      case insensitive search
] * 是一個通用符號. 舉例如下:

wood arrow 符合物品名稱
wood ar*      物品名稱開頭符合 wood ar
*rrow         物品名稱結尾符合 rrow
*avy fle*fi*arrow  可以中間使用多個 *
heAVY*woOD*arrOW      大小寫敏感的搜尋

[
  Subj: EPA: Report All Potential Containment Breaches 3873643
  To: all SRCF staff
  From:  Robert Shane, Director of the EPA
  
  All hazardous waste dumps and sarcophagi must submit three
  samples from each operational leache system to the following
  addresses:
  
  CDC Bioterrorism Lab 
  Building 10
  Corporate Square Boulevard
  Atlanta, GA 30329
  
  EPA Region 8 Laboratory
  16194 W. 45th
  Drive Golden, Colorado 80403
  
  These samples must be accurate and any attempts to cover
  incompetencies will result in charges of Federal Corruption
  and potentially Treason.
] 
  主旨：環保局：回報所有容器潛在破損狀況 3873643
  給：所有 SRCF 成員
  從：Robert Shane，環保局主任
  
  所有的危險廢物堆放場與石棺
  必須各提交三個樣本到下列地址：
  
  疾病管制局－生化武器研究室
  第 10 棟
  企業廣場大道
  亞特蘭大，GA 30329
  
  環保局第 8 區實驗室
  16194 W. 45th
  Drive Golden，科羅拉多 80403
  
  提供的樣本必須真實採樣，任何試圖掩蓋虛假樣本的
  行為將會受到聯邦指控貪腐及叛國罪。

[

  我們很驚訝的發現這些設施居然是建立在人口密集的地區，
  我們絕對不會同意這個計畫直到我們能自由的監督及檢查石棺，
  但是從沒被當回事。從那時以來，能源部就一直不擇手段把環保局

[ENTRY 47:
Our normal mining routine has unearthed a hollow chamber.  This would not be
out of the ordinary, save for the odd, perfectly vertical faultline found.
This faultline has several odd concavities in it which have the more
superstitious crew members alarmed; they seem to be of human origin.

ENTRY 48:
The concavities are between 10 and 20 feet tall, and run the length of the
faultline.  Each one is vaguely human in shape, but with the proportions of
the limbs, neck and head greatly distended, all twisted and curled in on
themselves.
] 記錄 47：
我們在日常的採礦工作挖掘出一個中空的空間。另外更不正常的是， 
還找到了一個有完美垂直的斷崖。
這個斷崖上有數個詭異的凹洞，一些迷信的工人們非常緊張；
並且這些凹洞像是人造的。

記錄 48：
這些凹洞大約 10 到 20 呎高，大大小小分布在整個斷崖上。 
每個看起來都像人的形狀，但四肢及脖子的部份卻是拉長的，
整個凹洞是扭曲的。

[ENTRY 49:
We've stopped mining operations in this area, obviously, until archaeologists
have the chance to inspect the area.  This is going to set our schedule back
by at least a week.  This stupid artifact-preservation law has been in place
for 50 years, and hasn't even been up for termination despite the fact that
these mining operations are the backbone of our economy.

ENTRY 52:
Still waiting on the archaeologists.  We've done a little light inspection of
the faultline; our sounding equipment is insufficient to measure the depth of
the concavities.  The equipment is rated at 15 miles depth, but it isn't made
for such narrow tunnels, so it's hard to say exactly how far back they go.
] 
[ENTRY 54:
I noticed a couple of the guys down in the chamber with a chisel, breaking
off a piece of the sheer wall.  I'm looking the other way.  It's not like
the eggheads are going to notice a little piece missing.  Fuck em.

ENTRY 55:
Well, the archaeologists are down there now with a couple of the boys as
guides.  They're hardly Indiana Jones types; I doubt they been below 20
feet.  I hate taking guys off assignment just to babysit the scientists, but
if they get hurt we'll be shut down for god knows how long.

ENTRY 58:
They're bringing in ANOTHER CREW?  Christ, it's just some cave carvings!  I
know that's sort of a big deal, but come on, these guys can't handle it?
] 記錄 54：
我發現有一些在那個空間的人在用鑿子敲岩壁，並採集斷崖的碎片。
我正在想辦法，讓這些傻子不會發現碎片不見了，爽啦。

記錄 55:
嗯，現在這些考古學家跟一些看起來不像印第安瓊斯的男性嚮導在下面；
我看他們應該連20英呎都下不去，我討厭當這些科學家的保母， 
但如果他們受傷了，天知道這礦坑會被封閉多久。

記錄 58：
他們居然帶來了另一組人？老天，這只是一堆洞穴啊！
我知道這沒有什麼大不了，但是拜託，現有人力沒辦法處理嗎？

[...But never at dusk.] ...但絕對不是黃昏。
[Behind every good man there is a woman, and that woman was Martha Washington, man.] 在每一個成功的男人背後都有一個女人，而那個女人就是馬莎·華盛頓（美國首任總統華盛頓的妻子）。
[Const: ] 常數: 
[Could Jesus microwave a burrito so hot, that he himself couldn't eat it?] 耶穌會加熱個捲餅燙到自己都吃不了嗎？
[Dave's not here, man.] 戴夫不在這，老兄。
[Dexterity %d;  ] 敏捷 %d；  
[Dexterity +%d;  ] 敏捷 +%d  
[Eh... maybe not.] 痾... 算了。
[Every day, George would come home, and she would have a big fat bowl waiting for him when he came in the door, man.] 每天喬治華盛頓回到家要進門的時候，她都拿著一個大碗等著他。
[Freq: ] 頻繁:
[I guess, maybe, without the cheese... yeah.] 我想，也許，沒有起司... 好吧。
[I used to do drugs...  I still do, but I used to, too.] 我以前做藥... 我現在還是，但以前也是。
[I usually only smoke in the late evening.] 我通常在傍晚時抽菸。

[Just the early evening, mid-evening and late evening.] 只是傍晚、晚上、跟深夜。
[Man, a cheeseburger sounds SO awesome right now.] 天哪，起司漢堡現在聽起來好讚哪。
[Occasionally, early afternoon, early mid-afternoon, or perhaps the late mid-afternoon.] 偶爾，上午、中午、或是可能下午。
[Oh, occasionally the early evening, but usually the late evening, or the mid-evening.] 喔，偶爾傍晚，但通常是晚上，或是半夜。
[Oh, sometimes the early-mid-late-early-morning.] 喔，有時候是接近中午的早上。
[Oh, there's some crazy shit, man.  There's a dude in the bushes.  Has he got a gun?  I dunno!] 
[Okay, like, the scariest thing in the world would be... if like you went to grab something and it wasn't there!] 好吧，那麼，世上最可怕的事就是... 你伸出手想抓東西卻發現東西不在那！

[They call them fingers, but I never see them fing.] 他們把這些東西叫做手指，但是我從來沒看過他們像手指動過。
[Unfreq: ] 不頻繁:
[Walkin' down the hall, by myself, smokin' a j with fifty elves.] 漫步走過大廳堂，五十精靈吸大麻。
[You ever see the back of a twenty dollar bill... on weed?] 你看過 20 元美鈔的背面... 上面有畫大麻？
[You have a sudden urge to flip your bible open to Genesis 1:29...] 你突然有一股衝動，想要把聖經打開翻到創世紀1:29...(神說、看哪、我將遍地上一切結種子的菜蔬、和一切樹上所結有核的果子、全賜給你們作食物。)
[You suddenly realize that all matter is merely energy condensed to a slow vibration, and we are all one consciousness experiencing itself subjectively.] 你突然發現所有的事物都只是緩慢震動的匯集能量，而我們經歷的都只是自身的主觀意識經歷。

[Your %s does not need to be reloaded, it reloads and fires a single motion.] 你的 %s 不需要手動裝填，它的裝填和開火都在同個動作。
[Your %s does not reload normally.] 你 %s 沒有被正常的裝填。
[Your %s is fully loaded!] 你的 %s 裝填完畢！
